## é¡¹ç›®åŠŸèƒ½ 1. èƒ½æ–¹ä¾¿åœ°é€šè¿‡ç»ˆç«¯é€‰æ‹©æ–‡ä»¶/æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ã€‚ 2. èƒ½å°†é€‰ä¸­çš„æ–‡ä»¶çš„ç›¸å¯¹è·¯å¾„ä¸å†…å®¹æ‰“åŒ…ä¸ºå•ä¸ªxml/json/mdæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå¹¶è¾“å‡ºåˆ°æŒ‡å®šç›®å½•ã€‚å¦‚æœä¸æŒ‡å®šå°±è¾“å‡ºåˆ°å½“å‰ç›®å½•ã€‚
## é¢å¤–è¦æ±‚ 1. æ”¯æŒåœ¨cliç•Œé¢ä¸­ä¸´æ—¶é€‰æ‹©ä½¿ç”¨å“ªç§å¯¼å‡ºæ ¼å¼ 2. æ”¯æŒTUIç•Œé¢ã€cliå‘½ä»¤2ç§æ–¹å¼ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚é…ç½®é¡¹ä¹Ÿåº”å½“æ”¯æŒåœ¨æ‰§è¡Œcliå‘½ä»¤æ—¶é€šè¿‡å‚æ•°çš„å½¢å¼æŒ‡å®š **CLIå‚æ•°æ”¯æŒ**ï¼š ```bash # åŸºæœ¬ä½¿ç”¨ code-context-generator --format xml --output output.xml

# è¦†ç›–é…ç½®é€‰é¡¹ code-context-generator --format markdown --max-depth 3 --exclude "*.log,*.tmp"

**TUIç•Œé¢å¢å¼º**ï¼š - æä¾›é…ç½®é¢„è§ˆåŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œå®æ—¶æ˜¾ç¤ºå½“å‰é…ç½®çš„æ•ˆæœ - æ”¯æŒé…ç½®ç¼–è¾‘ç•Œé¢ï¼Œå¯åœ¨TUIä¸­ç›´æ¥ä¿®æ”¹é…ç½® - æä¾›æ ¼å¼é€‰æ‹©å™¨ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå®æ—¶åˆ‡æ¢è¾“å‡ºæ ¼å¼ - æ˜¾ç¤ºé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶è¯­æ³•æ£€æŸ¥å’Œé”™è¯¯æç¤º
3. å¿…é¡»èƒ½å¤Ÿå¤„ç†ä¸­æ–‡è·¯å¾„ã€æ–‡ä»¶å 4. å¿…é¡»æ‹¥æœ‰é«˜æ€§èƒ½ 5. é‡‡å–ç®€å•çš„TUIè®¾è®¡ï¼Œé¿å…ä»»ä½•å¤æ‚çš„UIè®¾è®¡ï¼Œä»¥å…å½±å“æ€§èƒ½ï¼Œé™ä½å¯é æ€§ 6. å¿…é¡»æ”¯æŒwindowsã€linuxçš„æ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿã€‚ç”Ÿæˆæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„è·¯å¾„ç»Ÿä¸€ä½¿ç”¨æ­£æ–œæ ï¼ˆ/ï¼‰ä½œä¸ºè·¯å¾„åˆ†éš”ç¬¦ 7. æä¾›äº¤äº’å¼é€‰æ‹©åŠŸèƒ½å’ŒåŸºäºå‰ç¼€åŒ¹é…çš„è‡ªåŠ¨è¡¥å…¨åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œä¸”è¯¥åŠŸèƒ½å¿…é¡»æ”¯æŒwindowså’Œlinuxä¸¤ç§ç¯å¢ƒ 8. å¿…é¡»æ­£ç¡®å¿½ç•¥é€‰ä¸­çš„æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸­çš„éšè—æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆå¦‚.git, .vscode, node_modulesç­‰ï¼‰ï¼Œä¸”åœ¨éå†è·¯å¾„å‰è¯»å–.gitignoreçš„è§„åˆ™ï¼Œå¿½ç•¥è¿™äº›æ–‡ä»¶ä¸ç›®å½• 9. å¿…é¡»æ”¯æŒé€’å½’éå†å­æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ï¼Œä¸”åœ¨éå†å­æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹æ—¶å¿…é¡»æ­£ç¡®å¤„ç†ç¬¦å·é“¾æ¥ï¼ˆsymbolic linkï¼‰ 10. æ˜¯å¦éå†æ‰€æœ‰å­ç›®å½•(é»˜è®¤åªéå†1å±‚)ã€å¼€å¯è‡ªåŠ¨è¡¥å…¨ã€ç¬¦å·é“¾æ¥åŠŸèƒ½éœ€è¦æ”¯æŒåœ¨.envæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­é…ç½®ã€‚ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤å€¼å‡ä¸ºfalseã€‚ 11. é‡‡ç”¨ç»Ÿä¸€é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼Œæ”¯æŒYAMLã€JSONã€TOMLä¸‰ç§é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶æ ¼å¼ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨Goæ ‡å‡†åº“è¿›è¡Œè§£æå’Œç”Ÿæˆï¼š
**é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶æ ¼å¼ï¼ˆconfig.yamlï¼‰**ï¼š ```yaml # ç»Ÿä¸€é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ - æ”¯æŒå¤šç§è¾“å‡ºæ ¼å¼ formats: xml: enabled: true structure: root: "context" file: "file" folder: "folder" files: "files" fields: path: "path" content: "content" filename: "filename"

# é€šç”¨å­—æ®µé…ç½® fields: custom_names: filepath: "path" filecontent: "content" filename: "name"
filter: include: [] # åªåŒ…å«è¿™äº›å­—æ®µï¼Œç©ºæ•°ç»„è¡¨ç¤ºåŒ…å«æ‰€æœ‰ exclude: [] # æ’é™¤è¿™äº›å­—æ®µ

# æ–‡ä»¶è¿‡æ»¤é…ç½® filters: max_file_size: "10MB" exclude_patterns: - "*.tmp" - "*.log" - "*.swp" - ".*" # éšè—æ–‡ä»¶ include_patterns: [] max_depth: 0 # 0è¡¨ç¤ºæ— é™åˆ¶ follow_symlinks: false
# è¾“å‡ºé…ç½® output: default_format: "xml" output_dir: "" # ç©ºè¡¨ç¤ºå½“å‰ç›®å½• filename_template: "context_{{.timestamp}}.{{.extension}}" timestamp_format: "20060102_150405"
# ç•Œé¢é…ç½® ui: selector: show_hidden: false show_size: true show_modified: false
autocomplete: enabled: true min_chars: 1 max_suggestions: 10 ```
**é…ç½®è¯´æ˜**ï¼š - æ”¯æŒYAMLã€JSONã€TOMLä¸‰ç§é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶æ ¼å¼ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨Goæ ‡å‡†åº“è¿›è¡Œè§£æ - ç»Ÿä¸€é…ç½®ç»“æ„ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šç§è¾“å‡ºæ ¼å¼çš„çµæ´»é…ç½® - å­—æ®µåç§°å¯è‡ªå®šä¹‰ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå­—æ®µè¿‡æ»¤å’Œå†…å®¹é¢„å¤„ç† - é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶å¯é€šè¿‡å‘½ä»¤è¡Œå‚æ•°æŒ‡å®šï¼Œæ”¯æŒè¿è¡Œæ—¶åˆ‡æ¢æ ¼å¼ - ä¿æŒä¸åŸæœ‰rule.xml/rule.jsonçš„å…¼å®¹æ€§ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¹³æ»‘è¿ç§»
**Goæ ‡å‡†åº“å¯¹é½**ï¼š - YAMLæ ¼å¼ï¼šä½¿ç”¨`github.com/goccy/go-yaml`ï¼ˆå…¼å®¹encoding/jsonæ¥å£ï¼‰ - JSONæ ¼å¼ï¼šä½¿ç”¨æ ‡å‡†åº“`encoding/json` - TOMLæ ¼å¼ï¼šä½¿ç”¨`github.com/BurntSushi/toml`ï¼ˆå…¼å®¹encoding/jsonæ¥å£ï¼‰ - XMLæ ¼å¼ï¼šä½¿ç”¨æ ‡å‡†åº“`encoding/xml`
æ”¯æŒåœ¨.envä¸­é€‰æ‹©é»˜è®¤å¯¼å‡ºæ ¼å¼ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ”¯æŒCLIå‚æ•°ä¸´æ—¶æŒ‡å®šæ ¼å¼
12. æ”¯æŒåœ¨cliç•Œé¢ä¸­ä¸´æ—¶é€‰æ‹©ä½¿ç”¨å“ªç§å¯¼å‡ºæ ¼å¼
**é…ç½®ç®¡ç†**ï¼š - æä¾›ç»Ÿä¸€çš„é…ç½®ç®¡ç†å™¨ï¼ˆconfig_manager.goï¼‰ï¼Œæ”¯æŒé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶çš„åŠ è½½ã€è§£æå’Œæ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢ - æ”¯æŒé…ç½®éªŒè¯å’Œé»˜è®¤å€¼å¤„ç† - æä¾›é…ç½®çƒ­é‡è½½åŠŸèƒ½ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼‰ - æ”¯æŒç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡è¦†ç›–é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„è®¾ç½®

file.Name: CICD-ref.md
file.Content:
## æŒç»­é›†æˆ
### 1. GitHub Actionsé…ç½®
#### .github/workflows/ci.yml ```yaml name: CI
on: push: branches: [ main, develop ] pull_request: branches: [ main ]
jobs: test: runs-on: ubuntu-latest strategy: matrix: go-version: [1.24, 1.23]
steps: - uses: actions/checkout@v3
- name: Set up Go uses: actions/setup-go@v4 with: go-version: ${{ matrix.go-version }}
- name: Cache Go modules uses: actions/cache@v3 with: path: ~/go/pkg/mod key: ${{ runner.os }}-go-${{ hashFiles('**/go.sum') }} restore-keys: | ${{ runner.os }}-go-
- name: Download dependencies run: go mod download
- name: Run tests run: go test -v -race -coverprofile=coverage.out ./...
- name: Generate coverage report run: go tool cover -html=coverage.out -o coverage.html
- name: Upload coverage to Codecov uses: codecov/codecov-action@v3 with: file: ./coverage.out
- name: Run golangci-lint uses: golangci/golangci-lint-action@v3 with: version: latest
- name: Run gosec security scanner uses: securecodewarrior/github-action-gosec@master with: args: '-no-fail -fmt sarif -out results.sarif ./...'
- name: Upload SARIF file uses: github/codeql-action/upload-sarif@v2 with: sarif_file: results.sarif
build: needs: test runs-on: ubuntu-latest
steps: - uses: actions/checkout@v3
- name: Set up Go uses: actions/setup-go@v4 with: go-version: 1.24
- name: Build CLI run: go build -v -o code-context-generator cmd/cli/main.go
- name: Build TUI run: go build -v -o code-context-generator-tui cmd/tui/main.go
- name: Test build artifacts run: | ./code-context-generator --help ./code-context-generator-tui --help || true
- name: Upload build artifacts uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3 with: name: binaries path: | code-context-generator code-context-generator-tui
release: needs: build runs-on: ubuntu-latest if: startsWith(github.ref, 'refs/tags/')
steps: - uses: actions/checkout@v3
- name: Set up Go uses: actions/setup-go@v4 with: go-version: 1.24
- name: Run GoReleaser uses: goreleaser/goreleaser-action@v4 with: version: latest args: release --rm-dist env: GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }} ```
### 2. ä»£ç è´¨é‡æ£€æŸ¥
#### golangci-linté…ç½® ```yaml # .golangci.yml run: timeout: 5m issues-exit-code: 1 tests: true
linters-settings: errcheck: check-type-assertions: true check-blank: true
govet: check-shadowing: true enable-all: true
gocyclo: min-complexity: 15
maligned: suggest-new: true
dupl: threshold: 100
goconst: min-len: 3 min-occurrences: 3
linters: enable: - bodyclose - deadcode - depguard - dogsled - dupl - errcheck - gochecknoinits - goconst - gocritic - gocyclo - gofmt - goimports - golint - gomnd - goprintffuncname - gosec - gosimple - govet - ineffassign - interfacer - lll - misspell - nakedret - rowserrcheck - scopelint - staticcheck - structcheck - stylecheck - typecheck - unconvert - unparam - unused - varcheck - whitespace
disable: - maligned # å·²è¢«govetå–ä»£
issues: exclude-rules: - path: _test\.go linters: - gocyclo - errcheck - dupl - gosec - lll ```

[output] format = "json" # è¾“å‡ºæ ¼å¼: json, xml, toml, markdown encoding = "utf-8" # æ–‡ä»¶ç¼–ç pretty = true # ç¾åŒ–è¾“å‡º output_dir = "./output" # è¾“å‡ºç›®å½• filename_template = "context_{{.Timestamp}}.{{.Format}}" # æ–‡ä»¶åæ¨¡æ¿

# Python "*.pyc", "*.pyo", "*.pyd", "__pycache__", "*.egg-info", ".pytest_cache",
# Node.js "node_modules", "npm-debug.log", "yarn-error.log", ".npm", ".yarn",
# ç‰ˆæœ¬æ§åˆ¶ ".git", ".svn", ".hg", ".bzr", "_darcs", "CVS",
# IDEå’Œç¼–è¾‘å™¨ ".vscode", ".idea", "*.swp", "*.swo", "*~", ".DS_Store", "Thumbs.db",
# ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶ "*.tmp", "*.temp", "*.log", "*.bak", "*.backup",
# æ„å»ºç›®å½• "dist", "build", "target", "out", "bin", "obj",
# ä¾èµ–ç®¡ç† "vendor", "packages", "composer.lock", "package-lock.json",
# æ–‡æ¡£ç”Ÿæˆ "docs/_build", "site", ".tox" ]
# åŒ…å«æ¨¡å¼ (å¦‚æœæŒ‡å®šï¼Œåˆ™åªåŒ…å«åŒ¹é…çš„æ–‡ä»¶) include_patterns = []
[ui] theme = "default" # ç•Œé¢ä¸»é¢˜ show_progress = true # æ˜¾ç¤ºè¿›åº¦æ¡ show_size = true # æ˜¾ç¤ºæ–‡ä»¶å¤§å° show_date = true # æ˜¾ç¤ºä¿®æ”¹æ—¥æœŸ show_preview = true # æ˜¾ç¤ºé¢„è§ˆ auto_complete = true # è‡ªåŠ¨è¡¥å…¨ confirm_deletion = true # åˆ é™¤ç¡®è®¤
[performance] cache_enabled = true # å¯ç”¨ç¼“å­˜ cache_size = 100 # ç¼“å­˜å¤§å° memory_limit = 1073741824 # å†…å­˜é™åˆ¶ (1GB)

# ä¾èµ–ç®¡ç† "node_modules", "vendor", "packages", ".npm", ".yarn", "go.sum", "go.mod", "package-lock.json", "yarn.lock",

# Pythonç›¸å…³ "__pycache__", "*.pyc", "*.pyo", "*.pyd", ".pytest_cache", "*.egg-info", ".eggs",
# æµ‹è¯•è¦†ç›–å’ŒæŠ¥å‘Š ".coverage", "htmlcov", "coverage.xml", ".tox",

# é‡ç‚¹å…³æ³¨æºä»£ç å’Œæ–‡æ¡£æ–‡ä»¶ include_patterns = [ "*.go", "*.py", "*.js", "*.ts", "*.jsx", "*.tsx", "*.java", "*.cpp", "*.c", "*.h", "*.hpp", "*.rb", "*.php", "*.rs", "*.swift", "*.kt", "*.md", "*.txt", "*.rst", "*.adoc", "*.json", "*.yaml", "*.yml", "*.toml", "*.xml", "*.html", "*.css", "*.scss", "*.sass", "*.less", "*.sql", "*.sh", "*.bat", "*.ps1", "Makefile", "Dockerfile", "docker-compose.yml", "LICENSE", "README*", "CHANGELOG*", "CONTRIBUTING*" ]

echo. echo 5ï¸âƒ£ è‡ªå®šä¹‰å‚æ•°æ‰«æ echo ---------------- code-context-generator.exe generate -f xml -e "node_modules" -e ".git" -e "*.log" -s 1048576 -d 3 -o output\custom-scan.xml

echo âœ… å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡è„šæœ¬å·²åˆ›å»º: output\scheduled-scan.bat echo å¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ åˆ°Windowsä»»åŠ¡è®¡åˆ’ç¨‹åºä¸­å®ç°å®šæ—¶å¤‡ä»½
echo. echo ğŸ“Š ç»“æœç»Ÿè®¡ echo ========== echo ç”Ÿæˆçš„æ–‡ä»¶: dir output\*.json output\*.xml output\*.md output\*.toml 2>nul

REM å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰duå‘½ä»¤ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨æ›¿ä»£æ–¹æ¡ˆ if %errorlevel% neq 0 ( echo ä½¿ç”¨dirå‘½ä»¤æ˜¾ç¤ºæ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°: dir output\ /-C | findstr /R "^[0-9].*[0-9]$" )
echo. echo âœ¨ ç¤ºä¾‹å®Œæˆï¼ echo ============ echo ğŸ“ è¾“å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶ä¿å­˜åœ¨: output\ echo ğŸ“ æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ä¿å­˜åœ¨: output\logs\ echo. echo ğŸ’¡ æç¤º: echo - ä½¿ç”¨ '-c' å‚æ•°æŒ‡å®šé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ echo - ä½¿ç”¨ '-f' å‚æ•°æŒ‡å®šè¾“å‡ºæ ¼å¼ echo - ä½¿ç”¨ '-e' å‚æ•°æ’é™¤æ–‡ä»¶/ç›®å½• echo - ä½¿ç”¨ '-s' å‚æ•°é™åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶å¤§å° echo - ä½¿ç”¨ '-d' å‚æ•°é™åˆ¶æ‰«ææ·±åº¦ echo - ä½¿ç”¨ '--debug' å‚æ•°å¯ç”¨è°ƒè¯•æ¨¡å¼ echo. echo ğŸ“š æ›´å¤šå¸®åŠ©: echo code-context-generator.exe --help echo code-context-generator.exe generate --help echo type docs\quickstart.md

file.Name: usage-examples.sh
file.Content:
#!/bin/bash
# ä»£ç ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ç”Ÿæˆå™¨ - ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹è„šæœ¬ # è¯¥è„šæœ¬å±•ç¤ºäº†å¦‚ä½•ä½¿ç”¨ä¸åŒçš„é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶å’Œå‚æ•°
echo "ğŸš€ ä»£ç ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ç”Ÿæˆå™¨ - ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹" echo "=================================="
# æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å·²å®‰è£…å·¥å…· if ! command -v ./code-context-generator &> /dev/null; then echo "âŒ è¯·å…ˆç¼–è¯‘ä»£ç ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ç”Ÿæˆå™¨:" echo " go build -o code-context-generator cmd/cli/main.go" exit 1 fi
# åˆ›å»ºè¾“å‡ºç›®å½• mkdir -p output/logs
echo "" echo "1ï¸âƒ£ åŸºç¡€æ‰«æ - ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤é…ç½®" echo "------------------------" ./code-context-generator generate \ -o output/basic-scan.json
echo "" echo "2ï¸âƒ£ ä½¿ç”¨åŸºç¡€é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶" echo "------------------" ./code-context-generator generate \ -c examples/basic-config.toml \ -o output/basic-config-output.json
echo "" echo "3ï¸âƒ£ ç”Ÿæˆé¡¹ç›®æ–‡æ¡£ï¼ˆåŒ…å«æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹ï¼‰" echo "--------------------------------" ./code-context-generator generate \ -c examples/project-documentation.toml \ -o output/project-documentation.md
echo "" echo "4ï¸âƒ£ é«˜æ€§èƒ½æ‰«æï¼ˆé€‚åˆå¤§é¡¹ç›®ï¼‰" echo "----------------------------" ./code-context-generator generate \ -c examples/performance-optimized.toml \ -o output/fast-scan.json
echo "" echo "5ï¸âƒ£ è‡ªå®šä¹‰å‚æ•°æ‰«æ" echo "----------------" ./code-context-generator generate \ -f xml \ -e "node_modules" -e ".git" -e "*.log" \ -s 1048576 \ -d 3 \ -o output/custom-scan.xml
echo "" echo "6ï¸âƒ£ äº¤äº’å¼æ–‡ä»¶é€‰æ‹©" echo "----------------" echo "ğŸ“ è¿™å°†å¯åŠ¨äº¤äº’å¼é€‰æ‹©å™¨..." ./code-context-generator select \ -m \ -f markdown \ -o output/selected-files.md
echo "" echo "7ï¸âƒ£ ç”Ÿæˆé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶" echo "--------------" ./code-context-generator config init \ -o output/my-config.toml
echo "" echo "8ï¸âƒ£ éªŒè¯é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶" echo "--------------" ./code-context-generator config validate \ -c examples/basic-config.toml
echo "" echo "9ï¸âƒ£ æ˜¾ç¤ºå½“å‰é…ç½®" echo "--------------" ./code-context-generator config show
echo "" echo "ğŸ”Ÿ æ€§èƒ½æµ‹è¯•" echo "----------" echo "ğŸ“Š æ‰«ææ€§èƒ½æµ‹è¯•..." time ./code-context-generator generate \ -c examples/performance-optimized.toml \ -o output/performance-test.json
echo "" echo "ğŸ“‹ æ‰¹å¤„ç†ç¤ºä¾‹ - æ‰«æå¤šä¸ªç›®å½•" echo "============================="
# å®šä¹‰è¦æ‰«æçš„ç›®å½•æ•°ç»„ PROJECT_DIRS=( "src" "internal" "pkg" "cmd" )

# åˆ›å»ºæ›´å¤šæ–‡æœ¬æ–‡ä»¶ echo "è¿™æ˜¯å¦ä¸€ä¸ªæ–‡æœ¬æ–‡ä»¶" > another_text.txt echo 'function hello() { console.log("Hello"); }' > script.js
# è¿”å›ä¸Šçº§ç›®å½• cd ..

echo echo "2. æµ‹è¯•æ˜¾å¼æ’é™¤äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶:" echo " å‘½ä»¤: ./code-context-generator generate test_binary_files --exclude-binary=true -f markdown -o test_output_exclude.md" ./code-context-generator generate test_binary_files --exclude-binary=true -f markdown -o test_output_exclude.md
echo echo "3. æµ‹è¯•åŒ…å«äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶:" echo " å‘½ä»¤: ./code-context-generator generate test_binary_files --exclude-binary=false -f xml -o test_output_include.xml" ./code-context-generator generate test_binary_files --exclude-binary=false -f xml -o test_output_include.xml
echo echo "æµ‹è¯•ç»“æœåˆ†æ:" echo echo "æ£€æŸ¥è¾“å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶å¤„ç†æƒ…å†µ:" echo echo "é»˜è®¤è¾“å‡º (JSON):" grep -i "binary" test_output_default.json || echo "æœªæ‰¾åˆ°äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆç¬¦åˆé¢„æœŸï¼‰" echo echo "æ’é™¤äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶ (Markdown):" grep -i "binary" test_output_exclude.md || echo "æœªæ‰¾åˆ°äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆç¬¦åˆé¢„æœŸï¼‰" echo echo "åŒ…å«äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶ (XML):" grep -i "binary" test_output_include.xml || echo "æœªæ‰¾åˆ°äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆæ„å¤–ï¼‰"
echo echo "æ£€æŸ¥æ–‡ä»¶ç»Ÿè®¡ä¿¡æ¯:" echo "ç›®å½•ä¸­çš„æ€»æ–‡ä»¶æ•°:" ls -1 test_binary_files | wc -l echo echo "JSONè¾“å‡ºä¸­çš„æ–‡ä»¶æ•°:" grep -o '"files": [0-9]*' test_output_default.json || echo "æ— æ³•ç»Ÿè®¡" echo echo "XMLè¾“å‡ºä¸­çš„æ–‡ä»¶æ•°:" grep -c '<file>' test_output_include.xml || echo "æ— æ³•ç»Ÿè®¡"
echo echo "æµ‹è¯•å®Œæˆï¼" echo "è¾“å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶:" echo "- test_output_default.json (é»˜è®¤è¡Œä¸º)" echo "- test_output_exclude.md (æ˜¾å¼æ’é™¤äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶)" echo "- test_output_include.xml (åŒ…å«äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶)"
# æ¸…ç†æµ‹è¯•æ–‡ä»¶ echo echo "æ˜¯å¦æ¸…ç†æµ‹è¯•æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Ÿ(Y/N)" read -r cleanup if [[ "$cleanup" =~ ^[Yy]$ ]]; then rm -rf test_binary_files rm -f test_output_default.json test_output_exclude.md test_output_include.xml echo "æµ‹è¯•æ–‡ä»¶å·²æ¸…ç†ã€‚" else echo "æµ‹è¯•æ–‡ä»¶ä¿ç•™åœ¨å½“å‰ç›®å½•ã€‚" fi

// runGenerate è¿è¡Œç”Ÿæˆå‘½ä»¤
func runGenerate(cmd *cobra.Command, args []string) error {
	// è·å–è·¯å¾„
	path := "."
	if len(args) > 0 {
		path = args[0]
	}

	// è§£ææ ‡å¿—
	output, _ := cmd.Flags().GetString("output")
	format, _ := cmd.Flags().GetString("format")
	exclude, _ := cmd.Flags().GetStringSlice("exclude")
	include, _ := cmd.Flags().GetStringSlice("include")
	recursive, _ := cmd.Flags().GetBool("recursive")
	hidden, _ := cmd.Flags().GetBool("hidden")
	maxDepth, _ := cmd.Flags().GetInt("max-depth")
	maxSize, _ := cmd.Flags().GetInt("max-size")
	content, _ := cmd.Flags().GetBool("content")
	hash, _ := cmd.Flags().GetBool("hash")
	excludeBinary, _ := cmd.Flags().GetBool("exclude-binary")

	// éªŒè¯æ ¼å¼
	if !isValidFormat(format) {
		return fmt.Errorf("æ— æ•ˆçš„è¾“å‡ºæ ¼å¼: %s", format)
	}

	// åˆ›å»ºæ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿéå†å™¨
	walker := filesystem.NewFileSystemWalker(types.WalkOptions{})

	// å¦‚æœé€’å½’é€‰é¡¹è¢«ç¦ç”¨ï¼Œè®¾ç½®æœ€å¤§æ·±åº¦ä¸º1
	if !recursive && maxDepth == 0 {
		maxDepth = 1
	}

	// æ‰§è¡Œéå†
	if verbose {
		fmt.Printf("æ­£åœ¨æ‰«æè·¯å¾„: %s (é€’å½’: %v)\n", path, recursive)
	}

	// åˆ›å»ºéå†é€‰é¡¹
	walkOptions := &types.WalkOptions{
		MaxDepth: maxDepth,
		MaxFileSize: int64(maxSize),
		ExcludePatterns: exclude,
		IncludePatterns: include,
		FollowSymlinks: false,
		ShowHidden: hidden,
		ExcludeBinary: excludeBinary,
	}

	result, err := walker.Walk(path, walkOptions)
	if err != nil {
		return fmt.Errorf("æ‰«æå¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}

	if verbose {
		fmt.Printf("æ‰«æå®Œæˆ: %d ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶, %d ä¸ªç›®å½•\n", result.FileCount, result.FolderCount)
	}

	// åˆ›å»ºæ ¼å¼åŒ–å™¨
	formatter, err := formatter.NewFormatter(format)
	if err != nil {
		return fmt.Errorf("åˆ›å»ºæ ¼å¼åŒ–å™¨å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}

	// ContextData å·²ç»åŒ…å«äº†æ‰€æœ‰éœ€è¦çš„ä¿¡æ¯
	// åˆå§‹åŒ–metadata mapå¹¶æ·»åŠ æ ¹è·¯å¾„
	if result.Metadata == nil {
		result.Metadata = make(map[string]interface{})
	}
	result.Metadata["root_path"] = path
	contextData := *result

	// æ ¼å¼åŒ–è¾“å‡º
	outputData, err := formatter.Format(contextData)
	if err != nil {
		return fmt.Errorf("æ ¼å¼åŒ–è¾“å‡ºå¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}

	// æ·»åŠ é¢å¤–ä¿¡æ¯
	if content || hash {
		// åˆ›å»º WalkResult ç”¨äº addFileContent
		walkResult := &types.WalkResult{
			Files: result.Files,
			Folders: result.Folders,
			FileCount: result.FileCount,
			FolderCount: result.FolderCount,
			TotalSize: result.TotalSize,
			RootPath: path,
		}
		outputData = addFileContent(outputData, walkResult, content, hash)
	}

	// è¾“å‡ºç»“æœ
	if output != "" {
		if err := os.WriteFile(output, []byte(outputData), 0644); err != nil {
			return fmt.Errorf("å†™å…¥è¾“å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
		}
		if verbose {
			fmt.Println(utils.SuccessColor("è¾“å‡ºå·²å†™å…¥:"), output)
		}
	} else {
		fmt.Println(outputData)
	}

	return nil
}

// runSelect è¿è¡Œé€‰æ‹©å‘½ä»¤
func runSelect(cmd *cobra.Command, args []string) error {
	// è·å–è·¯å¾„
	path := "."
	if len(args) > 0 {
		path = args[0]
	}

	// è§£ææ ‡å¿—
	output, _ := cmd.Flags().GetString("output")
	format, _ := cmd.Flags().GetString("format")
	multi, _ := cmd.Flags().GetBool("multi")
	filter, _ := cmd.Flags().GetString("filter")

	// åˆ›å»ºé€‰æ‹©å™¨é…ç½®
	config := &types.Config{
		FileProcessing: types.FileProcessingConfig{
			IncludeHidden: false,
		},
	}
	fileSelector := selector.NewFileSelector(config)

	// æ‰§è¡Œé€‰æ‹©
	if verbose {
		fmt.Printf("å¯åŠ¨äº¤äº’å¼é€‰æ‹©å™¨... (å¤šé€‰: %v, è¿‡æ»¤å™¨: %s)\n", multi, filter)
	}

	// é€‰æ‹©æ–‡ä»¶å’Œç›®å½•
	selectOptions := &types.SelectOptions{
		Recursive: true,
		ShowHidden: false,
		MaxDepth: 0,
		IncludePatterns: []string{},
		ExcludePatterns: []string{},
	}

	files, err := fileSelector.SelectFiles(path, selectOptions)
	if err != nil {
		return fmt.Errorf("é€‰æ‹©æ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}

	folders, err := fileSelector.SelectFolders(path, selectOptions)
	if err != nil {
		return fmt.Errorf("é€‰æ‹©ç›®å½•å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}

	// åˆå¹¶é€‰æ‹©ç»“æœ
	allItems := append(files, folders...)

	// äº¤äº’å¼é€‰æ‹©
	selected, err := fileSelector.InteractiveSelect(allItems, "é€‰æ‹©æ–‡ä»¶å’Œç›®å½•:")
	if err != nil {
		return fmt.Errorf("é€‰æ‹©å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}

	if len(selected) == 0 {
		fmt.Println("æœªé€‰æ‹©ä»»ä½•æ–‡ä»¶")
		return nil
	}

	if verbose {
		fmt.Printf("å·²é€‰æ‹© %d ä¸ªé¡¹ç›®\n", len(selected))
	}

	// åˆ›å»ºç»“æœ
	result := &types.WalkResult{
		Files: []types.FileInfo{},
		Folders: []types.FolderInfo{},
		RootPath: path,
	}

	// æ·»åŠ é€‰æ‹©çš„æ–‡ä»¶å’Œç›®å½•
	for _, item := range selected {
		info, err := os.Stat(item)
		if err != nil {
			continue
		}

		if info.IsDir() {
			result.Folders = append(result.Folders, types.FolderInfo{
				Path: item,
				Name: info.Name(),
				Size: 0,
				Count: 0,
			})
		} else {
			result.Files = append(result.Files, types.FileInfo{
				Path: item,
				Name: info.Name(),
				Size: info.Size(),
				ModTime: info.ModTime(),
				IsBinary: utils.IsBinaryFile(item),
			})
		}
	}

	// æ›´æ–°ç»Ÿè®¡ä¿¡æ¯
	result.FileCount = len(result.Files)
	result.FolderCount = len(result.Folders)

	// åˆ›å»ºæ ¼å¼åŒ–å™¨
	formatter, err := formatter.NewFormatter(format)
	if err != nil {
		return fmt.Errorf("åˆ›å»ºæ ¼å¼åŒ–å™¨å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}

	// å°† WalkResult è½¬æ¢ä¸º ContextData
	contextData := types.ContextData{
		Files: result.Files,
		Folders: result.Folders,
		FileCount: result.FileCount,
		FolderCount: result.FolderCount,
		TotalSize: result.TotalSize,
		Metadata: make(map[string]interface{}),
	}

	// æ ¼å¼åŒ–è¾“å‡º
	outputData, err := formatter.Format(contextData)
	if err != nil {
		return fmt.Errorf("æ ¼å¼åŒ–è¾“å‡ºå¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}

	// è¾“å‡ºç»“æœ
	if output != "" {
		if err := os.WriteFile(output, []byte(outputData), 0644); err != nil {
			return fmt.Errorf("å†™å…¥è¾“å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
		}
		if verbose {
			fmt.Println(utils.SuccessColor("è¾“å‡ºå·²å†™å…¥:"), output)
		}
	} else {
		fmt.Println(outputData)
	}

	return nil
}

func runConfigInit(cmd *cobra.Command, args []string) error {

// runAutocomplete è¿è¡Œè‡ªåŠ¨è¡¥å…¨å‘½ä»¤
func runAutocomplete(cmd *cobra.Command, args []string) error {
	// è·å–è·¯å¾„
	path := ""
	if len(args) > 0 {
		path = args[0]
	}

	// è§£ææ ‡å¿—
	limit, _ := cmd.Flags().GetInt("limit")
	completeType, _ := cmd.Flags().GetString("type")

	// åˆ›å»ºè‡ªåŠ¨è¡¥å…¨å™¨
	autocompleter := autocomplete.NewAutocompleter(&types.AutocompleteConfig{
		Enabled: true,
		MinChars: 1,
		MaxSuggestions: limit,
	})

	// è·å–å»ºè®®
	completeTypeEnum := types.CompleteFilePath
	switch completeType {
	case "dir":
		completeTypeEnum = types.CompleteDirectory
	case "ext":
		completeTypeEnum = types.CompleteExtension
	case "pattern":
		completeTypeEnum = types.CompletePattern
	case "generic":
		completeTypeEnum = types.CompleteGeneric
	}

	context := &types.CompleteContext{
		Type: completeTypeEnum,
		Data: make(map[string]interface{}),
	}
	suggestions, err := autocompleter.Complete(path, context)
	if err != nil {
		return fmt.Errorf("è‡ªåŠ¨è¡¥å…¨å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}

	// è¾“å‡ºå»ºè®®
	for _, suggestion := range suggestions {
		fmt.Println(suggestion)
	}

	return nil
}

// isValidFormat æ£€æŸ¥æ ¼å¼æ˜¯å¦æœ‰æ•ˆ
func isValidFormat(format string) bool {
	validFormats := []string{"json", "xml", "toml", "markdown", "md"}
	for _, valid := range validFormats {
		if format == valid {
			return true
		}
	}
	return false
}

// addFileContent æ·»åŠ æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹
func addFileContent(outputData string, _ *types.WalkResult, includeContent, includeHash bool) string {
	// å¦‚æœä¸éœ€è¦åŒ…å«å†…å®¹å’Œå“ˆå¸Œï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›åŸå§‹æ•°æ®
	if !includeContent && !includeHash {
		return outputData
	}

	// è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®éœ€è¦æ·»åŠ æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹å’Œå“ˆå¸Œå¤„ç†é€»è¾‘
	// ç›®å‰ä¿æŒç®€åŒ–å®ç°ï¼Œåç»­å¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®å…·ä½“éœ€æ±‚æ‰©å±•
	if verbose {
		fmt.Println(utils.InfoColor("æ³¨æ„: æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹å’Œå“ˆå¸ŒåŠŸèƒ½æš‚æœªå®Œå…¨å®ç°"))
	}

	return outputData
}

// generateConfigOutput ç”Ÿæˆé…ç½®è¾“å‡º
func generateConfigOutput(cfg *types.Config) string {
	var output strings.Builder

	output.WriteString("å½“å‰é…ç½®:\n")
	output.WriteString("==================\n\n")

	output.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("é»˜è®¤æ ¼å¼: %s\n", cfg.Output.DefaultFormat))
	output.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("è¾“å‡ºç›®å½•: %s\n", cfg.Output.OutputDir))
	output.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("æ–‡ä»¶åæ¨¡æ¿: %s\n", cfg.Output.FilenameTemplate))

	output.WriteString("\næ–‡ä»¶å¤„ç†:\n")
	output.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" æœ€å¤§æ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°: %s\n", cfg.Filters.MaxFileSize))
	output.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" æœ€å¤§æ·±åº¦: %d\n", cfg.Filters.MaxDepth))
	output.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" è·Ÿéšç¬¦å·é“¾æ¥: %v\n", cfg.Filters.FollowSymlinks))
	output.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" æ’é™¤äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶: %v\n", cfg.Filters.ExcludeBinary))

	if len(cfg.Filters.ExcludePatterns) > 0 {
		output.WriteString(" æ’é™¤æ¨¡å¼:\n")
		for _, pattern := range cfg.Filters.ExcludePatterns {
			output.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" - %s\n", pattern))
		}
	}

	if len(cfg.Filters.IncludePatterns) > 0 {
		output.WriteString(" åŒ…å«æ¨¡å¼:\n")
		for _, pattern := range cfg.Filters.IncludePatterns {
			output.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" - %s\n", pattern))
		}
	}

	return output.String()
}

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"os"
	"strings"
	"time"

	"code-context-generator/cmd/tui/models"
	"code-context-generator/internal/config"
	"code-context-generator/internal/env"
	"code-context-generator/internal/filesystem"
	"code-context-generator/pkg/types"

	tea "github.com/charmbracelet/bubbletea"
)

var (
	cfg *types.Config
	configPath string
	version = "1.0.0"
)

// AppState åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºçŠ¶æ€
type AppState int

const (
	StateInit AppState = iota
	StateInput
	StateSelect
	StateProcessing
	StateResult
	StateConfig
	StateError
)

// ViewType è§†å›¾ç±»å‹
type ViewType int

const (
	ViewMain ViewType = iota
	ViewSelect
	ViewProgress
	ViewResult
	ViewConfig
)

// MainModel ä¸»æ¨¡å‹
type MainModel struct {
	state AppState
	currentView ViewType
	pathInput string
	outputFormat string
	outputPath string
	excludePatterns []string
	includePatterns []string
	options types.WalkOptions
	result *types.WalkResult
	err error
	width int
	height int
	// å­æ¨¡å‹
	fileSelector *models.FileSelectorModel
	progressBar *models.ProgressModel
	resultViewer *models.ResultViewerModel
	configEditor *models.ConfigEditorModel
}

// åˆå§‹åŒ–å‡½æ•°
func init() {
	// é¦–å…ˆåŠ è½½.envæ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆå¦‚æœå­˜åœ¨ï¼‰
	if err := env.LoadEnv(""); err != nil {
		fmt.Printf("è­¦å‘Š: åŠ è½½.envæ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥: %v\n", err)
	}

	// åˆå§‹åŒ–é…ç½®ç®¡ç†å™¨
	configManager := config.NewManager()
	
	// å°è¯•åŠ è½½é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸å­˜åœ¨åˆ™ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤é…ç½®
	if err := configManager.Load("config.yaml"); err != nil {
		// ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤é…ç½®
		fmt.Printf("ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤é…ç½®: %v\n", err)
	}
	
	cfg = configManager.Get()
	models.SetConfig(cfg)
}

// main ä¸»å‡½æ•°
func main() {
	// åˆå§‹åŒ–æ¨¡å‹
	m := initialModel()

	// åˆ›å»ºteaç¨‹åº
	p := tea.NewProgram(m, tea.WithAltScreen())

	// è¿è¡Œç¨‹åº
	if _, err := p.Run(); err != nil {
		fmt.Printf("Error running program: %v", err)
		os.Exit(1)
	}
}

// initialModel åˆ›å»ºåˆå§‹æ¨¡å‹
func initialModel() MainModel {
	return MainModel{
		state: StateInit,
		currentView: ViewMain,
		pathInput: ".",
		outputFormat: "json",
		outputPath: "",
		excludePatterns: []string{},
		includePatterns: []string{},
		options: types.WalkOptions{
			MaxDepth: 1,
			MaxFileSize: 10 * 1024 * 1024,
			ExcludePatterns: []string{},
			IncludePatterns: []string{},
			FollowSymlinks: false,
			ShowHidden: false,
		},
	// åˆ›å»ºåˆå§‹æ¨¡å‹
	fileSelector: models.NewFileSelectorModel("."),
	progressBar: models.NewProgressModel(),
	resultViewer: models.NewResultViewerModel(),
	configEditor: models.NewConfigEditorModel(cfg),
	}
}

// Init åˆå§‹åŒ–
func (m MainModel) Init() tea.Cmd {
	// åˆå§‹åŒ–æ—¶ä¸éœ€è¦åšä»»ä½•ç‰¹æ®Šæ“ä½œ
	return nil
}

// Update æ›´æ–°æ¨¡å‹
func (m MainModel) Update(msg tea.Msg) (tea.Model, tea.Cmd) {
	switch msg := msg.(type) {
	case tea.KeyMsg:
		return m.handleKeyMsg(msg)
	case tea.WindowSizeMsg:
		m.width = msg.Width
		m.height = msg.Height
		return m, nil
	case *models.ProgressMsg:
		if m.progressBar != nil {
			m.progressBar.SetProgress(msg.Progress)
			m.progressBar.SetStatus(msg.Status)
		}
		return m, nil
	case *models.ResultMsg:
		m.result = msg.Result
		m.state = StateResult
		m.currentView = ViewResult
		if m.resultViewer != nil {
			m.resultViewer.SetResult(m.result)
		}
		return m, nil
	case *models.ErrorMsg:
		m.err = msg.Err
		m.state = StateError
		return m, nil
	case *models.FileSelectionMsg:
		m.options.IncludePatterns = msg.Selected
		m.state = StateInput
		m.currentView = ViewMain
		return m, nil
	case *models.ConfigUpdateMsg:
		cfg = msg.Config
		m.state = StateInput
		m.currentView = ViewMain
		return m, nil
	default:
		// æ›´æ–°å­æ¨¡å‹
		switch m.currentView {
		case ViewSelect:
			if m.fileSelector != nil {
				newModel, cmd := m.fileSelector.Update(msg)
				m.fileSelector = newModel.(*models.FileSelectorModel)
				return m, cmd
			}
		case ViewProgress:
			if m.progressBar != nil {
				newModel, cmd := m.progressBar.Update(msg)
				m.progressBar = newModel.(*models.ProgressModel)
				return m, cmd
			}
		case ViewResult:
			if m.resultViewer != nil {
				newModel, cmd := m.resultViewer.Update(msg)
				m.resultViewer = newModel.(*models.ResultViewerModel)
				return m, cmd
			}
		case ViewConfig:
			if m.configEditor != nil {
				newModel, cmd := m.configEditor.Update(msg)
				m.configEditor = newModel.(*models.ConfigEditorModel)
				return m, cmd
			}
		}
	}

	return m, nil
}

// View æ¸²æŸ“è§†å›¾
func (m MainModel) View() string {
	if m.err != nil {
		return m.renderError()
	}

	switch m.currentView {
	case ViewMain:
		return m.renderMainView()
	case ViewSelect:
		if m.fileSelector != nil {
			return m.fileSelector.View()
		}
	case ViewProgress:
		if m.progressBar != nil {
			return m.progressBar.View()
		}
	case ViewResult:
		if m.resultViewer != nil {
			return m.resultViewer.View()
		}
	case ViewConfig:
		if m.configEditor != nil {
			return m.configEditor.View()
		}
	}

	return "æœªçŸ¥è§†å›¾"
}

// handleKeyMsg å¤„ç†é”®ç›˜æ¶ˆæ¯
func (m MainModel) handleKeyMsg(msg tea.KeyMsg) (tea.Model, tea.Cmd) {
	// å…¨å±€é€€å‡ºå¿«æ·é”®
	if msg.String() == "ctrl+c" {
		return m, tea.Quit
	}

	// ESCé”®è¿”å›ä¸Šä¸€çº§
	if msg.String() == "esc" {
		return m.handleEscKey()
	}

	switch m.state {
	case StateInit, StateInput:
		return m.handleMainKeys(msg)
	case StateError:
		return m.handleErrorKeys(msg)
	case StateSelect:
		return m.handleSelectKeys(msg)
	case StateProcessing:
		return m.handleProcessingKeys(msg)
	case StateResult:
		return m.handleResultKeys(msg)
	case StateConfig:
		return m.handleConfigKeys(msg)
	default:
		return m, nil
	}
}

// handleMainKeys å¤„ç†ä¸»ç•Œé¢æŒ‰é”®
func (m MainModel) handleMainKeys(msg tea.KeyMsg) (tea.Model, tea.Cmd) {
	switch msg.String() {
	case "q": // ä»…åœ¨ä¸»ç•Œé¢æŒ‰qé€€å‡º
		return m, tea.Quit
	case "enter":
		return m.startProcessing()
	case "s":
		m.state = StateSelect
		m.currentView = ViewSelect
		// é‡æ–°åˆå§‹åŒ–æ–‡ä»¶é€‰æ‹©å™¨ä»¥ç¡®ä¿åŠ è½½æ–‡ä»¶åˆ—è¡¨
		if m.fileSelector != nil {
			return m, m.fileSelector.Init()
		}
		return m, nil
	case "c":
		m.state = StateConfig
		m.currentView = ViewConfig
		return m, nil
	case "r":
		if m.options.MaxDepth == 0 {
			m.options.MaxDepth = 1
		} else {
			m.options.MaxDepth = 0
		}
		return m, nil
	case "h":
		m.options.ShowHidden = !m.options.ShowHidden
		return m, nil
	case "tab":
		// åˆ‡æ¢ç„¦ç‚¹
		return m, nil
	case "up", "down":
		// å¯¼èˆª
		return m, nil
	default:
		// å¤„ç†è¾“å…¥
		if m.state == StateInput {
			return m.handleInput(msg)
		}
	}

	return m, nil
}

// handleErrorKeys å¤„ç†é”™è¯¯ç•Œé¢æŒ‰é”®
func (m MainModel) handleErrorKeys(msg tea.KeyMsg) (tea.Model, tea.Cmd) {
	switch msg.String() {
	case "esc", "enter":
		m.state = StateInput
		m.err = nil
		return m, nil
	}
	return m, nil
}

// handleEscKey å¤„ç†ESCé”®è¿”å›ä¸Šä¸€çº§
func (m MainModel) handleEscKey() (tea.Model, tea.Cmd) {
	switch m.state {
	case StateSelect:
		// ä»æ–‡ä»¶é€‰æ‹©å™¨è¿”å›ä¸»ç•Œé¢
		m.state = StateInput
		m.currentView = ViewMain
		return m, nil
	case StateConfig:
		// ä»é…ç½®ç¼–è¾‘å™¨è¿”å›ä¸»ç•Œé¢
		m.state = StateInput
		m.currentView = ViewMain
		return m, nil
	case StateResult:
		// ä»ç»“æœæŸ¥çœ‹å™¨è¿”å›ä¸»ç•Œé¢
		m.state = StateInput
		m.currentView = ViewMain
		return m, nil
	case StateProcessing:
		// å¤„ç†ä¸­ä¸å…è®¸è¿”å›ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å–æ¶ˆå¤„ç†
		return m, nil
	case StateError:
		// é”™è¯¯çŠ¶æ€å·²ç»åœ¨handleErrorKeysä¸­å¤„ç†
		return m, nil
	default:
		// ä¸»ç•Œé¢æŒ‰ESCä¹Ÿé€€å‡º
		return m, tea.Quit
	}
}

// handleSelectKeys å¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶é€‰æ‹©å™¨æŒ‰é”®
func (m MainModel) handleSelectKeys(msg tea.KeyMsg) (tea.Model, tea.Cmd) {
	// æ–‡ä»¶é€‰æ‹©å™¨çš„æŒ‰é”®å¤„ç†åœ¨FileSelectorModelä¸­
	// å°†æŒ‰é”®ä¼ é€’ç»™æ–‡ä»¶é€‰æ‹©å™¨å¤„ç†
	if m.fileSelector != nil {
		newModel, cmd := m.fileSelector.Update(msg)
		m.fileSelector = newModel.(*models.FileSelectorModel)
		return m, cmd
	}
	return m, nil
}

// handleProcessingKeys å¤„ç†å¤„ç†ä¸­æŒ‰é”®
func (m MainModel) handleProcessingKeys(msg tea.KeyMsg) (tea.Model, tea.Cmd) {
	switch msg.String() {
	case "c": // å–æ¶ˆå¤„ç†
		// è¿™é‡Œåº”è¯¥å®ç°å–æ¶ˆé€»è¾‘
		m.state = StateInput
		m.currentView = ViewMain
		return m, nil
	}
	return m, nil
}

// handleResultKeys å¤„ç†ç»“æœæŸ¥çœ‹å™¨æŒ‰é”®
func (m MainModel) handleResultKeys(msg tea.KeyMsg) (tea.Model, tea.Cmd) {
	switch msg.String() {
	case "b": // è¿”å›ä¸»ç•Œé¢
		m.state = StateInput
		m.currentView = ViewMain
		return m, nil
	case "s": // ä¿å­˜ç»“æœ
		// è¿™é‡Œåº”è¯¥å®ç°ä¿å­˜é€»è¾‘
		return m, nil
	case "tab", "up", "down", "k", "j":
		// è¿™äº›æŒ‰é”®åº”è¯¥ä¼ é€’ç»™ç»“æœæŸ¥çœ‹å™¨å¤„ç†
		if m.resultViewer != nil {
			newModel, cmd := m.resultViewer.Update(msg)
			m.resultViewer = newModel.(*models.ResultViewerModel)
			return m, cmd
		}
	}
	return m, nil
}

// handleConfigKeys å¤„ç†é…ç½®ç¼–è¾‘å™¨æŒ‰é”®
func (m MainModel) handleConfigKeys(_ tea.KeyMsg) (tea.Model, tea.Cmd) {
	// é…ç½®ç¼–è¾‘å™¨çš„æŒ‰é”®å¤„ç†åœ¨ConfigEditorModelä¸­
	// è¿™é‡Œåªå¤„ç†ESCé”®ï¼Œå·²ç»ç”±handleEscKeyå¤„ç†
	return m, nil
}

// handleInput å¤„ç†è¾“å…¥
func (m MainModel) handleInput(msg tea.KeyMsg) (tea.Model, tea.Cmd) {
	switch msg.String() {
	case "backspace":
		if len(m.pathInput) > 0 {
			m.pathInput = m.pathInput[:len(m.pathInput)-1]
		}
	default:
		if len(msg.String()) == 1 {
			m.pathInput += msg.String()
		}
	}
	m.options.MaxDepth = 0
	if m.pathInput != "." {
		m.options.MaxDepth = 1
	}
	return m, nil
}

// startProcessing å¼€å§‹å¤„ç†
func (m MainModel) startProcessing() (tea.Model, tea.Cmd) {
	m.state = StateProcessing
	m.currentView = ViewProgress

	return m, tea.Batch(
		tea.Tick(0, func(time.Time) tea.Msg {
			return models.ProgressMsg{Progress: 0, Status: "å¼€å§‹æ‰«æ..."}
		}),
		m.processFiles(),
	)
}

// processFiles å¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶
func (m MainModel) processFiles() tea.Cmd {
	return func() tea.Msg {
		// åˆ›å»ºæ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿéå†å™¨
		walker := filesystem.NewWalker()
		
		// è®¾ç½®éå†é€‰é¡¹
		options := &types.WalkOptions{
			MaxDepth: m.options.MaxDepth,
			MaxFileSize: m.options.MaxFileSize,
			ExcludePatterns: m.options.ExcludePatterns,
			IncludePatterns: m.options.IncludePatterns,
			FollowSymlinks: m.options.FollowSymlinks,
			ShowHidden: m.options.ShowHidden,
		}
		
		// æ‰§è¡Œæ–‡ä»¶éå†
		contextData, err := walker.Walk(m.pathInput, options)
		if err != nil {
			return models.ErrorMsg{Err: fmt.Errorf("æ–‡ä»¶éå†å¤±è´¥: %w", err)}
		}
		
		// è½¬æ¢ä¸ºWalkResultæ ¼å¼
		result := &types.WalkResult{
			Files: contextData.Files,
			Folders: contextData.Folders,
			FileCount: len(contextData.Files),
			FolderCount: len(contextData.Folders),
			TotalSize: 0, // å°†åœ¨ä¸‹é¢è®¡ç®—
		}
		
		// è®¡ç®—æ€»å¤§å°
		for _, file := range contextData.Files {
			result.TotalSize += file.Size
		}
		
		return models.ResultMsg{Result: result}
	}
}

// renderMainView æ¸²æŸ“ä¸»è§†å›¾
func (m MainModel) renderMainView() string {
	var content strings.Builder

	// æ ‡é¢˜
	content.WriteString(models.TitleStyle.Render("ä»£ç ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ç”Ÿæˆå™¨"))
	content.WriteString("\n\n")

	// è·¯å¾„è¾“å…¥
	content.WriteString(models.NormalStyle.Render("æ‰«æè·¯å¾„: "))
	content.WriteString(m.pathInput)
	content.WriteString("\n\n")

	// é€‰é¡¹
	content.WriteString(models.NormalStyle.Render("é€‰é¡¹:\n"))
	recursive := "å¦"
	if m.options.MaxDepth != 0 {
		recursive = "æ˜¯"
	}
	content.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("\n é€’å½’æ‰«æ: %s (æŒ‰ r åˆ‡æ¢)\n", recursive))

	hidden := "å¦"
	if m.options.ShowHidden {
		hidden = "æ˜¯"
	}
	content.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" åŒ…å«éšè—æ–‡ä»¶: %s (æŒ‰ h åˆ‡æ¢)\n", hidden))

	content.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" è¾“å‡ºæ ¼å¼: %s\n", m.outputFormat))

	if m.outputPath != "" {
		content.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" è¾“å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶: %s\n", m.outputPath))
	}

	content.WriteString("\n")

	// æ“ä½œæç¤º
	content.WriteString(models.HelpStyle.Render("æ“ä½œ:\n"))
	content.WriteString("\n Enter - å¼€å§‹æ‰«æ\n")
	content.WriteString(" s - é€‰æ‹©æ–‡ä»¶\n")
	content.WriteString(" c - é…ç½®è®¾ç½®\n")
	content.WriteString(" ESC - é€€å‡ºç¨‹åº\n")
	content.WriteString(" Ctrl+C - å¼ºåˆ¶é€€å‡º\n")

	return content.String()
}

// renderError æ¸²æŸ“é”™è¯¯è§†å›¾
func (m MainModel) renderError() string {
	var content strings.Builder

	content.WriteString(models.ErrorStyle.Render("é”™è¯¯:\n"))
	content.WriteString(m.err.Error())
	content.WriteString("\n\n")
	content.WriteString(models.HelpStyle.Render("æŒ‰ Esc æˆ– Enter è¿”å›"))

	return content.String()
}

// getDefaultConfig è·å–é»˜è®¤é…ç½®
func getDefaultConfig() *types.Config {
	return &types.Config{
		Output: types.OutputConfig{
			Format: "json",
			Encoding: "utf-8",
		},
		FileProcessing: types.FileProcessingConfig{
			IncludeHidden: false,
			MaxFileSize: 10 * 1024 * 1024,
			MaxDepth: 0,
			ExcludePatterns: []string{
				"*.exe", "*.dll", "*.so", "*.dylib",
				"*.pyc", "*.pyo", "*.pyd",
				"node_modules", ".git", ".svn",
			},
			IncludePatterns: []string{},
			IncludeContent: false,
			IncludeHash: false,
		},
		UI: types.UIConfig{
			Theme: "default",
			ShowProgress: true,
			ShowSize: true,
			ShowDate: true,
			ShowPreview: true,
		},
		Performance: types.PerformanceConfig{
			MaxWorkers: 4,
			BufferSize: 1024,
			CacheEnabled: true,
			CacheSize: 100,
		},
		Logging: types.LoggingConfig{
			Level: "info",
			MaxSize: 10,
			MaxBackups: 3,
			MaxAge: 7,
		},
	}
}

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"

	"code-context-generator/pkg/types"
	tea "github.com/charmbracelet/bubbletea"
)

// ConfigEditorModel é…ç½®ç¼–è¾‘å™¨æ¨¡å‹
type ConfigEditorModel struct {
	config *types.Config
	currentTab int
	width int
	height int
	focus int
}

// NewConfigEditorModel åˆ›å»ºé…ç½®ç¼–è¾‘å™¨æ¨¡å‹
func NewConfigEditorModel(config *types.Config) *ConfigEditorModel {
	return &ConfigEditorModel{
		config: config,
		focus: 0,
	}
}

// Init åˆå§‹åŒ–
func (m *ConfigEditorModel) Init() tea.Cmd {
	return nil
}

// Update æ›´æ–°æ¨¡å‹
func (m *ConfigEditorModel) Update(msg tea.Msg) (tea.Model, tea.Cmd) {
	switch msg := msg.(type) {
	case tea.KeyMsg:
		switch msg.String() {
		case "ctrl+c", "q":
			return m, tea.Quit
		case "esc":
			return m, func() tea.Msg {
				return ConfigUpdateMsg{Config: m.config}
			}
		case "tab":
			m.currentTab = (m.currentTab + 1) % 4 // å‡è®¾æœ‰4ä¸ªé…ç½®æ ‡ç­¾é¡µ
		case "up", "k":
			m.focus--
			if m.focus < 0 {
				m.focus = 0
			}
		case "down", "j":
			m.focus++
		case "enter":
			// ç¼–è¾‘å½“å‰é¡¹
			return m, nil
		case "s":
			// ä¿å­˜é…ç½®
			return m, m.saveConfig()
		}
	case tea.WindowSizeMsg:
		m.width = msg.Width
		m.height = msg.Height
	}
	return m, nil
}

// View æ¸²æŸ“è§†å›¾
func (m *ConfigEditorModel) View() string {
	var content strings.Builder

	// æ ‡é¢˜
	content.WriteString(TitleStyle.Render("é…ç½®ç¼–è¾‘å™¨"))
	content.WriteString("\n\n")

	// æ ‡ç­¾é¡µ
	tabs := []string{"è¾“å‡º", "æ–‡ä»¶å¤„ç†", "UI", "æ€§èƒ½"}
	for i, tab := range tabs {
		if i == m.currentTab {
			content.WriteString(SelectedStyle.Render(fmt.Sprintf("[%s]", tab)))
		} else {
			content.WriteString(NormalStyle.Render(fmt.Sprintf(" %s ", tab)))
		}
		content.WriteString(" ")
	}
	content.WriteString("\n\n")

	// å†…å®¹
	switch m.currentTab {
	case 0: // è¾“å‡º
		content.WriteString(m.renderOutputConfig())
	case 1: // æ–‡ä»¶å¤„ç†
		content.WriteString(m.renderFileProcessingConfig())
	case 2: // UI
		content.WriteString(m.renderUIConfig())
	case 3: // æ€§èƒ½
		content.WriteString(m.renderPerformanceConfig())
	}

	// å¸®åŠ©ä¿¡æ¯
	content.WriteString("\n")
	content.WriteString(HelpStyle.Render("æ“ä½œ: Tabåˆ‡æ¢æ ‡ç­¾, â†‘â†“é€‰æ‹©, Enterç¼–è¾‘, sä¿å­˜, ESCè¿”å›ä¸»ç•Œé¢"))

	return content.String()
}

	content.WriteString(NormalStyle.Render(fmt.Sprintf("æ—¶é—´æˆ³æ ¼å¼: %s\n", m.config.Output.TimestampFormat)))

	return content.String()
}

import (
	"context"
	"fmt"
	"os"
	"sort"
	"strings"
	"time"

	"code-context-generator/internal/selector"
	tea "github.com/charmbracelet/bubbletea"
	"github.com/charmbracelet/lipgloss"
)

// FileSelectorModel æ–‡ä»¶é€‰æ‹©å™¨æ¨¡å‹
type FileSelectorModel struct {
	path string
	items []selector.FileItem
	selected map[int]bool
	cursor int
	scrollOffset int
	multiSelect bool
	filter string
	height int
	width int
}

// NewFileSelectorModel åˆ›å»ºæ–‡ä»¶é€‰æ‹©å™¨æ¨¡å‹
func NewFileSelectorModel(path string) *FileSelectorModel {
	return &FileSelectorModel{
		path: path,
		items: []selector.FileItem{},
		selected: make(map[int]bool),
		cursor: 0,
		scrollOffset: 0,
		multiSelect: true,
		filter: "",
	}
}

// Init åˆå§‹åŒ–
func (m *FileSelectorModel) Init() tea.Cmd {
	return m.loadFiles()
}

// Update æ›´æ–°æ¨¡å‹
func (m *FileSelectorModel) Update(msg tea.Msg) (tea.Model, tea.Cmd) {
	switch msg := msg.(type) {
	case tea.KeyMsg:
		switch msg.String() {
		case "ctrl+c", "q":
			return m, tea.Quit
		case "esc":
			return m, func() tea.Msg {
				return FileSelectionMsg{Selected: []string{}}
			}
		case "enter":
			return m, m.confirmSelection()
		case "up", "k":
			m.moveCursor(-1)
		case "down", "j":
			m.moveCursor(1)
		case " ":
			if m.multiSelect {
				m.toggleSelection()
			}
		case "a":
			if m.multiSelect {
				m.selectAll()
			}
		case "n":
			if m.multiSelect {
				m.selectNone()
			}
		case "i":
			m.invertSelection()
		case "/":
			// è¿›å…¥æœç´¢æ¨¡å¼
			return m, nil
		}
	case tea.WindowSizeMsg:
		m.width = msg.Width
		m.height = msg.Height
		m.updateViewport()
	case FileListMsg:
		m.items = msg.Items
		m.updateViewport()
	}
	return m, nil
}

// View æ¸²æŸ“è§†å›¾
func (m *FileSelectorModel) View() string {
	if len(m.items) == 0 {
		return "æ­£åœ¨åŠ è½½æ–‡ä»¶åˆ—è¡¨..."
	}

	var content strings.Builder

	// æ ‡é¢˜
	content.WriteString(TitleStyle.Render("æ–‡ä»¶é€‰æ‹©å™¨"))
	content.WriteString("\n")

	// å½“å‰è·¯å¾„
	content.WriteString(NormalStyle.Render(fmt.Sprintf("å½“å‰è·¯å¾„: %s", m.path)))
	content.WriteString("\n")

	// åˆ†é¡µä¿¡æ¯
	visibleHeight := m.height - 6
	if visibleHeight < 3 {
		visibleHeight = 3
	}
	if visibleHeight > 20 {
		visibleHeight = 20
	}
	
	startItem := m.scrollOffset + 1
	endItem := m.scrollOffset + visibleHeight
	if endItem > len(m.items) {
		endItem = len(m.items)
	}
	
	content.WriteString(NormalStyle.Render(fmt.Sprintf("æ˜¾ç¤º: %d-%d / %d ä¸ªé¡¹ç›®", startItem, endItem, len(m.items))))
	content.WriteString("\n\n")

	// æ–‡ä»¶åˆ—è¡¨
	visibleItems := m.getVisibleItems()
	for i, item := range visibleItems {
		actualIndex := m.scrollOffset + i
		isSelected := m.selected[actualIndex]
		isCursor := actualIndex == m.cursor

		line := m.renderFileItem(item, isSelected, isCursor)
		content.WriteString(line)
		content.WriteString("\n")
	}

	// å¸®åŠ©ä¿¡æ¯
	content.WriteString("\n")
	content.WriteString(HelpStyle.Render("æ“ä½œ: â†‘â†“ç§»åŠ¨, ç©ºæ ¼é€‰æ‹©, Enterç¡®è®¤, Escå–æ¶ˆ, aå…¨é€‰, nå–æ¶ˆå…¨é€‰, iåé€‰"))

	return content.String()
}

// è¾…åŠ©æ–¹æ³•
func (m *FileSelectorModel) moveCursor(direction int) {
	if len(m.items) == 0 {
		return
	}
	
	m.cursor += direction
	if m.cursor < 0 {
		m.cursor = len(m.items) - 1 // å¾ªç¯åˆ°æœ«å°¾
	}
	if m.cursor >= len(m.items) {
		m.cursor = 0 // å¾ªç¯åˆ°å¼€å¤´
	}
	m.updateScroll()
}

func (m *FileSelectorModel) toggleSelection() {
	m.selected[m.cursor] = !m.selected[m.cursor]
}

func (m *FileSelectorModel) selectAll() {
	for i := range m.items {
		m.selected[i] = true
	}
}

func (m *FileSelectorModel) selectNone() {
	for i := range m.items {
		m.selected[i] = false
	}
}

func (m *FileSelectorModel) invertSelection() {
	for i := range m.items {
		m.selected[i] = !m.selected[i]
	}
}

func (m *FileSelectorModel) updateScroll() {
	// å¦‚æœé¡¹ç›®ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œä¸éœ€è¦æ»šåŠ¨
	if len(m.items) == 0 {
		return
	}
	
	// ç¡®ä¿å…‰æ ‡åœ¨æœ‰æ•ˆèŒƒå›´å†…
	if m.cursor < 0 {
		m.cursor = 0
	}
	if m.cursor >= len(m.items) {
		m.cursor = len(m.items) - 1
	}
	
	// è®¡ç®—å¯è§åŒºåŸŸé«˜åº¦ï¼ˆä¸getVisibleItemsä¿æŒä¸€è‡´ï¼‰
	visibleHeight := m.height - 6
	if visibleHeight < 3 {
		visibleHeight = 3
	}
	if visibleHeight > 20 {
		visibleHeight = 20
	}
	
	// ç¡®ä¿æ»šåŠ¨åç§»åœ¨æœ‰æ•ˆèŒƒå›´å†…
	if m.scrollOffset < 0 {
		m.scrollOffset = 0
	}
	maxScrollOffset := len(m.items) - visibleHeight
	if maxScrollOffset < 0 {
		maxScrollOffset = 0
	}
	if m.scrollOffset > maxScrollOffset {
		m.scrollOffset = maxScrollOffset
	}
	
	// è°ƒæ•´æ»šåŠ¨ä½ç½®ä»¥ä¿æŒå…‰æ ‡å¯è§
	if m.cursor < m.scrollOffset {
		m.scrollOffset = m.cursor
	}
	if m.cursor >= m.scrollOffset+visibleHeight {
		m.scrollOffset = m.cursor - visibleHeight + 1
	}
}

func (m *FileSelectorModel) getVisibleItems() []selector.FileItem {
	// å¦‚æœé¡¹ç›®ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œè¿”å›ç©ºåˆ‡ç‰‡
	if len(m.items) == 0 {
		return []selector.FileItem{}
	}
	
	// è®¡ç®—å¯è§åŒºåŸŸé«˜åº¦ï¼ˆå‡å»æ ‡é¢˜ã€è·¯å¾„å’Œå¸®åŠ©ä¿¡æ¯ï¼‰
	// æ ‡é¢˜1è¡Œ + è·¯å¾„1è¡Œ + åˆ†é¡µä¿¡æ¯1è¡Œ + æ–‡ä»¶åˆ—è¡¨ + å¸®åŠ©ä¿¡æ¯1è¡Œ + è¾¹è·2è¡Œ
	visibleHeight := m.height - 6
	if visibleHeight < 3 {
		visibleHeight = 3 // æœ€å°æ˜¾ç¤º3ä¸ªé¡¹ç›®
	}
	if visibleHeight > 20 {
		visibleHeight = 20 // æœ€å¤§æ˜¾ç¤º20ä¸ªé¡¹ç›®ï¼Œå®ç°åˆ†é¡µ
	}
	
	start := m.scrollOffset
	end := start + visibleHeight
	if end > len(m.items) {
		end = len(m.items)
	}
	
	// ç¡®ä¿startä¸ä¼šè¶…å‡ºèŒƒå›´
	if start >= len(m.items) {
		start = len(m.items) - visibleHeight
		if start < 0 {
			start = 0
		}
	}
	if start < 0 {
		start = 0
	}
	
	// ç¡®ä¿endä¸å°äºstart
	if end < start {
		end = start
	}
	
	return m.items[start:end]
}

func (m *FileSelectorModel) updateViewport() {
	// æ›´æ–°è§†å£å¤§å°
}

func (m *FileSelectorModel) loadFiles() tea.Cmd {
	return func() tea.Msg {
		// åˆ›å»ºè¶…æ—¶ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢æ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿæ“ä½œå¡æ­»
		ctx, cancel := context.WithTimeout(context.Background(), 5*time.Second)
		defer cancel()
		
		// ä½¿ç”¨goroutineå¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶åŠ è½½ï¼Œæ”¯æŒè¶…æ—¶
		type result struct {
			items []selector.FileItem
			err error
		}
		
		resultChan := make(chan result, 1)
		
		go func() {
			// è·å–é…ç½®
			config := GetConfig()
			showHidden := false
			if config != nil {
				showHidden = config.FileProcessing.IncludeHidden
			}
			
			// æ£€æŸ¥è·¯å¾„æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
			if _, err := os.Stat(m.path); err != nil {
				resultChan <- result{items: []selector.FileItem{}, err: fmt.Errorf("è·¯å¾„ä¸å­˜åœ¨: %s", m.path)}
				return
			}
			
			// è·å–ç›®å½•å†…å®¹
			contents, err := selector.GetDirectoryContents(m.path, showHidden)
			if err != nil {
				resultChan <- result{items: []selector.FileItem{}, err: err}
				return
			}
			
			// å°†FileInfoè½¬æ¢ä¸ºFileItem
			items := make([]selector.FileItem, 0, len(contents))
			for _, info := range contents {
				item := selector.FileItem{
					Path: info.Path,
					Name: info.Name,
					Size: info.Size,
					ModTime: info.ModTime,
					IsDir: info.IsDir,
					IsHidden: info.IsHidden,
					Icon: info.Icon,
					Type: info.Type,
					Selected: false,
				}
				items = append(items, item)
			}
			
			// è°ƒè¯•ä¿¡æ¯ï¼šè®°å½•åŠ è½½çš„æ–‡ä»¶æ•°é‡
			fmt.Printf("è°ƒè¯•: åŠ è½½äº† %d ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œæ˜¾ç¤ºéšè—æ–‡ä»¶: %v\n", len(items), showHidden)
			
			resultChan <- result{items: items, err: nil}
		}()
		
		// ç­‰å¾…ç»“æœæˆ–è¶…æ—¶
		select {
		case res := <-resultChan:
			if res.err != nil {
				return FileListMsg{Items: []selector.FileItem{}}
			}
			
			// æŒ‰åç§°æ’åº
			items := res.items
			sort.Slice(items, func(i, j int) bool {
				// ç›®å½•ä¼˜å…ˆï¼Œç„¶åæŒ‰åç§°æ’åº
				if items[i].IsDir != items[j].IsDir {
					return items[i].IsDir
				}
				return items[i].Name < items[j].Name
			})
			
			return FileListMsg{Items: items}
		case <-ctx.Done():
			// è¶…æ—¶ï¼Œè¿”å›ç©ºåˆ—è¡¨
			return FileListMsg{Items: []selector.FileItem{}}
		}
	}
}

func (m *FileSelectorModel) confirmSelection() tea.Cmd {
	return func() tea.Msg {
		var selected []string
		for i, item := range m.items {
			if m.selected[i] {
				selected = append(selected, item.Path)
			}
		}
		return FileSelectionMsg{Selected: selected}
	}
}

func (m *FileSelectorModel) renderFileItem(item selector.FileItem, isSelected, isCursor bool) string {
	var style lipgloss.Style

	if isCursor {
		style = SelectedStyle
	} else if item.IsDir {
		// ç›®å½•ä½¿ç”¨ç‰¹æ®Šçš„æ ·å¼
		style = lipgloss.NewStyle().
			Foreground(lipgloss.Color("#00BFFF")). // æ·±è“è‰²
			Bold(true)
	} else {
		style = NormalStyle
	}

	prefix := " "
	if isSelected {
		prefix = "âœ“ "
	}

	icon := getFileIcon(item.Name, item.IsDir)

	name := item.Name
	if item.IsDir {
		name += "/"
	}

	// æ˜¾ç¤ºå®Œæ•´è·¯å¾„ï¼ˆç›¸å¯¹äºå½“å‰ç›®å½•ï¼‰
	relPath := item.Path
	if strings.HasPrefix(item.Path, m.path) {
		relPath = strings.TrimPrefix(item.Path, m.path)
		if strings.HasPrefix(relPath, "/") || strings.HasPrefix(relPath, "\\") {
			relPath = relPath[1:]
		}
	}
	if relPath == "" {
		relPath = name
	} else {
		relPath = name
	}

	line := fmt.Sprintf("%s%s %s", prefix, icon, relPath)
	return style.Render(line)

import (

// ProgressModel è¿›åº¦æ¡æ¨¡å‹
type ProgressModel struct {
	progress float64
	status string
	width int
	height int
}

// NewProgressModel åˆ›å»ºè¿›åº¦æ¡æ¨¡å‹
func NewProgressModel() *ProgressModel {
	return &ProgressModel{
		progress: 0,
		status: "å‡†å¤‡ä¸­...",
	}
}

// Init åˆå§‹åŒ–
func (m *ProgressModel) Init() tea.Cmd {
	return nil
}

// Update æ›´æ–°æ¨¡å‹
func (m *ProgressModel) Update(msg tea.Msg) (tea.Model, tea.Cmd) {
	switch msg := msg.(type) {
	case tea.KeyMsg:
		switch msg.String() {
		case "ctrl+c":
			return m, tea.Quit
		}
	case tea.WindowSizeMsg:
		m.width = msg.Width
		m.height = msg.Height
	case ProgressMsg:
		m.progress = msg.Progress
		m.status = msg.Status
	}
	return m, nil
}

// View æ¸²æŸ“è§†å›¾
func (m *ProgressModel) View() string {
	var content strings.Builder

	content.WriteString(TitleStyle.Render("å¤„ç†ä¸­..."))
	content.WriteString("\n\n")

	// è¿›åº¦æ¡
	barWidth := m.width - 4
	if barWidth > 0 {
		filled := int(float64(barWidth) * m.progress)
		empty := barWidth - filled

		bar := strings.Repeat("â–ˆ", filled) + strings.Repeat("â–‘", empty)
		content.WriteString(NormalStyle.Render(fmt.Sprintf("[%s] %.1f%%", bar, m.progress*100)))
		content.WriteString("\n\n")
	}

	// çŠ¶æ€ä¿¡æ¯
	content.WriteString(NormalStyle.Render(m.status))
	content.WriteString("\n\n")

	// å¸®åŠ©ä¿¡æ¯
	content.WriteString(HelpStyle.Render("æ“ä½œ: Ctrl+C å–æ¶ˆ"))

	return content.String()
}

// SetProgress è®¾ç½®è¿›åº¦
func (m *ProgressModel) SetProgress(progress float64) {
	m.progress = progress
}

// SetStatus è®¾ç½®çŠ¶æ€
func (m *ProgressModel) SetStatus(status string) {
	m.status = status

// Init åˆå§‹åŒ–

// Update æ›´æ–°æ¨¡å‹
func (m *ResultViewerModel) Update(msg tea.Msg) (tea.Model, tea.Cmd) {
	switch msg := msg.(type) {

			return m, func() tea.Msg {
				return ConfigUpdateMsg{Config: GetConfig()}
			}
		case "tab":
			m.currentTab = (m.currentTab + 1) % 3 // å‡è®¾æœ‰3ä¸ªæ ‡ç­¾é¡µ
		case "up", "k":
			m.scrollOffset--
			if m.scrollOffset < 0 {
				m.scrollOffset = 0
			}
		case "down", "j":
			m.scrollOffset++
		case "b": // bé”®è¿”å›ä¸»ç•Œé¢
			return m, func() tea.Msg {
				return ConfigUpdateMsg{Config: GetConfig()}
			}
		case "s":
			// ä¿å­˜ç»“æœ
			return m, m.saveResult()
		}
	case tea.WindowSizeMsg:
		m.width = msg.Width
		m.height = msg.Height
	}
	return m, nil
}

// View æ¸²æŸ“è§†å›¾
func (m *ResultViewerModel) View() string {
	if m.result == nil {
		return "æ²¡æœ‰ç»“æœå¯æ˜¾ç¤º"
	}

	var content strings.Builder

	// æ ‡é¢˜
	content.WriteString(TitleStyle.Render("æ‰«æç»“æœ"))
	content.WriteString("\n\n")

	// æ ‡ç­¾é¡µ
	tabs := []string{"æ¦‚è§ˆ", "æ–‡ä»¶", "ç›®å½•"}
	for i, tab := range tabs {
		if i == m.currentTab {
			content.WriteString(SelectedStyle.Render(fmt.Sprintf("[%s]", tab)))
		} else {
			content.WriteString(NormalStyle.Render(fmt.Sprintf(" %s ", tab)))
		}
		content.WriteString(" ")
	}
	content.WriteString("\n\n")

	// å†…å®¹
	switch m.currentTab {
	case 0: // æ¦‚è§ˆ
		content.WriteString(m.renderOverview())
	case 1: // æ–‡ä»¶
		content.WriteString(m.renderFiles())
	case 2: // ç›®å½•
		content.WriteString(m.renderDirectories())
	}

	// å¸®åŠ©ä¿¡æ¯
	content.WriteString("\n")
	content.WriteString(HelpStyle.Render("æ“ä½œ: Tabåˆ‡æ¢æ ‡ç­¾, â†‘â†“æ»šåŠ¨, bè¿”å›ä¸»ç•Œé¢, sä¿å­˜, ESCè¿”å›ä¸»ç•Œé¢"))

	return content.String()
}

// SetResult è®¾ç½®ç»“æœ
func (m *ResultViewerModel) SetResult(result *types.WalkResult) {
	m.result = result
}

// è¾…åŠ©æ–¹æ³•
func (m *ResultViewerModel) renderOverview() string {
	var content strings.Builder

	content.WriteString(NormalStyle.Render(fmt.Sprintf("æ ¹è·¯å¾„: %s\n", m.result.RootPath)))
		content.WriteString(NormalStyle.Render(fmt.Sprintf("æ–‡ä»¶æ•°é‡: %d\n", m.result.FileCount)))
		content.WriteString(NormalStyle.Render(fmt.Sprintf("ç›®å½•æ•°é‡: %d\n", m.result.FolderCount)))
		content.WriteString(NormalStyle.Render(fmt.Sprintf("æ€»å¤§å°: %s\n", formatFileSize(m.result.TotalSize))))
		content.WriteString(NormalStyle.Render(fmt.Sprintf("æ‰«ææ—¶é—´: %v\n", m.result.ScanDuration)))

	return content.String()
}

func (m *ResultViewerModel) renderFiles() string {
	var content strings.Builder

	start := m.scrollOffset
	end := start + m.height - 10
	if end > len(m.result.Files) {
		end = len(m.result.Files)
	}

	for i := start; i < end; i++ {
		file := m.result.Files[i]
		icon := getFileIcon(file.Name, false) // æ–‡ä»¶ä¸æ˜¯ç›®å½•
		content.WriteString(NormalStyle.Render(fmt.Sprintf("%s %s (%s)\n", icon, file.Name, formatFileSize(file.Size))))
	}

	return content.String()
}

func (m *ResultViewerModel) renderDirectories() string {
	var content strings.Builder

	start := m.scrollOffset
	end := start + m.height - 10
	if end > len(m.result.Folders) {
		end = len(m.result.Folders)
	}

	for i := start; i < end; i++ {
		folder := m.result.Folders[i]
		content.WriteString(NormalStyle.Render(fmt.Sprintf("ğŸ“‚ %s/\n", folder.Name)))
	}

	return content.String()
}

func (m *ResultViewerModel) saveResult() tea.Cmd {
	return func() tea.Msg {
		// è¿™é‡Œåº”è¯¥å®ç°ä¿å­˜é€»è¾‘
		return nil
	}
}

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
)

// getFileIcon æ ¹æ®æ–‡ä»¶æ‰©å±•åè¿”å›å¯¹åº”çš„å›¾æ ‡
func getFileIcon(filename string, isDir bool) string {
	if isDir {
		return "ğŸ“‚" // ç›®å½•ä½¿ç”¨æ‰“å¼€çš„æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹å›¾æ ‡
	}

	// è·å–æ–‡ä»¶æ‰©å±•å
	ext := strings.ToLower(strings.TrimPrefix(filename, "."))
	if dotIndex := strings.LastIndex(filename, "."); dotIndex != -1 && dotIndex < len(filename)-1 {
		ext = strings.ToLower(filename[dotIndex+1:])
	}

	// æ–‡æ¡£ç±»æ–‡ä»¶ä½¿ç”¨ğŸ“å›¾æ ‡
	switch ext {
	case "md", "txt", "csv", "doc", "docx", "pdf", "rtf":
		return "ğŸ“"
	// é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä½¿ç”¨âš™ï¸å›¾æ ‡
	case "json", "xml", "toml", "yaml", "yml", "ini", "conf", "config", "properties":
		return "âš™ï¸"
	// ä»£ç æ–‡ä»¶ä½¿ç”¨ğŸ’»å›¾æ ‡
	case "go", "py", "js", "ts", "java", "cpp", "c", "h", "cs", "php", "rb", "swift", "kt", "rs":
		return "ğŸ’»"
	// æ ·å¼æ–‡ä»¶ä½¿ç”¨ğŸ¨å›¾æ ‡
	case "css", "scss", "sass", "less", "html", "htm":
		return "ğŸ¨"
	// è„šæœ¬æ–‡ä»¶ä½¿ç”¨ğŸ“œå›¾æ ‡
	case "sh", "bat", "cmd", "ps1", "bash", "zsh":
		return "ğŸ“œ"
	// å‹ç¼©æ–‡ä»¶ä½¿ç”¨ğŸ“¦å›¾æ ‡
	case "zip", "rar", "7z", "tar", "gz", "bz2":
		return "ğŸ“¦"
	// å›¾ç‰‡æ–‡ä»¶ä½¿ç”¨ğŸ–¼ï¸å›¾æ ‡
	case "jpg", "jpeg", "png", "gif", "bmp", "svg", "ico":
		return "ğŸ–¼ï¸"
	// éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶ä½¿ç”¨ğŸµå›¾æ ‡
	case "mp3", "wav", "flac", "aac", "ogg":
		return "ğŸµ"
	// è§†é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶ä½¿ç”¨ğŸ¬å›¾æ ‡
	case "mp4", "avi", "mkv", "mov", "wmv", "flv":
		return "ğŸ¬"
	// æ•°æ®åº“æ–‡ä»¶ä½¿ç”¨ğŸ—„ï¸å›¾æ ‡
	case "db", "sqlite", "mdb", "accdb":
		return "ğŸ—„ï¸"
	// æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ä½¿ç”¨ğŸ“‹å›¾æ ‡
	case "log":
		return "ğŸ“‹"
	// é»˜è®¤æ–‡ä»¶å›¾æ ‡
	default:
		return "ğŸ“„"
	}
}

// formatFileSize æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°æ˜¾ç¤º
func formatFileSize(bytes int64) string {
	const unit = 1024
	if bytes < unit {
		return fmt.Sprintf("%d B", bytes)
	}
	div, exp := int64(unit), 0
	for n := bytes / unit; n >= unit; n /= unit {
		div *= unit
		exp++
	}
	return fmt.Sprintf("%.1f %cB", float64(bytes)/float64(div), "KMGTPE"[exp])

## æŒç»­é›†æˆ

### 1. GitHub Actionsé…ç½®

#### .github/workflows/ci.yml
```yaml
name: CI

on:
 push:
 branches: [ main, develop ]
 pull_request:
 branches: [ main ]

jobs:
 test:
 runs-on: ubuntu-latest
 strategy:
 matrix:
 go-version: [1.24, 1.23]
 
 steps:
 - uses: actions/checkout@v3
 
 - name: Set up Go
 uses: actions/setup-go@v4
 with:
 go-version: ${{ matrix.go-version }}
 
 - name: Cache Go modules
 uses: actions/cache@v3
 with:
 path: ~/go/pkg/mod
 key: ${{ runner.os }}-go-${{ hashFiles('**/go.sum') }}
 restore-keys: |
 ${{ runner.os }}-go-
 
 - name: Download dependencies
 run: go mod download
 
 - name: Run tests
 run: go test -v -race -coverprofile=coverage.out ./...
 
 - name: Generate coverage report
 run: go tool cover -html=coverage.out -o coverage.html
 
 - name: Upload coverage to Codecov
 uses: codecov/codecov-action@v3
 with:
 file: ./coverage.out
 
 - name: Run golangci-lint
 uses: golangci/golangci-lint-action@v3
 with:
 version: latest
 
 - name: Run gosec security scanner
 uses: securecodewarrior/github-action-gosec@master
 with:
 args: '-no-fail -fmt sarif -out results.sarif ./...'
 
 - name: Upload SARIF file
 uses: github/codeql-action/upload-sarif@v2
 with:
 sarif_file: results.sarif

 build:
 needs: test
 runs-on: ubuntu-latest
 
 steps:
 - uses: actions/checkout@v3
 
 - name: Set up Go
 uses: actions/setup-go@v4
 with:
 go-version: 1.24
 
 - name: Build CLI
 run: go build -v -o code-context-generator cmd/cli/main.go
 
 - name: Build TUI
 run: go build -v -o code-context-generator-tui cmd/tui/main.go
 
 - name: Test build artifacts
 run: |
 ./code-context-generator --help
 ./code-context-generator-tui --help || true
 
 - name: Upload build artifacts
 uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
 with:
 name: binaries
 path: |
 code-context-generator
 code-context-generator-tui

 release:
 needs: build
 runs-on: ubuntu-latest
 if: startsWith(github.ref, 'refs/tags/')
 
 steps:
 - uses: actions/checkout@v3
 
 - name: Set up Go
 uses: actions/setup-go@v4
 with:
 go-version: 1.24
 
 - name: Run GoReleaser
 uses: goreleaser/goreleaser-action@v4
 with:
 version: latest
 args: release --rm-dist
 env:
 GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
```

### âš™ï¸ é…ç½®ç¤ºä¾‹
| é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ | ç”¨é€” | åœºæ™¯ |

| [basic-config.toml](../examples/basic-config.toml) | åŸºç¡€é€šç”¨é…ç½® | æ—¥å¸¸ä½¿ç”¨ |

// IsTextFile æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºæ–‡æœ¬æ–‡ä»¶
func IsTextFile(path string) bool {
 // é¦–å…ˆæ£€æŸ¥æ–‡ä»¶æ‰©å±•å
 ext := strings.ToLower(filepath.Ext(path))
 textExtensions := []string{
 ".txt", ".md", ".json", ".xml", ".yaml", ".yml", ".toml",
 ".go", ".py", ".js", ".ts", ".java", ".cpp", ".c", ".h",
 ".html", ".css", ".scss", ".sass", ".sql", ".sh", ".bat",
 ".ps1", ".rb", ".php", ".rs", ".swift", ".kt", ".scala",
 }

 for _, textExt := range textExtensions {
 if ext == textExt {
 return true
 }
 }

 // å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰æ‰©å±•åï¼Œå°è¯•è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹æ¥åˆ¤æ–­
 if ext == "" {

 if err != nil {
 return false // æ— æ³•æ‰“å¼€æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå‡è®¾ä¸ºäºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶
 }
 defer file.Close()

 // è¯»å–å‰512å­—èŠ‚æ¥åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºæ–‡æœ¬æ–‡ä»¶
 buffer := make([]byte, 512)
 n, err := file.Read(buffer)
 if err != nil && err != io.EOF {
 return false // è¯»å–é”™è¯¯ï¼Œå‡è®¾ä¸ºäºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶
 }

 // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦åŒ…å«nullå­—èŠ‚ï¼ˆäºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶çš„æ ‡å¿—ï¼‰
 for i := 0; i < n; i++ {
 if buffer[i] == 0 {
 return false // åŒ…å«nullå­—èŠ‚ï¼Œæ˜¯äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶
 }
 }

 // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦åŒ…å«å¯æ‰“å°å­—ç¬¦
 printableCount := 0
 for i := 0; i < n; i++ {
 b := buffer[i]
 if b >= 32 && b <= 126 { // å¯æ‰“å°ASCIIå­—ç¬¦
 printableCount++
 } else if b == 9 || b == 10 || b == 13 { // tab, newline, carriage return
 printableCount++
 }
 }

 // å¦‚æœå¤§éƒ¨åˆ†å­—ç¬¦éƒ½æ˜¯å¯æ‰“å°çš„ï¼Œè®¤ä¸ºæ˜¯æ–‡æœ¬æ–‡ä»¶
 if n > 0 && float64(printableCount)/float64(n) > 0.8 {
 return true
 }
 }

 return false
}

// IsBinaryFile æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºäºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶
func IsBinaryFile(path string) bool {

}

package formatter

import (
 "testing"

)

func TestJSONFormatter_Format(t *testing.T) {
 formatter := NewJSONFormatter(nil)
 
 data := types.ContextData{
 Files: []types.FileInfo{
 {
 Path: "test.go",
 Size: 1024,
 Modified: "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 },
 },
 FileCount: 1,
 TotalSize: 1024,
 }
 
 result, err := formatter.Format(data)
 if err != nil {
 t.Fatalf("Format failed: %v", err)
 }
 
 if result == "" {
 t.Error("Expected non-empty result")
 }
 
 // éªŒè¯JSONæ ¼å¼
 if !strings.HasPrefix(result, "{") {
 t.Error("Expected JSON object")
 }
}

import (

func TestIntegration_FileSystemWalker(t *testing.T) {
 // åˆ›å»ºæµ‹è¯•ç›®å½•ç»“æ„

 // åˆ›å»ºæµ‹è¯•æ–‡ä»¶
 files := []string{

 "subdir/file3.json",
 }
 
 for _, file := range files {

 }

 }

package autocomplete

import (
	"fmt"
	"os"
	"path/filepath"
	"sort"
	"strings"
	"sync"
	"time"

	"code-context-generator/pkg/constants"
	"code-context-generator/pkg/types"
)

// Autocompleter è‡ªåŠ¨è¡¥å…¨å™¨æ¥å£
type Autocompleter interface {
	Complete(input string, context *types.CompleteContext) ([]string, error)
	GetSuggestions(input string, maxSuggestions int) []string
	UpdateCache(path string) error
	ClearCache()
	GetCacheSize() int
}

// FilePathAutocompleter æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„è‡ªåŠ¨è¡¥å…¨å™¨
type FilePathAutocompleter struct {
	cache map[string][]string
	mu sync.RWMutex
	config *types.AutocompleteConfig
	maxDepth int
}

// NewAutocompleter åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„è‡ªåŠ¨è¡¥å…¨å™¨
func NewAutocompleter(config *types.AutocompleteConfig) Autocompleter {
	if config == nil {
		config = &types.AutocompleteConfig{
			Enabled: true,
			MinChars: constants.DefaultMinChars,
			MaxSuggestions: constants.DefaultMaxSuggestions,
		}
	}

	return &FilePathAutocompleter{
		cache: make(map[string][]string),
		config: config,
		maxDepth: constants.DefaultMaxDepth,
	}
}

// Complete æ‰§è¡Œè‡ªåŠ¨è¡¥å…¨
func (a *FilePathAutocompleter) Complete(input string, context *types.CompleteContext) ([]string, error) {
	if !a.config.Enabled {
		return []string{}, nil
	}

	if len(input) < a.config.MinChars {
		return []string{}, nil
	}

	switch context.Type {
	case types.CompleteFilePath:
		return a.completeFilePath(input, context)
	case types.CompleteDirectory:
		return a.completeDirectory(input, context)
	case types.CompleteExtension:
		return a.completeExtension(input, context)
	case types.CompletePattern:
		return a.completePattern(input, context)
	default:
		return a.completeGeneric(input, context)
	}
}

// GetSuggestions è·å–å»ºè®®åˆ—è¡¨
func (a *FilePathAutocompleter) GetSuggestions(input string, maxSuggestions int) []string {
	if !a.config.Enabled {
		return []string{}
	}

	if maxSuggestions <= 0 {
		maxSuggestions = a.config.MaxSuggestions
	}

	suggestions := a.getMatchingItems(input)

	if len(suggestions) > maxSuggestions {
		suggestions = suggestions[:maxSuggestions]
	}

	return suggestions
}

// UpdateCache æ›´æ–°ç¼“å­˜
func (a *FilePathAutocompleter) UpdateCache(path string) error {
	a.mu.Lock()
	defer a.mu.Unlock()

	// æ¸…é™¤æ—§ç¼“å­˜
	delete(a.cache, path)

	// è·å–æ–°ç¼“å­˜æ•°æ®
	items, err := a.scanDirectory(path)
	if err != nil {
		return fmt.Errorf("æ‰«æç›®å½•å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}

	a.cache[path] = items
	return nil
}

// ClearCache æ¸…é™¤ç¼“å­˜
func (a *FilePathAutocompleter) ClearCache() {
	a.mu.Lock()
	defer a.mu.Unlock()

	a.cache = make(map[string][]string)
}

// GetCacheSize è·å–ç¼“å­˜å¤§å°
func (a *FilePathAutocompleter) GetCacheSize() int {
	a.mu.RLock()
	defer a.mu.RUnlock()

	return len(a.cache)
}

// è‡ªåŠ¨è¡¥å…¨æ–¹æ³•

func (a *FilePathAutocompleter) completeFilePath(input string, context *types.CompleteContext) ([]string, error) {
	dir := filepath.Dir(input)
	base := filepath.Base(input)

	// å¦‚æœç›®å½•ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œå°è¯•è¡¥å…¨ç›®å½•
	if _, err := os.Stat(dir); os.IsNotExist(err) {
		return a.completeDirectory(input, context)
	}

	// è·å–ç›®å½•å†…å®¹
	items, err := a.getDirectoryItems(dir)
	if err != nil {
		return nil, err
	}

	// è¿‡æ»¤åŒ¹é…çš„æ–‡ä»¶
	var matches []string
	for _, item := range items {
		if strings.HasPrefix(item, base) {
			fullPath := filepath.Join(dir, item)
			if info, err := os.Stat(fullPath); err == nil && !info.IsDir() {
				matches = append(matches, fullPath)
			}
		}
	}

	return matches, nil
}

func (a *FilePathAutocompleter) completeDirectory(input string, _ *types.CompleteContext) ([]string, error) {
	// å°è¯•ä¸åŒçš„ç›®å½•çº§åˆ«
	parts := strings.Split(input, string(os.PathSeparator))

	for i := len(parts); i > 0; i-- {
		partialPath := strings.Join(parts[:i], string(os.PathSeparator))

		if partialPath == "" {
			partialPath = "."
		}

		if _, err := os.Stat(partialPath); err == nil {
			// æ‰¾åˆ°å­˜åœ¨çš„ç›®å½•
			remaining := strings.Join(parts[i:], string(os.PathSeparator))

			items, err := a.getDirectoryItems(partialPath)
			if err != nil {
				continue
			}

			var matches []string
			for _, item := range items {
				if strings.HasPrefix(item, remaining) {
					fullPath := filepath.Join(partialPath, item)
					if info, err := os.Stat(fullPath); err == nil && info.IsDir() {
						matches = append(matches, fullPath+string(os.PathSeparator))
					}
				}
			}

			if len(matches) > 0 {
				return matches, nil
			}
		}
	}

	return []string{}, nil
}

func (a *FilePathAutocompleter) completeExtension(input string, _ *types.CompleteContext) ([]string, error) {
	// è·å–å¸¸è§æ–‡ä»¶æ‰©å±•å
	commonExtensions := []string{
		".go", ".py", ".js", ".ts", ".java", ".cpp", ".c", ".h",
		".json", ".xml", ".yaml", ".yml", ".toml",
		".md", ".txt", ".rst",
		".html", ".css", ".scss", ".sass",
		".sql", ".sh", ".bat", ".ps1",
	}

	var matches []string
	for _, ext := range commonExtensions {
		if strings.HasPrefix(ext, input) {
			matches = append(matches, ext)
		}
	}

	return matches, nil
}

func (a *FilePathAutocompleter) completePattern(input string, _ *types.CompleteContext) ([]string, error) {
	// æ”¯æŒé€šé…ç¬¦æ¨¡å¼åŒ¹é…
	dir := filepath.Dir(input)
	pattern := filepath.Base(input)

	items, err := a.getDirectoryItems(dir)
	if err != nil {
		return nil, err
	}

	var matches []string
	for _, item := range items {
		if matched, _ := filepath.Match(pattern, item); matched {
			matches = append(matches, filepath.Join(dir, item))
		}
	}

	return matches, nil
}

func (a *FilePathAutocompleter) completeGeneric(input string, _ *types.CompleteContext) ([]string, error) {
	// é€šç”¨è¡¥å…¨ï¼šå°è¯•æ–‡ä»¶å’Œç›®å½•
	dir := filepath.Dir(input)
	base := filepath.Base(input)

	items, err := a.getDirectoryItems(dir)
	if err != nil {
		return nil, err
	}

	var matches []string
	for _, item := range items {
		if strings.HasPrefix(item, base) {
			fullPath := filepath.Join(dir, item)
			if info, err := os.Stat(fullPath); err == nil {
				if info.IsDir() {
					matches = append(matches, fullPath+string(os.PathSeparator))
				} else {
					matches = append(matches, fullPath)
				}
			}
		}
	}

	return matches, nil
}

// è¾…åŠ©æ–¹æ³•

func (a *FilePathAutocompleter) getMatchingItems(input string) []string {
	a.mu.RLock()
	defer a.mu.RUnlock()

	var allItems []string

	// ä»ç¼“å­˜ä¸­è·å–åŒ¹é…é¡¹
	for _, items := range a.cache {
		for _, item := range items {
			if strings.Contains(item, input) {
				allItems = append(allItems, item)
			}
		}
	}

	// å»é‡å’Œæ’åº
	uniqueItems := removeDuplicates(allItems)
	sort.Strings(uniqueItems)

	return uniqueItems
}

func (a *FilePathAutocompleter) getDirectoryItems(dir string) ([]string, error) {
	// æ£€æŸ¥ç¼“å­˜
	a.mu.RLock()
	if items, exists := a.cache[dir]; exists {
		a.mu.RUnlock()
		return items, nil
	}
	a.mu.RUnlock()

	// æ‰«æç›®å½•
	items, err := a.scanDirectory(dir)
	if err != nil {
		return nil, err
	}

	// æ›´æ–°ç¼“å­˜
	a.mu.Lock()
	a.cache[dir] = items
	a.mu.Unlock()

	return items, nil
}

func (a *FilePathAutocompleter) scanDirectory(dir string) ([]string, error) {
	entries, err := os.ReadDir(dir)
	if err != nil {
		return nil, err
	}

	var items []string
	for _, entry := range entries {
		name := entry.Name()

		// è·³è¿‡éšè—æ–‡ä»¶
		if strings.HasPrefix(name, ".") {
			continue
		}

		items = append(items, name)
	}

	return items, nil
}

func removeDuplicates(items []string) []string {
	seen := make(map[string]bool)
	var result []string

	for _, item := range items {
		if !seen[item] {
			seen[item] = true
			result = append(result, item)
		}
	}

	return result
}

// CommandAutocompleter å‘½ä»¤è‡ªåŠ¨è¡¥å…¨å™¨
type CommandAutocompleter struct {
	commands map[string]*CommandInfo
}

// CommandInfo å‘½ä»¤ä¿¡æ¯
type CommandInfo struct {
	Name string
	Description string
	Aliases []string
	Subcommands []string
	Options []string
}

// NewCommandAutocompleter åˆ›å»ºå‘½ä»¤è‡ªåŠ¨è¡¥å…¨å™¨
func NewCommandAutocompleter() *CommandAutocompleter {
	return &CommandAutocompleter{
		commands: make(map[string]*CommandInfo),
	}
}

// RegisterCommand æ³¨å†Œå‘½ä»¤
func (c *CommandAutocompleter) RegisterCommand(info *CommandInfo) {
	c.commands[info.Name] = info
}

// Complete è¡¥å…¨å‘½ä»¤
func (c *CommandAutocompleter) Complete(input string) []string {
	var matches []string

	for name, info := range c.commands {
		if strings.HasPrefix(name, input) {
			matches = append(matches, name)
		}

		// æ£€æŸ¥åˆ«å
		for _, alias := range info.Aliases {
			if strings.HasPrefix(alias, input) {
				matches = append(matches, alias)
			}
		}
	}

	sort.Strings(matches)
	return matches
}

// GetCommandInfo è·å–å‘½ä»¤ä¿¡æ¯
func (c *CommandAutocompleter) GetCommandInfo(command string) (*CommandInfo, bool) {
	info, exists := c.commands[command]
	return info, exists
}

// Suggestion å»ºè®®é¡¹
type Suggestion struct {
	Text string
	Description string
	Type string
	Icon string
}

// SuggestionProvider å»ºè®®æä¾›è€…æ¥å£
type SuggestionProvider interface {
	GetSuggestions(input string, context *types.CompleteContext) ([]Suggestion, error)
}

// CompositeSuggestionProvider ç»„åˆå»ºè®®æä¾›è€…
type CompositeSuggestionProvider struct {
	providers []SuggestionProvider
}

// NewCompositeSuggestionProvider åˆ›å»ºç»„åˆå»ºè®®æä¾›è€…
func NewCompositeSuggestionProvider(providers ...SuggestionProvider) *CompositeSuggestionProvider {
	return &CompositeSuggestionProvider{
		providers: providers,
	}
}

// GetSuggestions è·å–å»ºè®®
func (c *CompositeSuggestionProvider) GetSuggestions(input string, context *types.CompleteContext) ([]Suggestion, error) {
	var allSuggestions []Suggestion

	for _, provider := range c.providers {
		suggestions, err := provider.GetSuggestions(input, context)
		if err != nil {
			continue // è·³è¿‡å‡ºé”™çš„æä¾›è€…
		}
		allSuggestions = append(allSuggestions, suggestions...)
	}

	// å»é‡å’Œé™åˆ¶æ•°é‡
	uniqueSuggestions := removeDuplicateSuggestions(allSuggestions)
	if len(uniqueSuggestions) > constants.DefaultMaxSuggestions {
		uniqueSuggestions = uniqueSuggestions[:constants.DefaultMaxSuggestions]
	}

	return uniqueSuggestions, nil
}

func removeDuplicateSuggestions(suggestions []Suggestion) []Suggestion {
	seen := make(map[string]bool)
	var result []Suggestion

	for _, suggestion := range suggestions {
		if !seen[suggestion.Text] {
			seen[suggestion.Text] = true
			result = append(result, suggestion)
		}
	}

	return result
}

// AutocompleterOptions è‡ªåŠ¨è¡¥å…¨é€‰é¡¹
type AutocompleterOptions struct {
	Enabled bool
	MinChars int
	MaxSuggestions int
	CacheSize int
	Timeout time.Duration
}

import (
	"os"
	"path/filepath"
	"testing"
	"time"

	"code-context-generator/pkg/types"
)

func TestNewAutocompleter(t *testing.T) {
	// æµ‹è¯•é»˜è®¤é…ç½®
	ac := NewAutocompleter(nil)
	if ac == nil {
		t.Fatal("NewAutocompleter returned nil")
	}

	// æµ‹è¯•è‡ªå®šä¹‰é…ç½®
	config := &types.AutocompleteConfig{
		Enabled: true,
		MinChars: 3,
		MaxSuggestions: 10,
	}
	ac = NewAutocompleter(config)
	if ac == nil {
		t.Fatal("NewAutocompleter with config returned nil")
	}
}

func TestFilePathAutocompleter_Complete(t *testing.T) {
	// åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶ç›®å½•ç»“æ„
	tempDir := t.TempDir()
	subDir := filepath.Join(tempDir, "subdir")
	if err := os.MkdirAll(subDir, 0755); err != nil {
		t.Fatal(err)
	}

	// åˆ›å»ºæµ‹è¯•æ–‡ä»¶
	testFile := filepath.Join(tempDir, "test.txt")
	if err := os.WriteFile(testFile, []byte("test content"), 0644); err != nil {
		t.Fatal(err)
	}

	// åˆ›å»ºå­ç›®å½•æ–‡ä»¶
	subFile := filepath.Join(subDir, "subtest.go")
	if err := os.WriteFile(subFile, []byte("package main"), 0644); err != nil {
		t.Fatal(err)
	}

	config := &types.AutocompleteConfig{
		Enabled: true,
		MinChars: 1,
		MaxSuggestions: 5,
	}
	ac := NewAutocompleter(config).(*FilePathAutocompleter)

	tests := []struct {
		name string
		input string
		context *types.CompleteContext
		wantResults bool
		minResults int
	}{
		{
			name: "complete file path",
			input: filepath.Join(tempDir, "tes"),
			context: &types.CompleteContext{Type: types.CompleteFilePath},
			wantResults: true,
			minResults: 1,
		},
		{
			name: "complete directory",
			input: tempDir,
			context: &types.CompleteContext{Type: types.CompleteDirectory},
			wantResults: true,
			minResults: 1,
		},
		{
			name: "complete extension",
			input: ".g",
			context: &types.CompleteContext{Type: types.CompleteExtension},
			wantResults: true,
			minResults: 1,
		},
		{
			name: "complete pattern",
			input: filepath.Join(tempDir, "*.txt"),
			context: &types.CompleteContext{Type: types.CompletePattern},
			wantResults: true,
			minResults: 1,
		},
		{
			name: "complete generic",
			input: filepath.Join(tempDir, "sub"),
			context: &types.CompleteContext{Type: types.CompleteGeneric},
			wantResults: true,
			minResults: 1,
		},
		{
			name: "disabled autocompleter",
			input: tempDir,
			context: &types.CompleteContext{Type: types.CompleteGeneric},
			wantResults: false,
			minResults: 0,
		},
	}

	for _, tt := range tests {
		t.Run(tt.name, func(t *testing.T) {
			if tt.name == "disabled autocompleter" {
				ac.config.Enabled = false
				defer func() { ac.config.Enabled = true }()
			}

			results, err := ac.Complete(tt.input, tt.context)
			if err != nil && tt.wantResults {
				t.Errorf("Complete() error = %v, wantResults %v", err, tt.wantResults)
				return
			}

			if tt.wantResults && len(results) < tt.minResults {
				t.Errorf("Complete() got %d results, want at least %d", len(results), tt.minResults)
			}

			if !tt.wantResults && len(results) > 0 {
				t.Errorf("Complete() got %d results, want 0", len(results))
			}
		})
	}
}

func TestFilePathAutocompleter_GetSuggestions(t *testing.T) {
	config := &types.AutocompleteConfig{
		Enabled: true,
		MinChars: 1,
		MaxSuggestions: 3,
	}
	ac := NewAutocompleter(config).(*FilePathAutocompleter)

	// æ·»åŠ ä¸€äº›ç¼“å­˜æ•°æ®
	ac.cache["test"] = []string{"test1", "test2", "testing"}

	tests := []struct {
		name string
		input string
		maxSuggestions int
		wantCount int
	}{
		{
			name: "get suggestions with max limit",
			input: "test",
			maxSuggestions: 2,
			wantCount: 2,
		},
		{
			name: "get suggestions without max limit",
			input: "test",
			maxSuggestions: 0,
			wantCount: 3,
		},
		{
			name: "no matching suggestions",
			input: "nomatch",
			maxSuggestions: 5,
			wantCount: 0,
		},
		{
			name: "disabled autocompleter",
			input: "test",
			maxSuggestions: 5,
			wantCount: 0,
		},
	}

	for _, tt := range tests {
		t.Run(tt.name, func(t *testing.T) {
			if tt.name == "disabled autocompleter" {
				ac.config.Enabled = false
				defer func() { ac.config.Enabled = true }()
			}

			suggestions := ac.GetSuggestions(tt.input, tt.maxSuggestions)
			if len(suggestions) != tt.wantCount {
				t.Errorf("GetSuggestions() got %d suggestions, want %d", len(suggestions), tt.wantCount)
			}
		})
	}
}

func TestFilePathAutocompleter_CacheOperations(t *testing.T) {
	config := &types.AutocompleteConfig{
		Enabled: true,
		MinChars: 1,
		MaxSuggestions: 5,
	}
	ac := NewAutocompleter(config).(*FilePathAutocompleter)

	// æµ‹è¯•æ›´æ–°ç¼“å­˜
	tempDir := t.TempDir()
	testFile := filepath.Join(tempDir, "test.txt")
	if err := os.WriteFile(testFile, []byte("test"), 0644); err != nil {
		t.Fatal(err)
	}

	if err := ac.UpdateCache(tempDir); err != nil {
		t.Errorf("UpdateCache() error = %v", err)
	}

	// éªŒè¯ç¼“å­˜å·²æ›´æ–°
	if size := ac.GetCacheSize(); size != 1 {
		t.Errorf("GetCacheSize() = %d, want 1", size)
	}

	// æµ‹è¯•æ¸…é™¤ç¼“å­˜
	ac.ClearCache()
	if size := ac.GetCacheSize(); size != 0 {
		t.Errorf("GetCacheSize() after ClearCache() = %d, want 0", size)
	}
}

func TestCommandAutocompleter(t *testing.T) {
	cmdAc := NewCommandAutocompleter()

	// æ³¨å†Œæµ‹è¯•å‘½ä»¤
	cmdInfo := &CommandInfo{
		Name: "test",
		Description: "Test command",
		Aliases: []string{"t", "tst"},
		Subcommands: []string{"sub1", "sub2"},
		Options: []string{"--help", "--version"},
	}
	cmdAc.RegisterCommand(cmdInfo)

	tests := []struct {
		name string
		input string
		wantLen int
		contains string
	}{
		{
			name: "complete command name",
			input: "te",
			wantLen: 1,
			contains: "test",
		},
		{
			name: "complete command alias",
			input: "t",
			wantLen: 3, // ä¼šåŒ¹é… test, t, tst
			contains: "t",
		},
		{
			name: "no match",
			input: "nomatch",
			wantLen: 0,
			contains: "",
		},
	}

	for _, tt := range tests {
		t.Run(tt.name, func(t *testing.T) {
			results := cmdAc.Complete(tt.input)
			if len(results) != tt.wantLen {
				t.Errorf("Complete() = %d results, want %d", len(results), tt.wantLen)
			}
			if tt.contains != "" && len(results) > 0 {
				found := false
				for _, result := range results {
					if result == tt.contains {
						found = true
						break
					}
				}
				if !found {
					t.Errorf("Complete() results do not contain %s", tt.contains)
				}
			}
		})
	}

	// æµ‹è¯•è·å–å‘½ä»¤ä¿¡æ¯
	if info, exists := cmdAc.GetCommandInfo("test"); !exists || info.Name != "test" {
		t.Errorf("GetCommandInfo() failed to retrieve command info")
	}
}

func TestCompositeSuggestionProvider(t *testing.T) {
	// åˆ›å»ºæ¨¡æ‹Ÿçš„å»ºè®®æä¾›è€…
	mockProvider1 := &mockSuggestionProvider{
		suggestions: []Suggestion{
			{Text: "suggestion1", Description: "First suggestion"},
			{Text: "suggestion2", Description: "Second suggestion"},
		},
	}

	mockProvider2 := &mockSuggestionProvider{
		suggestions: []Suggestion{
			{Text: "suggestion2", Description: "Duplicate suggestion"},
			{Text: "suggestion3", Description: "Third suggestion"},
		},
	}

	composite := NewCompositeSuggestionProvider(mockProvider1, mockProvider2)
	context := &types.CompleteContext{Type: types.CompleteGeneric}

	suggestions, err := composite.GetSuggestions("test", context)
	if err != nil {
		t.Errorf("GetSuggestions() error = %v", err)
	}

	// åº”è¯¥å»é‡ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æœŸæœ›3ä¸ªå»ºè®®
	if len(suggestions) != 3 {
		t.Errorf("GetSuggestions() = %d suggestions, want 3", len(suggestions))
	}
}

func TestAutocompleterOptions(t *testing.T) {
	opts := AutocompleterOptions{
		Enabled: true,
		MinChars: 2,
		MaxSuggestions: 10,
		CacheSize: 100,
		Timeout: 5 * time.Second,
	}

	if !opts.Enabled {
		t.Error("AutocompleterOptions.Enabled should be true")
	}
	if opts.MinChars != 2 {
		t.Errorf("AutocompleterOptions.MinChars = %d, want 2", opts.MinChars)
	}
	if opts.MaxSuggestions != 10 {
		t.Errorf("AutocompleterOptions.MaxSuggestions = %d, want 10", opts.MaxSuggestions)
	}
	if opts.CacheSize != 100 {
		t.Errorf("AutocompleterOptions.CacheSize = %d, want 100", opts.CacheSize)
	}
	if opts.Timeout != 5*time.Second {
		t.Errorf("AutocompleterOptions.Timeout = %v, want 5s", opts.Timeout)
	}
}

	}
