package config

import (
	"encoding/json"
	"fmt"
	"os"
	"path/filepath"
	"strings"
	"sync"
	"time"

	"code-context-generator/internal/env"
	"code-context-generator/pkg/constants"
	"code-context-generator/pkg/types"

	"github.com/BurntSushi/toml"
	"github.com/goccy/go-yaml"
)

// Manager é…ç½®ç®¡ç†å™¨æ¥å£
type Manager interface {
	Load(configPath string) error
	Get() *types.Config
	Validate() error
	Reload() error
	Save(configPath string, format string) error
	GetEnvOverrides() map[string]string
	GenerateOutput(data types.ContextData, format string) (string, error)
	GetOutputFilename(format string) string
}

// ConfigManager é…ç½®ç®¡ç†å™¨å®ç°
type ConfigManager struct {
	config *types.Config
	mu sync.RWMutex
	configPath string
}

// NewManager åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„é…ç½®ç®¡ç†å™¨
func NewManager() Manager {
	return &ConfigManager{
		config: GetDefaultConfig(),
	}
}

// Load åŠ è½½é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶
func (cm *ConfigManager) Load(configPath string) error {
	cm.mu.Lock()
	defer cm.mu.Unlock()

	if configPath == "" {
		configPath = constants.DefaultConfigFile
	}

	// é¦–å…ˆåŠ è½½.envæ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆå¦‚æœå­˜åœ¨ï¼‰
	if err := env.LoadEnv(""); err != nil {
		// å¦‚æœ.envæ–‡ä»¶åŠ è½½å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè®°å½•è­¦å‘Šä½†ä¸ä¸­æ–­ç¨‹åº
		fmt.Printf("è­¦å‘Š: åŠ è½½.envæ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥: %v\n", err)
	}

	// æ£€æŸ¥æ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
	if _, err := os.Stat(configPath); os.IsNotExist(err) {
		// å¦‚æœæ–‡ä»¶ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºé»˜è®¤é…ç½®
		return cm.saveConfig(configPath, "yaml")
	}

	config, err := LoadConfig(configPath)
	if err != nil {
		return fmt.Errorf("åŠ è½½é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}

	// åº”ç”¨ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡è¦†ç›–
	cm.applyEnvOverrides(config)

	cm.config = config
	cm.configPath = configPath
	return nil
}

// Get è·å–å½“å‰é…ç½®
func (cm *ConfigManager) Get() *types.Config {
	cm.mu.RLock()
	defer cm.mu.RUnlock()
	return cm.config
}

// Validate éªŒè¯é…ç½®
func (cm *ConfigManager) Validate() error {
	cm.mu.RLock()
	defer cm.mu.RUnlock()

	if cm.config == nil {
		return fmt.Errorf("é…ç½®ä¸ºç©º")
	}

	// éªŒè¯æ ¼å¼é…ç½®
	formats := []string{constants.FormatXML, constants.FormatJSON, constants.FormatTOML, constants.FormatMarkdown}
	hasEnabled := false
	for _, format := range formats {
		if cm.isFormatEnabled(format) {
			hasEnabled = true
			break
		}
	}

	if !hasEnabled {
		return fmt.Errorf("è‡³å°‘éœ€è¦å¯ç”¨ä¸€ç§è¾“å‡ºæ ¼å¼")
	}

	// éªŒè¯è¾“å‡ºé…ç½®
	if cm.config.Output.FilenameTemplate == "" {
		return fmt.Errorf("æ–‡ä»¶åæ¨¡æ¿ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º")
	}

	// éªŒè¯æ—¶é—´æ ¼å¼
	if _, err := time.Parse(cm.config.Output.TimestampFormat, time.Now().Format(cm.config.Output.TimestampFormat)); err != nil {
		return fmt.Errorf("æ—¶é—´æ ¼å¼æ— æ•ˆ: %w", err)
	}

	return nil
}

// Reload é‡æ–°åŠ è½½é…ç½®
func (cm *ConfigManager) Reload() error {
	if cm.configPath == "" {
		return fmt.Errorf("é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„æœªè®¾ç½®")
	}
	return cm.Load(cm.configPath)
}

// Save ä¿å­˜é…ç½®åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶
func (cm *ConfigManager) Save(configPath string, format string) error {
	cm.mu.RLock()
	defer cm.mu.RUnlock()

	if cm.config == nil {
		return fmt.Errorf("é…ç½®ä¸ºç©º")
	}

	switch strings.ToLower(format) {
	case "yaml", "yml":
		return cm.saveYAML(configPath)
	case "json":
		return cm.saveJSON(configPath)
	case "toml":
		return cm.saveTOML(configPath)
	default:
		return fmt.Errorf("ä¸æ”¯æŒçš„æ ¼å¼: %s", format)
	}
}

// GetEnvOverrides è·å–ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡è¦†ç›–
func (cm *ConfigManager) GetEnvOverrides() map[string]string {
	envVars := env.GetAllEnvVars()
	overrides := make(map[string]string)
	
	// å°†ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡åæ˜ å°„åˆ°é…ç½®å­—æ®µå
	mapping := map[string]string{
		env.EnvDefaultFormat: "default_format",
		env.EnvOutputDir: "output_dir",
		env.EnvFilenameTemplate: "filename_template",
		env.EnvTimestampFormat: "timestamp_format",
		env.EnvMaxFileSize: "max_file_size",
		env.EnvMaxDepth: "max_depth",
		env.EnvRecursive: "recursive",
		env.EnvIncludeHidden: "include_hidden",
		env.EnvFollowSymlinks: "follow_symlinks",
		env.EnvExcludeBinary: "exclude_binary",
		env.EnvExcludePatterns: "exclude_patterns",
		env.EnvAutocompleteEnabled: "autocomplete_enabled",
	}
	
	for envKey, fieldName := range mapping {
		if value, exists := envVars[envKey]; exists && value != "" {
			overrides[fieldName] = value
		}
	}
	
	return overrides
}

// applyEnvOverrides åº”ç”¨ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡è¦†ç›–åˆ°é…ç½®
func (cm *ConfigManager) applyEnvOverrides(config *types.Config) {
	// åº”ç”¨è¾“å‡ºæ ¼å¼è¦†ç›–
	if format := env.GetDefaultFormat(); format != "" {
		config.Output.DefaultFormat = format
	}

	// åº”ç”¨è¾“å‡ºç›®å½•è¦†ç›–
	if outputDir := env.GetOutputDir(); outputDir != "" {
		config.Output.OutputDir = outputDir
	}

	// åº”ç”¨æ–‡ä»¶åæ¨¡æ¿è¦†ç›–
	if filenameTemplate := env.GetFilenameTemplate(); filenameTemplate != "" {
		config.Output.FilenameTemplate = filenameTemplate
	}

	// åº”ç”¨æ—¶é—´æˆ³æ ¼å¼è¦†ç›–
	if timestampFormat := env.GetTimestampFormat(); timestampFormat != "" {
		config.Output.TimestampFormat = timestampFormat
	}

	// åº”ç”¨æœ€å¤§æ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°è¦†ç›–
	if maxFileSize := env.GetMaxFileSize(); maxFileSize != "" {
		config.Filters.MaxFileSize = maxFileSize
	}

	// åº”ç”¨æœ€å¤§æ·±åº¦è¦†ç›–
	config.Filters.MaxDepth = env.GetMaxDepth()

	// åº”ç”¨æ’é™¤æ¨¡å¼è¦†ç›–
	if excludePatterns := env.GetExcludePatterns(); excludePatterns != "" {
		config.Filters.ExcludePatterns = strings.Split(excludePatterns, ",")
	}

	// åº”ç”¨è·Ÿéšç¬¦å·é“¾æ¥è¦†ç›–
	config.Filters.FollowSymlinks = env.GetFollowSymlinks()

	// åº”ç”¨æ’é™¤äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶è¦†ç›–
	config.Filters.ExcludeBinary = env.GetExcludeBinary()
}

// GenerateOutput ç”Ÿæˆè¾“å‡ºå†…å®¹
func (cm *ConfigManager) GenerateOutput(data types.ContextData, format string) (string, error) {
	cm.mu.RLock()
	defer cm.mu.RUnlock()

	switch strings.ToLower(format) {
	case constants.FormatXML:
		return cm.generateXML(data)
	case constants.FormatJSON:
		return cm.generateJSON(data)
	case constants.FormatTOML:
		return cm.generateTOML(data)
	case constants.FormatMarkdown:
		return cm.generateMarkdown(data)
	default:
		return "", fmt.Errorf("ä¸æ”¯æŒçš„æ ¼å¼: %s", format)
	}
}

// GetOutputFilename ç”Ÿæˆè¾“å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶å
func (cm *ConfigManager) GetOutputFilename(format string) string {
	cm.mu.RLock()
	defer cm.mu.RUnlock()

	template := cm.config.Output.FilenameTemplate
	if template == "" {
		template = constants.DefaultFilenameTemplate
	}

	timestamp := time.Now().Format(cm.config.Output.TimestampFormat)
	if timestamp == "" {
		timestamp = time.Now().Format(constants.DefaultTimestampFormat)
	}

	filename := strings.ReplaceAll(template, "{{.timestamp}}", timestamp)
	filename = strings.ReplaceAll(filename, "{{.extension}}", format)

	return filename
}

// saveConfig å†…éƒ¨ä¿å­˜é…ç½®ï¼ˆä¸åŠ é”ï¼‰
func (cm *ConfigManager) saveConfig(configPath string, format string) error {
	if cm.config == nil {
		return fmt.Errorf("é…ç½®ä¸ºç©º")
	}

	switch strings.ToLower(format) {
	case "yaml", "yml":
		return cm.saveYAML(configPath)
	case "json":
		return cm.saveJSON(configPath)
	case "toml":
		return cm.saveTOML(configPath)
	default:
		return fmt.Errorf("ä¸æ”¯æŒçš„æ ¼å¼: %s", format)
	}
}

// è¾…åŠ©æ–¹æ³•

func (cm *ConfigManager) isFormatEnabled(format string) bool {
	switch format {
	case constants.FormatXML:
		return cm.config.Formats.XML.Enabled
	case constants.FormatJSON:
		return cm.config.Formats.JSON.Enabled
	case constants.FormatTOML:
		return cm.config.Formats.TOML.Enabled
	case constants.FormatMarkdown:
		return cm.config.Formats.Markdown.Enabled
	default:
		return false
	}
}

func (cm *ConfigManager) saveYAML(configPath string) error {
	data, err := yaml.Marshal(cm.config)
	if err != nil {
		return fmt.Errorf("YAMLåºåˆ—åŒ–å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}
	return os.WriteFile(configPath, data, 0644)
}

func (cm *ConfigManager) saveJSON(configPath string) error {
	data, err := json.MarshalIndent(cm.config, "", " ")
	if err != nil {
		return fmt.Errorf("JSONåºåˆ—åŒ–å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}
	return os.WriteFile(configPath, data, 0644)
}

func (cm *ConfigManager) saveTOML(configPath string) error {
	file, err := os.Create(configPath)
	if err != nil {
		return fmt.Errorf("åˆ›å»ºæ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}
	defer file.Close()

	encoder := toml.NewEncoder(file)
	if err := encoder.Encode(cm.config); err != nil {
		return fmt.Errorf("TOMLç¼–ç å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}
	return nil
}

func (cm *ConfigManager) generateXML(data types.ContextData) (string, error) {
	// è·å–XMLé…ç½®
	xmlConfig := cm.config.Formats.XML
	
	var sb strings.Builder
	
	// æ·»åŠ XMLå£°æ˜
	if xmlConfig.Formatting.Declaration {
		encoding := xmlConfig.Formatting.Encoding
		if encoding == "" {
			encoding = "UTF-8"
		}
		sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(`<?xml version="1.0" encoding="%s"?>`, encoding))
		sb.WriteString("\n")
	}
	
	// ç”Ÿæˆæ ¹å…ƒç´ 
	rootTag := xmlConfig.RootTag
	if rootTag == "" {
		rootTag = "context"
	}
	
	sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("<%s>\n", rootTag))
	
	// ç”Ÿæˆå…ƒæ•°æ®
	if data.Metadata != nil {
		sb.WriteString(" <metadata>\n")
		for key, value := range data.Metadata {
			sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" <%s>%v</%s>\n", key, value, key))
		}
		sb.WriteString(" </metadata>\n")
	}
	
	// ç”Ÿæˆæ–‡ä»¶éƒ¨åˆ†
	if len(data.Files) > 0 {
		filesTag := xmlConfig.FilesTag
		if filesTag == "" {
			filesTag = "files"
		}
		sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" <%s>\n", filesTag))
		
		fileTag := xmlConfig.FileTag
		if fileTag == "" {
			fileTag = "file"
		}
		
		for _, file := range data.Files {
			sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" <%s>\n", fileTag))
			
			// è·å–å­—æ®µæ˜ å°„
			pathField := xmlConfig.Fields["path"]
			if pathField == "" {
				pathField = "path"
			}
			sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" <%s>%s</%s>\n", pathField, escapeXML(file.Path), pathField))
			
			if file.Content != "" {
				contentField := xmlConfig.Fields["content"]
				if contentField == "" {
					contentField = "content"
				}
				sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" <%s><![CDATA[%s]]></%s>\n", contentField, file.Content, contentField))
			}
			
			sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" </%s>\n", fileTag))
		}
		sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" </%s>\n", filesTag))
	}
	
	// ç”Ÿæˆæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹éƒ¨åˆ†
	if len(data.Folders) > 0 {
		folderTag := xmlConfig.FolderTag
		if folderTag == "" {
			folderTag = "folder"
		}
		
		for _, folder := range data.Folders {
			sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" <%s>\n", folderTag))
			
			pathField := xmlConfig.Fields["path"]
			if pathField == "" {
				pathField = "path"
			}
			sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" <%s>%s</%s>\n", pathField, escapeXML(folder.Path), pathField))
			
			if len(folder.Files) > 0 {
				filesTag := xmlConfig.FilesTag
				if filesTag == "" {
					filesTag = "files"
				}
				sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" <%s>\n", filesTag))
				
				fileTag := xmlConfig.FileTag
				if fileTag == "" {
					fileTag = "file"
				}
				
				for _, file := range folder.Files {
					sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" <%s>\n", fileTag))
					
					filenameField := xmlConfig.Fields["filename"]
					if filenameField == "" {
						filenameField = "filename"
					}
					sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" <%s>%s</%s>\n", filenameField, escapeXML(file.Name), filenameField))
					
					if file.Content != "" {
						contentField := xmlConfig.Fields["content"]
						if contentField == "" {
							contentField = "content"
						}
						sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" <%s><![CDATA[%s]]></%s>\n", contentField, file.Content, contentField))
					}
					
					sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" </%s>\n", fileTag))
				}
				sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" </%s>\n", filesTag))
			}
			
			sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" </%s>\n", folderTag))
		}
	}
	
	sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("</%s>", rootTag))
	
	return sb.String(), nil
}

// escapeXML è½¬ä¹‰XMLç‰¹æ®Šå­—ç¬¦
func escapeXML(s string) string {
	s = strings.ReplaceAll(s, "&", "&amp;")
	s = strings.ReplaceAll(s, "<", "&lt;")
	s = strings.ReplaceAll(s, ">", "&gt;")
	s = strings.ReplaceAll(s, "\"", "&quot;")
	s = strings.ReplaceAll(s, "'", "&apos;")
	return s
}

func (cm *ConfigManager) generateJSON(data types.ContextData) (string, error) {
	// å®ç°JSONç”Ÿæˆé€»è¾‘
	output, err := json.MarshalIndent(data, "", " ")
	if err != nil {
		return "", fmt.Errorf("JSONç”Ÿæˆå¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}
	return string(output), nil
}

func (cm *ConfigManager) generateTOML(data types.ContextData) (string, error) {
	// å®ç°TOMLç”Ÿæˆé€»è¾‘
	var buf strings.Builder
	encoder := toml.NewEncoder(&buf)
	if err := encoder.Encode(data); err != nil {
		return "", fmt.Errorf("TOMLç”Ÿæˆå¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}
	return buf.String(), nil
}

func (cm *ConfigManager) generateMarkdown(data types.ContextData) (string, error) {
	// å®ç°Markdownç”Ÿæˆé€»è¾‘
	var sb strings.Builder

	// æ·»åŠ æ–‡ä»¶éƒ¨åˆ†
	for _, file := range data.Files {
		sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("## æ–‡ä»¶: %s\n\n", file.Path))
		sb.WriteString("```\n")
		sb.WriteString(file.Content)
		sb.WriteString("\n```\n\n")
	}

	// æ·»åŠ æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹éƒ¨åˆ†
	for _, folder := range data.Folders {
		sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("### æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹: %s\n\n", folder.Path))
		for _, file := range folder.Files {
			sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("#### æ–‡ä»¶: %s\n\n", file.Name))
			sb.WriteString("```\n")
			sb.WriteString(file.Content)
			sb.WriteString("\n```\n\n")
		}
	}

	return sb.String(), nil
}

// LoadConfig ä»æ–‡ä»¶åŠ è½½é…ç½®ï¼ˆè¾…åŠ©å‡½æ•°ï¼‰
func LoadConfig(configPath string) (*types.Config, error) {
	data, err := os.ReadFile(configPath)
	if err != nil {
		return nil, fmt.Errorf("è¯»å–é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}

	ext := strings.ToLower(filepath.Ext(configPath))
	var config types.Config

	switch ext {
	case ".yaml", ".yml":
		if err := yaml.Unmarshal(data, &config); err != nil {
			return nil, fmt.Errorf("YAMLè§£æå¤±è´¥: %w", err)
		}
	case ".json":
		if err := json.Unmarshal(data, &config); err != nil {
			return nil, fmt.Errorf("JSONè§£æå¤±è´¥: %w", err)
		}
	case ".toml":
		if _, err := toml.Decode(string(data), &config); err != nil {
			return nil, fmt.Errorf("TOMLè§£æå¤±è´¥: %w", err)
		}
	default:
		return nil, fmt.Errorf("ä¸æ”¯æŒçš„é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶æ ¼å¼: %s", ext)
	}

	return &config, nil
}

// GetDefaultConfig è·å–é»˜è®¤é…ç½®
func GetDefaultConfig() *types.Config {
	return &types.Config{
		Formats: types.FormatsConfig{
			XML: types.XMLFormatConfig{
			Enabled: true,
			RootTag: "context",
			FileTag: "file",
			FilesTag: "files",
			FolderTag: "folder",
			Fields: map[string]string{
				"path": "path",
				"content": "content",
				"filename": "filename",
			},
			Formatting: types.XMLFormattingConfig{
				Indent: " ",
				Declaration: true,
				Encoding: "UTF-8",
			},
		},
			JSON: types.FormatConfig{
				Enabled: true,
				Structure: map[string]interface{}{
					"file": "file",
					"folder": "folder",
				},
				Fields: map[string]string{
					"path": "path",
					"content": "content",
					"filename": "filename",
				},
			},
			TOML: types.FormatConfig{
				Enabled: true,
				Structure: map[string]interface{}{
					"file_section": "file",
					"folder_section": "folder",
				},
				Fields: map[string]string{
					"path": "path",
					"content": "content",
					"filename": "filename",
				},
			},
			Markdown: types.FormatConfig{
				Enabled: true,
				Structure: map[string]interface{}{
					"file_header": "##",
					"folder_header": "###",
					"code_block": "```",
				},
				Formatting: map[string]interface{}{
					"separator": "\n\n",
					"add_toc": false,
					"code_language": true,
				},
			},
		},
		Fields: types.FieldsConfig{
			CustomNames: map[string]string{
				"filepath": "path",
				"filecontent": "content",
				"filename": "name",
			},
			Filter: struct {
				Include []string `yaml:"include" json:"include" toml:"include"`
				Exclude []string `yaml:"exclude" json:"exclude" toml:"exclude"`
			}{
				Include: []string{},
				Exclude: []string{},
			},
			Processing: struct {
				MaxLength int `yaml:"max_length" json:"max_length" toml:"max_length"`
				AddLineNumbers bool `yaml:"add_line_numbers" json:"add_line_numbers" toml:"add_line_numbers"`
				TrimWhitespace bool `yaml:"trim_whitespace" json:"trim_whitespace" toml:"trim_whitespace"`
				CodeHighlight bool `yaml:"code_highlight" json:"code_highlight" toml:"code_highlight"`
			}{
				MaxLength: 0,
				AddLineNumbers: false,
				TrimWhitespace: true,
				CodeHighlight: false,
			},
		},
		Filters: types.FiltersConfig{
			MaxFileSize: "10MB",
			ExcludePatterns: constants.DefaultExcludePatterns,
			IncludePatterns: []string{},
			MaxDepth: constants.DefaultMaxDepth,
			FollowSymlinks: false,
			ExcludeBinary: true, // é»˜è®¤æ’é™¤äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶
		},
		Output: types.OutputConfig{
			DefaultFormat: constants.DefaultFormat,
			OutputDir: constants.DefaultOutputDir,
			FilenameTemplate: constants.DefaultFilenameTemplate,
			TimestampFormat: constants.DefaultTimestampFormat,
		},
		UI: types.UIConfig{
			Selector: struct {
				ShowHidden bool `yaml:"show_hidden" json:"show_hidden" toml:"show_hidden"`
				ShowSize bool `yaml:"show_size" json:"show_size" toml:"show_size"`
				ShowModified bool `yaml:"show_modified" json:"show_modified" toml:"show_modified"`
			}{
				ShowHidden: constants.DefaultShowHidden,
				ShowSize: constants.DefaultShowSize,
				ShowModified: constants.DefaultShowModified,
			},
			Autocomplete: struct {
				Enabled bool `yaml:"enabled" json:"enabled" toml:"enabled"`
				MinChars int `yaml:"min_chars" json:"min_chars" toml:"min_chars"`
				MaxSuggestions int `yaml:"max_suggestions" json:"max_suggestions" toml:"max_suggestions"`
			}{

			},

// TestConfigManager_Load æµ‹è¯•åŠ è½½é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶
func TestConfigManager_Load(t *testing.T) {
	// åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶
	tempDir := t.TempDir()
	yamlConfig := filepath.Join(tempDir, "test.yaml")

	// åˆ›å»ºæµ‹è¯•é…ç½®æ•°æ®
	testConfig := GetDefaultConfig()
	testConfig.Output.DefaultFormat = "json"
	testConfig.Output.OutputDir = "./test_output"

	// ä¿å­˜ä¸ºYAMLé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶
	err := os.WriteFile(yamlConfig, []byte(`formats:

 enabled: true
 json:
 enabled: true
 toml:
 enabled: true
 markdown:
 enabled: true
fields:
 custom_names: {}
 filter:

 exclude: []
 processing:
 max_length: 0
 add_line_numbers: false
 trim_whitespace: true
 code_highlight: false
filters:

 exclude_patterns: []
 include_patterns: []
 max_depth: 0

output:

ui:

 show_modified: false
 autocomplete:
 enabled: true
 min_chars: 1
 max_suggestions: 10
`), 0644)
	if err != nil {
		t.Fatalf("åˆ›å»ºæµ‹è¯•é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥: %v", err)
	}

	tests := []struct {
		name string
		configPath string
		wantErr bool
	}{
		{"åŠ è½½YAMLé…ç½®", yamlConfig, false},
		{"åŠ è½½ä¸å­˜åœ¨çš„æ–‡ä»¶", filepath.Join(tempDir, "nonexistent.yaml"), false}, // åº”è¯¥åˆ›å»ºé»˜è®¤é…ç½®
		{"ç©ºè·¯å¾„", "", false}, // åº”è¯¥ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤é…ç½®
	}

	for _, tt := range tests {
		t.Run(tt.name, func(t *testing.T) {
			manager := NewManager()
			err := manager.Load(tt.configPath)
			
			if tt.wantErr && err == nil {
				t.Errorf("Load() æœŸæœ›é”™è¯¯ä½†æ²¡æœ‰å¾—åˆ°é”™è¯¯")
			}
			if !tt.wantErr && err != nil {
				t.Errorf("Load() å‡ºç°æ„å¤–é”™è¯¯: %v", err)
			}
		})
	}
}

func TestConfigManager_Save(t *testing.T) {
	tempDir := t.TempDir()
	
	tests := []struct {
		name string
		format string
		wantErr bool
	}{

		{"ä¿å­˜ä¸ºJSON", "json", false},
		{"ä¿å­˜ä¸ºTOML", "toml", false},
		{"ä¿å­˜ä¸ºä¸æ”¯æŒçš„æ ¼å¼", "unsupported", true},
	}

	for _, tt := range tests {
		t.Run(tt.name, func(t *testing.T) {
			manager := NewManager()
			configPath := filepath.Join(tempDir, "test."+tt.format)
			
			err := manager.Save(configPath, tt.format)
			
			if tt.wantErr && err == nil {
				t.Errorf("Save() æœŸæœ›é”™è¯¯ä½†æ²¡æœ‰å¾—åˆ°é”™è¯¯")
			}
			if !tt.wantErr && err != nil {
				t.Errorf("Save() å‡ºç°æ„å¤–é”™è¯¯: %v", err)
			}
			
			if !tt.wantErr {
				// éªŒè¯æ–‡ä»¶å·²åˆ›å»º
				if _, err := os.Stat(configPath); os.IsNotExist(err) {
					t.Errorf("Save() æœªåˆ›å»ºæ–‡ä»¶: %s", configPath)
				}
			}
		})
	}
}

// TestConfigManager_GetEnvOverrides æµ‹è¯•è·å–ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡è¦†ç›–
func TestConfigManager_GetEnvOverrides(t *testing.T) {
	// è®¾ç½®æµ‹è¯•ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
	os.Setenv(constants.EnvPrefix+"DEFAULT_FORMAT", "json")
	os.Setenv(constants.EnvPrefix+"OUTPUT_DIR", "/test/output")
	os.Setenv(constants.EnvPrefix+"MAX_DEPTH", "5")
	
	// æ¸…ç†ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
	defer func() {
		os.Unsetenv(constants.EnvPrefix + "DEFAULT_FORMAT")
		os.Unsetenv(constants.EnvPrefix + "OUTPUT_DIR")
		os.Unsetenv(constants.EnvPrefix + "MAX_DEPTH")
	}()
	
	manager := NewManager()
	overrides := manager.GetEnvOverrides()
	
	if overrides == nil {
		t.Fatal("GetEnvOverrides() è¿”å› nil")
	}
	
	// éªŒè¯ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡è¦†ç›–
	if overrides["default_format"] != "json" {
		t.Errorf("æœŸæœ› default_format = json, å¾—åˆ° %s", overrides["default_format"])
	}
	if overrides["output_dir"] != "/test/output" {
		t.Errorf("æœŸæœ› output_dir = /test/output, å¾—åˆ° %s", overrides["output_dir"])
	}
	if overrides["max_depth"] != "5" {
		t.Errorf("æœŸæœ› max_depth = 5, å¾—åˆ° %s", overrides["max_depth"])
	}
}

	manager := NewManager()

// è¾…åŠ©å‡½æ•°
func contains(s, substr string) bool {
	return len(s) >= len(substr) && (s == substr || len(s) > 0 && containsHelper(s, substr))
}

func containsHelper(s, substr string) bool {
	for i := 0; i <= len(s)-len(substr); i++ {
		if s[i:i+len(substr)] == substr {
			return true
		}
	}
	return false

// TestLoadEnv æµ‹è¯•åŠ è½½.envæ–‡ä»¶åŠŸèƒ½
func TestLoadEnv(t *testing.T) {
	// ä¿å­˜åŸå§‹ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
	originalEnv := make(map[string]string)
	for _, key := range []string{"TEST_KEY_1", "TEST_KEY_2", "CODE_CONTEXT_DEFAULT_FORMAT"} {
		originalEnv[key] = os.Getenv(key)
	}
	
	// æµ‹è¯•ç”¨ä¾‹ç»“æŸåæ¢å¤åŸå§‹ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
	defer func() {
		for key, value := range originalEnv {
			if value == "" {
				os.Unsetenv(key)
			} else {
				os.Setenv(key, value)
			}
		}
		// åˆ é™¤æµ‹è¯•æ–‡ä»¶
		os.Remove(".env")
		os.Remove("test.env")
	}()

	tests := []struct {
		name string
		envPath string
		envContent string
		expectedError bool
	}{
		{
			name: "åŠ è½½ä¸å­˜åœ¨çš„.envæ–‡ä»¶",
			envPath: "",
			envContent: "",
			expectedError: false, // ä¸åº”è¯¥æŠ¥é”™
		},
		{
			name: "åŠ è½½å­˜åœ¨çš„.envæ–‡ä»¶",
			envPath: ".env",
			envContent: "TEST_KEY_1=value1\nTEST_KEY_2=value2\n",
			expectedError: false,
		},
		{
			name: "åŠ è½½æŒ‡å®šè·¯å¾„çš„.envæ–‡ä»¶",
			envPath: "test.env",
			envContent: "CODE_CONTEXT_DEFAULT_FORMAT=json\n",
			expectedError: false,
		},
	}

	for _, tt := range tests {
		t.Run(tt.name, func(t *testing.T) {
			// æ¸…ç†ç¯å¢ƒ
			os.Unsetenv("TEST_KEY_1")
			os.Unsetenv("TEST_KEY_2")
			os.Unsetenv("CODE_CONTEXT_DEFAULT_FORMAT")
			
			// å¦‚æœæŒ‡å®šäº†å†…å®¹ï¼Œåˆ›å»º.envæ–‡ä»¶
			if tt.envContent != "" && tt.envPath != "" {
				err := os.WriteFile(tt.envPath, []byte(tt.envContent), 0644)
				if err != nil {
					t.Fatalf("åˆ›å»ºæµ‹è¯•æ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥: %v", err)
				}
			}

			err := LoadEnv(tt.envPath)
			if (err != nil) != tt.expectedError {
				t.Errorf("LoadEnv() error = %v, expectedError %v", err, tt.expectedError)
			}

			// éªŒè¯ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡æ˜¯å¦æ­£ç¡®è®¾ç½®
			if tt.envContent != "" && err == nil {
				lines := strings.Split(tt.envContent, "\n")
				for _, line := range lines {
					if line != "" && !strings.HasPrefix(line, "#") {
						parts := strings.SplitN(line, "=", 2)
						if len(parts) == 2 {
							key, expectedValue := parts[0], parts[1]
							actualValue := os.Getenv(key)
							if actualValue != expectedValue {
								t.Errorf("ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡ %s = %v, æœŸæœ› %v", key, actualValue, expectedValue)
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			// æ¸…ç†æµ‹è¯•æ–‡ä»¶
			if tt.envPath != "" && tt.envPath != ".env" {
				os.Remove(tt.envPath)
			}
		})
	}
}

// TestGetAllEnvVars æµ‹è¯•è·å–æ‰€æœ‰ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡é…ç½®
func TestGetAllEnvVars(t *testing.T) {
	// ä¿å­˜åŸå§‹ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
	originalValues := make(map[string]string)
	envKeys := []string{
		EnvDefaultFormat,
		EnvOutputDir,
		EnvFilenameTemplate,
		EnvTimestampFormat,
		EnvMaxFileSize,
		EnvMaxDepth,
		EnvRecursive,
		EnvIncludeHidden,
		EnvFollowSymlinks,
		EnvExcludeBinary,
		EnvExcludePatterns,
		EnvAutocompleteEnabled,
	}
	
	for _, key := range envKeys {
		originalValues[key] = os.Getenv(key)
	}
	
	defer func() {
		// æ¢å¤åŸå§‹ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
		for key, value := range originalValues {
			if value == "" {
				os.Unsetenv(key)
			} else {
				os.Setenv(key, value)
			}
		}
	}()

	// è®¾ç½®ä¸€äº›æµ‹è¯•ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
	os.Setenv(EnvDefaultFormat, "json")
	os.Setenv(EnvOutputDir, "/tmp/output")
	os.Setenv(EnvMaxFileSize, "20MB")
	os.Setenv(EnvMaxDepth, "5")
	os.Setenv(EnvRecursive, "true")
	os.Setenv(EnvIncludeHidden, "true")
	os.Setenv(EnvFollowSymlinks, "true")
	os.Setenv(EnvExcludeBinary, "false")
	os.Setenv(EnvExcludePatterns, "*.tmp,*.log")
	os.Setenv(EnvAutocompleteEnabled, "false")

	result := GetAllEnvVars()

	// éªŒè¯ç»“æœ
	if result[EnvDefaultFormat] != "json" {
		t.Errorf("GetAllEnvVars()[%s] = %v, æœŸæœ› %v", EnvDefaultFormat, result[EnvDefaultFormat], "json")
	}
	
	if result[EnvOutputDir] != "/tmp/output" {

func TestApplyEnvOverrides(t *testing.T) {

		for key, value := range originalValues {

	}

	}

	}
}

import (
	"fmt"
	"os"

	"github.com/joho/godotenv"

)

// ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡å¸¸é‡å®šä¹‰
const (
	// æ ¼å¼é…ç½®
	EnvDefaultFormat = constants.EnvPrefix + "DEFAULT_FORMAT"
	
	// è¾“å‡ºé…ç½®
	EnvOutputDir = constants.EnvPrefix + "OUTPUT_DIR"
	EnvFilenameTemplate = constants.EnvPrefix + "FILENAME_TEMPLATE"
	EnvTimestampFormat = constants.EnvPrefix + "TIMESTAMP_FORMAT"

	EnvMaxDepth = constants.EnvPrefix + "MAX_DEPTH"
	EnvRecursive = constants.EnvPrefix + "RECURSIVE"
	EnvIncludeHidden = constants.EnvPrefix + "INCLUDE_HIDDEN"
	EnvFollowSymlinks = constants.EnvPrefix + "FOLLOW_SYMLINKS"
	EnvExcludeBinary = constants.EnvPrefix + "EXCLUDE_BINARY"
	EnvExcludePatterns = constants.EnvPrefix + "EXCLUDE_PATTERNS"
	
	// è‡ªåŠ¨è¡¥å…¨é…ç½®
	EnvAutocompleteEnabled = constants.EnvPrefix + "AUTOCOMPLETE_ENABLED"
)

// LoadEnv åŠ è½½.envæ–‡ä»¶åˆ°ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡ä¸­
func LoadEnv(envPath string) error {
	// å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰æŒ‡å®šè·¯å¾„ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤çš„.envæ–‡ä»¶
	if envPath == "" {
		envPath = ".env"
	}

	// æ£€æŸ¥æ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
	if _, err := os.Stat(envPath); os.IsNotExist(err) {
		// å¦‚æœæ–‡ä»¶ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œä¸æŠ¥é”™ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›
		return nil
	}

	// åŠ è½½.envæ–‡ä»¶
	if err := godotenv.Load(envPath); err != nil {
		return fmt.Errorf("åŠ è½½.envæ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}

	return nil
}

// GetEnvWithDefault è·å–ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸å­˜åœ¨åˆ™è¿”å›é»˜è®¤å€¼
func GetEnvWithDefault(key, defaultValue string) string {
	if value := os.Getenv(key); value != "" {
		return value
	}
	return defaultValue
}

// GetEnvBool è·å–å¸ƒå°”ç±»å‹çš„ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
func GetEnvBool(key string, defaultValue bool) bool {
	if value := os.Getenv(key); value != "" {
		if boolValue, err := strconv.ParseBool(value); err == nil {
			return boolValue
		}
	}
	return defaultValue
}

// GetEnvInt è·å–æ•´æ•°ç±»å‹çš„ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
func GetEnvInt(key string, defaultValue int) int {
	if value := os.Getenv(key); value != "" {
		if intValue, err := strconv.Atoi(value); err == nil {
			return intValue
		}
	}
	return defaultValue
}

// GetEnvInt64 è·å–int64ç±»å‹çš„ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
func GetEnvInt64(key string, defaultValue int64) int64 {
	if value := os.Getenv(key); value != "" {
		if intValue, err := strconv.ParseInt(value, 10, 64); err == nil {
			return intValue
		}
	}
	return defaultValue
}

// ParseFileSize è§£ææ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°å­—ç¬¦ä¸² (ä¾‹å¦‚: "10MB", "1KB")
func ParseFileSize(sizeStr string) int64 {
	sizeStr = strings.TrimSpace(strings.ToUpper(sizeStr))
	
	if sizeStr == "" {
		return 0
	}

	// æå–æ•°å­—éƒ¨åˆ†å’Œå•ä½éƒ¨åˆ†
	var numStr string
	var unit string
	
	for i, char := range sizeStr {
		if char >= '0' && char <= '9' {
			numStr += string(char)
		} else {
			unit = strings.TrimSpace(sizeStr[i:])
			break
		}
	}

	if numStr == "" {
		return 0
	}

	size, err := strconv.ParseInt(numStr, 10, 64)
	if err != nil {
		return 0
	}

	// æ ¹æ®å•ä½è½¬æ¢
	switch unit {
	case "B", "":
		return size
	case "KB":
		return size * 1024
	case "MB":
		return size * 1024 * 1024
	case "GB":
		return size * 1024 * 1024 * 1024
	default:
		return size // é»˜è®¤æŒ‰å­—èŠ‚å¤„ç†
	}
}

// GetAllEnvVars è·å–æ‰€æœ‰ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡é…ç½®
func GetAllEnvVars() map[string]string {
	envVars := make(map[string]string)
	
	// æ ¼å¼é…ç½®
	envVars[EnvDefaultFormat] = GetEnvWithDefault(EnvDefaultFormat, "xml")
	
	// è¾“å‡ºé…ç½®
	envVars[EnvOutputDir] = GetEnvWithDefault(EnvOutputDir, "")
	envVars[EnvFilenameTemplate] = GetEnvWithDefault(EnvFilenameTemplate, "")
	envVars[EnvTimestampFormat] = GetEnvWithDefault(EnvTimestampFormat, "")
	
	// æ–‡ä»¶å¤„ç†é…ç½®
	envVars[EnvMaxFileSize] = GetEnvWithDefault(EnvMaxFileSize, "")
	envVars[EnvMaxDepth] = GetEnvWithDefault(EnvMaxDepth, "")
	envVars[EnvRecursive] = strconv.FormatBool(GetEnvBool(EnvRecursive, false))
	envVars[EnvIncludeHidden] = strconv.FormatBool(GetEnvBool(EnvIncludeHidden, false))
	envVars[EnvFollowSymlinks] = strconv.FormatBool(GetEnvBool(EnvFollowSymlinks, false))
	envVars[EnvExcludeBinary] = strconv.FormatBool(GetEnvBool(EnvExcludeBinary, true))
	envVars[EnvExcludePatterns] = GetEnvWithDefault(EnvExcludePatterns, "")
	
	// è‡ªåŠ¨è¡¥å…¨é…ç½®
	envVars[EnvAutocompleteEnabled] = strconv.FormatBool(GetEnvBool(EnvAutocompleteEnabled, true))
	
	return envVars
}

package filesystem

import (
	"fmt"
	"io"
	"os"
	"path/filepath"
	"strings"
	"sync"
	"time"

	"code-context-generator/internal/utils"
	"code-context-generator/pkg/constants"
	"code-context-generator/pkg/types"
)

// Walker æ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿéå†å™¨æ¥å£
type Walker interface {
	Walk(rootPath string, options *types.WalkOptions) (*types.ContextData, error)
	GetFileInfo(path string) (*types.FileInfo, error)
	GetFolderInfo(path string) (*types.FolderInfo, error)
	FilterFiles(files []string, patterns []string) []string
	FilterBySize(path string, maxSize int64) bool
}

// FileSystemWalker æ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿéå†å™¨å®ç°
type FileSystemWalker struct {
	mu sync.RWMutex
}

// NewWalker åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„æ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿéå†å™¨
func NewWalker() Walker {
	return &FileSystemWalker{}
}

// NewFileSystemWalker åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„æ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿéå†å™¨ï¼ˆåˆ«åï¼‰
func NewFileSystemWalker(options types.WalkOptions) Walker {
	return &FileSystemWalker{}
}

// Walk éå†æ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿ
func (w *FileSystemWalker) Walk(rootPath string, options *types.WalkOptions) (*types.ContextData, error) {
	if options == nil {
		options = &types.WalkOptions{
			MaxDepth: constants.DefaultMaxDepth,
			MaxFileSize: 10 * 1024 * 1024,
			ExcludePatterns: constants.DefaultExcludePatterns,
			IncludePatterns: []string{},
			FollowSymlinks: false,
		}
	}

	// éªŒè¯æ ¹è·¯å¾„
	if _, err := os.Stat(rootPath); err != nil {
		return nil, fmt.Errorf("æ ¹è·¯å¾„ä¸å­˜åœ¨: %w", err)
	}

	var contextData types.ContextData
	var wg sync.WaitGroup
	var mu sync.Mutex
	var walkErrors []error
	
	// åˆå§‹åŒ–contextDataçš„ç»Ÿè®¡ä¿¡æ¯
	contextData.Files = []types.FileInfo{}
	contextData.Folders = []types.FolderInfo{}
	contextData.Metadata = make(map[string]interface{})

	// éå†æ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿ
	err := filepath.Walk(rootPath, func(path string, info os.FileInfo, err error) error {
		if err != nil {
			walkErrors = append(walkErrors, err)
			return nil // ç»§ç»­éå†
		}

		// æ£€æŸ¥æ·±åº¦é™åˆ¶
		relPath, err := filepath.Rel(rootPath, path)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}

		depth := strings.Count(relPath, string(os.PathSeparator))
		if options.MaxDepth > 0 && depth >= options.MaxDepth {
			if info.IsDir() {
				return filepath.SkipDir
			}
			// è·³è¿‡æ·±åº¦è¶…è¿‡é™åˆ¶çš„æ–‡ä»¶
			return nil
		}

		// å¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶
		if !info.IsDir() {
			wg.Add(1)
			go func(filePath string) {
				defer wg.Done()

				// åº”ç”¨è¿‡æ»¤å™¨
				if !w.shouldIncludeFile(filePath, options) {
					return
				}

				// è·å–æ–‡ä»¶ä¿¡æ¯
				fileInfo, err := w.GetFileInfo(filePath)
				if err != nil {
					mu.Lock()
					walkErrors = append(walkErrors, fmt.Errorf("è·å–æ–‡ä»¶ä¿¡æ¯å¤±è´¥ %s: %w", filePath, err))
					mu.Unlock()
					return
				}

				mu.Lock()
				contextData.Files = append(contextData.Files, *fileInfo)
				contextData.FileCount++
				contextData.TotalSize += fileInfo.Size
				mu.Unlock()
			}(path)
		} else {
			// å¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹
			if path != rootPath { // è·³è¿‡æ ¹è·¯å¾„
				folderInfo, err := w.GetFolderInfo(path)
				if err != nil {
					mu.Lock()
					walkErrors = append(walkErrors, fmt.Errorf("è·å–æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¿¡æ¯å¤±è´¥ %s: %w", path, err))
					mu.Unlock()
					return nil
				}

				mu.Lock()
				contextData.Folders = append(contextData.Folders, *folderInfo)
				contextData.FolderCount++
				mu.Unlock()
			}
		}

		return nil
	})

	wg.Wait()

	if err != nil {
		return nil, fmt.Errorf("éå†æ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿå¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}

	if len(walkErrors) > 0 {
		// è®°å½•é”™è¯¯ä½†ä¸ä¸­æ–­æµç¨‹
		fmt.Printf("éå†è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­é‡åˆ° %d ä¸ªé”™è¯¯\n", len(walkErrors))
		for _, e := range walkErrors {
			fmt.Printf(" - %v\n", e)
		}
	}

	return &contextData, nil
}

// GetFileInfo è·å–æ–‡ä»¶ä¿¡æ¯
func (w *FileSystemWalker) GetFileInfo(path string) (*types.FileInfo, error) {
	info, err := os.Stat(path)
	if err != nil {
		return nil, fmt.Errorf("è·å–æ–‡ä»¶çŠ¶æ€å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}

	// æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºäºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶
	isBinary := !utils.IsTextFile(path)
	
	var content string
	if !isBinary {
		// åªè¯»å–æ–‡æœ¬æ–‡ä»¶çš„å†…å®¹
		fileContent, err := os.ReadFile(path)
		if err != nil {
			return nil, fmt.Errorf("è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
		}
		content = string(fileContent)
	}

	return &types.FileInfo{
		Path: path,
		Name: info.Name(),
		Size: info.Size(),
		ModTime: info.ModTime(),
		IsDir: info.IsDir(),
		Content: content,
		IsBinary: isBinary,
	}, nil
}

// GetFolderInfo è·å–æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¿¡æ¯
func (w *FileSystemWalker) GetFolderInfo(path string) (*types.FolderInfo, error) {
	info, err := os.Stat(path)
	if err != nil {
		return nil, fmt.Errorf("è·å–æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹çŠ¶æ€å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}

	// è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹å†…å®¹
	entries, err := os.ReadDir(path)
	if err != nil {
		return nil, fmt.Errorf("è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹å†…å®¹å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}

	var files []types.FileInfo
	for _, entry := range entries {
		if !entry.IsDir() {
			filePath := filepath.Join(path, entry.Name())
			fileInfo, err := w.GetFileInfo(filePath)
			if err != nil {
				continue // è·³è¿‡æ— æ³•è¯»å–çš„æ–‡ä»¶
			}
			files = append(files, *fileInfo)
		}
	}

	return &types.FolderInfo{
		Path: path,
		Name: info.Name(),
		ModTime: info.ModTime(),
		Files: files,
	}, nil
}

// FilterFiles æ ¹æ®æ¨¡å¼è¿‡æ»¤æ–‡ä»¶
func (w *FileSystemWalker) FilterFiles(files []string, patterns []string) []string {
	if len(patterns) == 0 {
		return files
	}

	var filtered []string
	for _, file := range files {
		for _, pattern := range patterns {
			matched, err := filepath.Match(pattern, filepath.Base(file))
			if err == nil && matched {
				filtered = append(filtered, file)
				break
			}
		}
	}

	return filtered
}

// FilterBySize æ ¹æ®æ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°è¿‡æ»¤
func (w *FileSystemWalker) FilterBySize(path string, maxSize int64) bool {
	info, err := os.Stat(path)
	if err != nil {
		return false
	}

	if maxSize <= 0 {
		return true // æ²¡æœ‰å¤§å°é™åˆ¶
	}

	return info.Size() <= maxSize
}

// è¾…åŠ©æ–¹æ³•

// shouldIncludeFile æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦åº”è¯¥åŒ…å«æ–‡ä»¶
func (w *FileSystemWalker) shouldIncludeFile(path string, options *types.WalkOptions) bool {
	// æ£€æŸ¥æ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°
	if !w.FilterBySize(path, options.MaxFileSize) {
		return false
	}

	// æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºäºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆå¦‚æœå¯ç”¨äº†äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶æ’é™¤ï¼‰
	if options.ExcludeBinary && utils.IsBinaryFile(path) {
		return false
	}

	// æ£€æŸ¥åŒ…å«æ¨¡å¼
	if len(options.IncludePatterns) > 0 {
		matched := false
		filename := filepath.Base(path)
		for _, pattern := range options.IncludePatterns {
			if matchedPattern, _ := filepath.Match(pattern, filename); matchedPattern {
				matched = true
				break
			}
		}
		if !matched {
			return false
		}
	}

	// æ£€æŸ¥æ’é™¤æ¨¡å¼
	if len(options.ExcludePatterns) > 0 {
		filename := filepath.Base(path)
		for _, pattern := range options.ExcludePatterns {
			if matchedPattern, _ := filepath.Match(pattern, filename); matchedPattern {
				return false
			}
		}
	}
	
	return true
}

// GetFileExtension è·å–æ–‡ä»¶æ‰©å±•å
func GetFileExtension(filename string) string {
	// éšè—æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆä»¥.å¼€å¤´ï¼‰æ²¡æœ‰æ‰©å±•å
	if strings.HasPrefix(filename, ".") && len(filename) > 1 {
		// æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦åŒ…å«å¦ä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹ï¼ˆå¦‚.gitignoreï¼‰
		lastDotIndex := strings.LastIndex(filename, ".")
		if lastDotIndex == 0 {
			// åªæœ‰å¼€å¤´çš„ç‚¹ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰æ‰©å±•å
			return ""
		}
	}
	return filepath.Ext(filename)
}

// IsHiddenFile æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºéšè—æ–‡ä»¶
func IsHiddenFile(filename string) bool {
	return strings.HasPrefix(filename, ".")
}

// GetFileSize è·å–æ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°
func GetFileSize(path string) (int64, error) {
	info, err := os.Stat(path)
	if err != nil {
		return 0, err
	}
	return info.Size(), nil
}

// GetFileModTime è·å–æ–‡ä»¶ä¿®æ”¹æ—¶é—´
func GetFileModTime(path string) (time.Time, error) {
	info, err := os.Stat(path)
	if err != nil {
		return time.Time{}, err
	}
	return info.ModTime(), nil
}

// IsDirectory æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç›®å½•
func IsDirectory(path string) bool {
	info, err := os.Stat(path)
	if err != nil {
		return false
	}
	return info.IsDir()
}

// IsSymlink æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç¬¦å·é“¾æ¥
func IsSymlink(path string) bool {
	info, err := os.Lstat(path)
	if err != nil {
		return false
	}
	return info.Mode()&os.ModeSymlink != 0
}

// GetSymlinkTarget è·å–ç¬¦å·é“¾æ¥ç›®æ ‡
func GetSymlinkTarget(path string) (string, error) {
	target, err := os.Readlink(path)
	if err != nil {
		return "", err
	}

	// å¦‚æœæ˜¯ç›¸å¯¹è·¯å¾„ï¼Œè½¬æ¢ä¸ºç»å¯¹è·¯å¾„
	if !filepath.IsAbs(target) {
		dir := filepath.Dir(path)
		target = filepath.Join(dir, target)
	}

	return filepath.Abs(target)
}

// CreateDirectory åˆ›å»ºç›®å½•
func CreateDirectory(path string) error {
	return os.MkdirAll(path, 0755)
}

// RemoveDirectory åˆ é™¤ç›®å½•
func RemoveDirectory(path string) error {
	return os.RemoveAll(path)
}

// CopyFile å¤åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶
func CopyFile(src, dst string) error {
	sourceFile, err := os.Open(src)
	if err != nil {
		return err
	}
	defer sourceFile.Close()

	destFile, err := os.Create(dst)
	if err != nil {
		return err
	}
	defer destFile.Close()

	_, err = io.Copy(destFile, sourceFile)
	return err
}

// MoveFile ç§»åŠ¨æ–‡ä»¶
func MoveFile(src, dst string) error {
	return os.Rename(src, dst)
}

// GetDirectorySize è·å–ç›®å½•å¤§å°
func GetDirectorySize(path string) (int64, error) {
	var size int64
	err := filepath.Walk(path, func(_ string, info os.FileInfo, err error) error {
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		if !info.IsDir() {
			size += info.Size()
		}
		return nil
	})
	return size, err
}

// GetDirectoryFileCount è·å–ç›®å½•ä¸­çš„æ–‡ä»¶æ•°é‡
func GetDirectoryFileCount(path string) (int, error) {
	count := 0
	err := filepath.Walk(path, func(_ string, info os.FileInfo, err error) error {
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		if !info.IsDir() {
			count++
		}
		return nil
	})
	return count, err
}

func TestGetDirectorySize(t *testing.T) {
	// åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶ç›®å½•
	tempDir, err := os.MkdirTemp("", "size_test")
	if err != nil {
		t.Fatal(err)
	}
	defer os.RemoveAll(tempDir)

	// åˆ›å»ºæµ‹è¯•æ–‡ä»¶
	testFiles := []struct {
		name string
		size int
	}{
		{"file1.txt", 100},
		{"file2.txt", 200},
		{"subdir/file3.txt", 150},
	}

	totalSize := 0
	for _, tf := range testFiles {
		filePath := filepath.Join(tempDir, tf.name)
		dir := filepath.Dir(filePath)
		if err := os.MkdirAll(dir, 0755); err != nil {
			t.Fatal(err)
		}

		data := make([]byte, tf.size)
		if err := os.WriteFile(filePath, data, 0644); err != nil {
			t.Fatal(err)
		}
		totalSize += tf.size
	}

	size, err := GetDirectorySize(tempDir)
	if err != nil {
		t.Fatalf("GetDirectorySize() error = %v", err)
	}

	if size != int64(totalSize) {
		t.Errorf("GetDirectorySize() = %v, want %v", size, totalSize)
	}
}

func TestFileSystemWalker_GetFileInfo(t *testing.T) {
	walker := &FileSystemWalker{}

	// åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
	tempFile, err := os.CreateTemp("", "test_file")
	if err != nil {
		t.Fatal(err)
	}
	defer os.Remove(tempFile.Name())

	// å†™å…¥æµ‹è¯•æ•°æ®
	testData := []byte("Test file content")
	if _, err := tempFile.Write(testData); err != nil {
		t.Fatal(err)
	}
	tempFile.Close()

	fileInfo, err := walker.GetFileInfo(tempFile.Name())
	if err != nil {
		t.Fatalf("GetFileInfo() error = %v", err)
	}

	// éªŒè¯æ–‡ä»¶ä¿¡æ¯
	if fileInfo.Path != tempFile.Name() {
		t.Errorf("GetFileInfo() Path = %v, want %v", fileInfo.Path, tempFile.Name())
	}

	if fileInfo.Size != int64(len(testData)) {
		t.Errorf("GetFileInfo() Size = %v, want %v", fileInfo.Size, len(testData))
	}

	if fileInfo.Content != string(testData) {
		t.Errorf("GetFileInfo() Content = %v, want %v", fileInfo.Content, string(testData))
	}

	if fileInfo.IsDir {
		t.Error("GetFileInfo() IsDir should be false for file")
	}
}

func TestFileSystemWalker_FilterFiles(t *testing.T) {
	walker := &FileSystemWalker{}

	files := []string{
		"/path/to/file1.txt",
		"/path/to/file2.go",
		"/path/to/test.log",
		"/path/to/config.yaml",
	}

	patterns := []string{"*.txt", "*.go"}

	filtered := walker.FilterFiles(files, patterns)

	expected := []string{
		"/path/to/file1.txt",
		"/path/to/file2.go",
	}

	if len(filtered) != len(expected) {
		t.Errorf("FilterFiles() returned %d files, want %d", len(filtered), len(expected))
	}

	for i, file := range filtered {
		if file != expected[i] {
			t.Errorf("FilterFiles()[%d] = %v, want %v", i, file, expected[i])
		}
	}
}

func TestFileSystemWalker_Walk(t *testing.T) {
	walker := &FileSystemWalker{}

	// åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶ç›®å½•ç»“æ„
	tempDir, err := os.MkdirTemp("", "walk_test")
	if err != nil {
		t.Fatal(err)
	}
	defer os.RemoveAll(tempDir)

	// åˆ›å»ºæµ‹è¯•æ–‡ä»¶ç»“æ„
	testStructure := map[string]string{
		"file1.txt": "content1",
		"file2.go": "content2",
		"subdir/file3.txt": "content3",
		"subdir/nested/file4.go": "content4",
	}

	for path, content := range testStructure {
		fullPath := filepath.Join(tempDir, path)
		dir := filepath.Dir(fullPath)
		if err := os.MkdirAll(dir, 0755); err != nil {
			t.Fatal(err)
		}

			t.Fatal(err)
		}
	}

	// æµ‹è¯•åŸºæœ¬éå†
	t.Run("basic walk", func(t *testing.T) {
		options := &types.WalkOptions{

			ExcludePatterns: []string{},
			IncludePatterns: []string{},
			ShowHidden: false,

		}

		// éªŒè¯æ–‡ä»¶æ•°é‡
		if len(contextData.Files) != len(testStructure) {
			t.Errorf("Walk() found %d files, want %d", len(contextData.Files), len(testStructure))
		}

		// éªŒè¯æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹æ•°é‡
		if len(contextData.Folders) != 2 { // subdir å’Œ subdir/nested
			t.Errorf("Walk() found %d folders, want 2", len(contextData.Folders))
		}
	})

	// æµ‹è¯•æ·±åº¦é™åˆ¶
	t.Run("depth limit", func(t *testing.T) {
		options := &types.WalkOptions{
			MaxDepth: 1,
			MaxFileSize: 1024 * 1024,
			ExcludePatterns: []string{},
			IncludePatterns: []string{},
			ShowHidden: false,
		}

		contextData, err := walker.Walk(tempDir, options)
		if err != nil {
			t.Fatalf("Walk() error = %v", err)
		}

		// åº”è¯¥åªæ‰¾åˆ°æ ¹ç›®å½•çš„æ–‡ä»¶
		expectedRootFiles := 2 // file1.txt å’Œ file2.go
		if len(contextData.Files) != expectedRootFiles {
			t.Errorf("Walk() with depth limit found %d files, want %d", len(contextData.Files), expectedRootFiles)
		}
	})

	// æµ‹è¯•åŒ…å«æ¨¡å¼
	t.Run("include patterns", func(t *testing.T) {
		options := &types.WalkOptions{
			MaxDepth: 3,
			MaxFileSize: 1024 * 1024,
			ExcludePatterns: []string{},
			IncludePatterns: []string{"*.txt"},
			ShowHidden: false,
		}

		contextData, err := walker.Walk(tempDir, options)
		if err != nil {
			t.Fatalf("Walk() error = %v", err)
		}

		// åº”è¯¥åªæ‰¾åˆ°.txtæ–‡ä»¶
		expectedTxtFiles := 2 // file1.txt å’Œ subdir/file3.txt
		if len(contextData.Files) != expectedTxtFiles {
			t.Errorf("Walk() with include patterns found %d files, want %d", len(contextData.Files), expectedTxtFiles)
		}
	})

	// æµ‹è¯•æ’é™¤æ¨¡å¼
	t.Run("exclude patterns", func(t *testing.T) {
		options := &types.WalkOptions{
			MaxDepth: 3,
			MaxFileSize: 1024 * 1024,
			ExcludePatterns: []string{"*.go"},
			IncludePatterns: []string{},
			ShowHidden: false,
		}

		contextData, err := walker.Walk(tempDir, options)
		if err != nil {
			t.Fatalf("Walk() error = %v", err)
		}

		// åº”è¯¥åªæ‰¾åˆ°é.goæ–‡ä»¶
		expectedNonGoFiles := 2 // file1.txt å’Œ subdir/file3.txt
		if len(contextData.Files) != expectedNonGoFiles {
			t.Errorf("Walk() with exclude patterns found %d files, want %d", len(contextData.Files), expectedNonGoFiles)
		}
	})

	// æµ‹è¯•å¤§å°é™åˆ¶
	t.Run("size limit", func(t *testing.T) {
		options := &types.WalkOptions{
			MaxDepth: 3,
			MaxFileSize: 5, // å¾ˆå°çš„é™åˆ¶ï¼ˆå°äº8å­—èŠ‚ï¼‰
			ExcludePatterns: []string{},
			IncludePatterns: []string{},
			ShowHidden: false,
		}

		contextData, err := walker.Walk(tempDir, options)
		if err != nil {
			t.Fatalf("Walk() error = %v", err)
		}

		// åº”è¯¥æ²¡æœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆæ‰€æœ‰æ–‡ä»¶éƒ½è¶…è¿‡5å­—èŠ‚ï¼‰
		if len(contextData.Files) != 0 {
			t.Errorf("Walk() with size limit found %d files, want 0", len(contextData.Files))

		{

			},
			expected: true, // æˆ‘ä»¬çš„æµ‹è¯•æ–‡ä»¶ä¸æ˜¯.tmp
		},
		{
			name: "include by pattern",

				IncludePatterns: []string{"*.tmp"},
				ExcludePatterns: []string{},
				ShowHidden: false,
			},
			expected: false, // æˆ‘ä»¬çš„æµ‹è¯•æ–‡ä»¶ä¸æ˜¯.tmp
		},
		{
			name: "size exceeded",
			options: &types.WalkOptions{
				MaxFileSize: 5, // å°äºæ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°
				IncludePatterns: []string{},

				ShowHidden: false,
			},
			expected: false,
		},
		{
			name: "hidden file",
			options: &types.WalkOptions{
				MaxFileSize: 1024 * 1024,
				IncludePatterns: []string{},
				ExcludePatterns: []string{},
				ShowHidden: false,
			},
			expected: true, // æˆ‘ä»¬çš„æµ‹è¯•æ–‡ä»¶ä¸æ˜¯éšè—æ–‡ä»¶
		},
	}

	for _, tt := range tests {
		t.Run(tt.name, func(t *testing.T) {

	}
}

package formatter

import (
	"encoding/json"

// Formatter æ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢å™¨æ¥å£
type Formatter interface {
	Format(data types.ContextData) (string, error)
	FormatFile(file types.FileInfo) (string, error)
	FormatFolder(folder types.FolderInfo) (string, error)
	GetName() string
	GetDescription() string
}

// BaseFormatter åŸºç¡€æ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢å™¨
type BaseFormatter struct {
	name string
	description string
	config *types.FormatConfig
}

// GetName è·å–æ ¼å¼åç§°
func (f *BaseFormatter) GetName() string {
	return f.name
}

// GetDescription è·å–æ ¼å¼æè¿°
func (f *BaseFormatter) GetDescription() string {
	return f.description
}

// applyCustomStructure åº”ç”¨è‡ªå®šä¹‰ç»“æ„
func (f *BaseFormatter) applyCustomStructure(data types.ContextData) interface{} {
	// æ ¹æ®é…ç½®åº”ç”¨è‡ªå®šä¹‰ç»“æ„
	if f.config != nil && f.config.Structure != nil {
		// åˆ›å»ºåŸºäºå®é™…æ•°æ®çš„è‡ªå®šä¹‰ç»“æ„
		result := make(map[string]interface{})
		
		// åº”ç”¨ç»“æ„æ˜ å°„
		if rootTag, ok := f.config.Structure["root"].(string); ok && rootTag != "" {
			result["XMLName"] = xml.Name{Local: rootTag}
		} else {
			result["XMLName"] = xml.Name{Local: "context"}
		}
		
		// æ˜ å°„æ–‡ä»¶å’Œæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹æ•°æ®
		if filesTag, ok := f.config.Structure["files"].(string); ok && filesTag != "" {
			result[filesTag] = map[string]interface{}{
				"file": data.Files,
			}
		} else {
			result["files"] = map[string]interface{}{
				"file": data.Files,
			}
		}
		
		if foldersTag, ok := f.config.Structure["folders"].(string); ok && foldersTag != "" {
			result[foldersTag] = map[string]interface{}{
				"folder": data.Folders,
			}
		} else {
			result["folders"] = map[string]interface{}{
				"folder": data.Folders,
			}
		}
		
		// æ·»åŠ ç»Ÿè®¡ä¿¡æ¯
		result["file_count"] = data.FileCount
		result["folder_count"] = data.FolderCount
		result["total_size"] = data.TotalSize
		
		return result
	}
	
	return data
}

// applyCustomFields åº”ç”¨è‡ªå®šä¹‰å­—æ®µæ˜ å°„
func (f *BaseFormatter) applyCustomFields(file types.FileInfo) interface{} {
	// æ ¹æ®é…ç½®åº”ç”¨è‡ªå®šä¹‰å­—æ®µæ˜ å°„
	if f.config != nil && f.config.Fields != nil {
		// è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥å®ç°å­—æ®µæ˜ å°„é€»è¾‘
		return f.config.Fields
	}
	return file
}

// JSONFormatter JSONæ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢å™¨

// NewJSONFormatter åˆ›å»ºJSONæ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢å™¨
func NewJSONFormatter(config *types.FormatConfig) Formatter {
	return &JSONFormatter{

			name: "JSON",
			description: "JavaScript Object Notation format",
			config: config,
		},
	}
}

// Format æ ¼å¼åŒ–ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡æ•°æ®
func (f *JSONFormatter) Format(data types.ContextData) (string, error) {
	if f.config != nil && f.config.Structure != nil {
		// ä½¿ç”¨è‡ªå®šä¹‰ç»“æ„
		customData := f.applyCustomStructure(data)
		output, err := json.MarshalIndent(customData, "", " ")
		if err != nil {
			return "", fmt.Errorf("JSONæ ¼å¼åŒ–å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
		}
		return string(output), nil
	}

	// é»˜è®¤ç»“æ„
	output, err := json.MarshalIndent(data, "", " ")
	if err != nil {
		return "", fmt.Errorf("JSONæ ¼å¼åŒ–å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}
	return string(output), nil
}

// FormatFile æ ¼å¼åŒ–å•ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶
func (f *JSONFormatter) FormatFile(file types.FileInfo) (string, error) {
	// å¦‚æœæ˜¯äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œä¸æ˜¾ç¤ºå†…å®¹
	if file.IsBinary {
		file.Content = "[äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶ - å†…å®¹æœªæ˜¾ç¤º]"
	}
	
	if f.config != nil && f.config.Fields != nil {
		// ä½¿ç”¨è‡ªå®šä¹‰å­—æ®µæ˜ å°„
		customFile := f.applyCustomFields(file)
		output, err := json.MarshalIndent(customFile, "", " ")
		if err != nil {
			return "", fmt.Errorf("JSONæ–‡ä»¶æ ¼å¼åŒ–å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
		}
		return string(output), nil
	}

	output, err := json.MarshalIndent(file, "", " ")
	if err != nil {
		return "", fmt.Errorf("JSONæ–‡ä»¶æ ¼å¼åŒ–å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}
	return string(output), nil
}

// FormatFolder æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹
func (f *JSONFormatter) FormatFolder(folder types.FolderInfo) (string, error) {

// XMLFormatter XMLæ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢å™¨
type XMLFormatter struct {
	BaseFormatter
}

// NewXMLFormatter åˆ›å»ºXMLæ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢å™¨
func NewXMLFormatter(config *types.FormatConfig) Formatter {
	return &XMLFormatter{
		BaseFormatter: BaseFormatter{
			name: "XML",
			description: "Extensible Markup Language format",
			config: config,
		},
	}
}

// Format æ ¼å¼åŒ–ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡æ•°æ®
func (f *XMLFormatter) Format(data types.ContextData) (string, error) {
	// åˆ›å»ºå¯åºåˆ—åŒ–çš„ç»“æ„ï¼Œé¿å…map[string]interface{}
	type SerializableContextData struct {
		XMLName xml.Name `xml:"context"`
		Files []types.FileInfo `xml:"files>file"`
		Folders []types.FolderInfo `xml:"folders>folder"`
		FileCount int `xml:"file_count"`
		FolderCount int `xml:"folder_count"`
		TotalSize int64 `xml:"total_size"`
	}

	serializableData := SerializableContextData{
		Files: data.Files,
		Folders: data.Folders,
		FileCount: data.FileCount,
		FolderCount: data.FolderCount,
		TotalSize: data.TotalSize,
	}

	if f.config != nil && f.config.Structure != nil {
		// ä½¿ç”¨è‡ªå®šä¹‰ç»“æ„
		customData := f.applyCustomStructure(data)
		output, err := xml.MarshalIndent(customData, "", " ")
		if err != nil {
			return "", fmt.Errorf("XMLæ ¼å¼åŒ–å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
		}
		return xml.Header + string(output), nil
	}

	// é»˜è®¤ç»“æ„
	output, err := xml.MarshalIndent(serializableData, "", " ")
	if err != nil {
		return "", fmt.Errorf("XMLæ ¼å¼åŒ–å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}
	return xml.Header + string(output), nil
}

// FormatFile æ ¼å¼åŒ–å•ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶
func (f *XMLFormatter) FormatFile(file types.FileInfo) (string, error) {
	// å¦‚æœæ˜¯äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œä¸æ˜¾ç¤ºå†…å®¹
	if file.IsBinary {
		file.Content = "[äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶ - å†…å®¹æœªæ˜¾ç¤º]"
	}
	
	output, err := xml.MarshalIndent(file, "", " ")
	if err != nil {
		return "", fmt.Errorf("XMLæ–‡ä»¶æ ¼å¼åŒ–å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}
	return xml.Header + string(output), nil
}

// FormatFolder æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹
func (f *XMLFormatter) FormatFolder(folder types.FolderInfo) (string, error) {
	output, err := xml.MarshalIndent(folder, "", " ")
	if err != nil {
		return "", fmt.Errorf("XMLæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹æ ¼å¼åŒ–å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}
	return xml.Header + string(output), nil
}

// TOMLFormatter TOMLæ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢å™¨
type TOMLFormatter struct {
	BaseFormatter
}

// NewTOMLFormatter åˆ›å»ºTOMLæ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢å™¨
func NewTOMLFormatter(config *types.FormatConfig) Formatter {
	return &TOMLFormatter{
		BaseFormatter: BaseFormatter{
			name: "TOML",
			description: "Tom's Obvious, Minimal Language format",
			config: config,
		},
	}
}

// Format æ ¼å¼åŒ–ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡æ•°æ®
func (f *TOMLFormatter) Format(data types.ContextData) (string, error) {
	var buf strings.Builder

	// å†™å…¥æ–‡ä»¶éƒ¨åˆ†
	if len(data.Files) > 0 {
		buf.WriteString("[files]\n")
		for i, file := range data.Files {
			buf.WriteString(" [[files.file]]\n")
			buf.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" path = \"%s\"\n", file.Path))
			buf.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" name = \"%s\"\n", file.Name))
			buf.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" size = %d\n", file.Size))
			buf.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" content = \"%s\"\n", escapeTOMLString(file.Content)))
			if i < len(data.Files)-1 {
				buf.WriteString("\n")
			}
		}
	}

	// å†™å…¥æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹éƒ¨åˆ†
	if len(data.Folders) > 0 {
		buf.WriteString("\n[folders]\n")
		for i, folder := range data.Folders {
			buf.WriteString(" [[folders.folder]]\n")
			buf.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" path = \"%s\"\n", folder.Path))
			buf.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" name = \"%s\"\n", folder.Name))
			buf.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf(" file_count = %d\n", len(folder.Files)))
			if i < len(data.Folders)-1 {
				buf.WriteString("\n")
			}
		}
	}

	return buf.String(), nil
}

// FormatFile æ ¼å¼åŒ–å•ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶
func (f *TOMLFormatter) FormatFile(file types.FileInfo) (string, error) {
	var buf strings.Builder

	buf.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("path = \"%s\"\n", file.Path))
	buf.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("name = \"%s\"\n", file.Name))
	buf.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("size = %d\n", file.Size))
	
	// å¦‚æœæ˜¯äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œä¸æ˜¾ç¤ºå†…å®¹
	if file.IsBinary {
		buf.WriteString("content = \"[äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶ - å†…å®¹æœªæ˜¾ç¤º]\"\n")
	} else {
		buf.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("content = \"%s\"\n", escapeTOMLString(file.Content)))
	}
	
	buf.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("mod_time = \"%s\"\n", file.ModTime.Format(time.RFC3339)))

	return buf.String(), nil
}

// FormatFolder æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹
func (f *TOMLFormatter) FormatFolder(folder types.FolderInfo) (string, error) {
	var buf strings.Builder

	buf.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("path = \"%s\"\n", folder.Path))
	buf.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("name = \"%s\"\n", folder.Name))
	buf.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("file_count = %d\n", len(folder.Files)))
	buf.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("mod_time = \"%s\"\n", folder.ModTime.Format(time.RFC3339)))

	return buf.String(), nil
}

type MarkdownFormatter struct {

}

// NewMarkdownFormatter åˆ›å»ºMarkdownæ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢å™¨
func NewMarkdownFormatter(config *types.FormatConfig) Formatter {

			name: "Markdown",

			config: config,
		},
	}
}

// Format æ ¼å¼åŒ–ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡æ•°æ®
func (f *MarkdownFormatter) Format(data types.ContextData) (string, error) {
	var sb strings.Builder

	// æ·»åŠ æ ‡é¢˜
	sb.WriteString("# ä»£ç ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡\n\n")
	sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("ç”Ÿæˆæ—¶é—´: %s\n\n", time.Now().Format(time.RFC3339)))

	// æ·»åŠ æ–‡ä»¶éƒ¨åˆ†
	if len(data.Files) > 0 {
		sb.WriteString("## æ–‡ä»¶\n\n")
		for _, file := range data.Files {
			sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("### %s\n\n", file.Name))
			sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("- **è·¯å¾„**: `%s`\n", file.Path))
			sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("- **å¤§å°**: %d å­—èŠ‚\n", file.Size))
			sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("- **ä¿®æ”¹æ—¶é—´**: %s\n\n", file.ModTime.Format(time.RFC3339)))

			// æ·»åŠ ä»£ç å—ï¼ˆåªé’ˆå¯¹æ–‡æœ¬æ–‡ä»¶ï¼‰
			if !file.IsBinary {
				sb.WriteString("```")
				if ext := filepath.Ext(file.Path); ext != "" {
					sb.WriteString(strings.TrimPrefix(ext, "."))
				}
				sb.WriteString("\n")
				sb.WriteString(file.Content)
				sb.WriteString("\n```\n\n")
			} else {
				sb.WriteString("**[äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶ - å†…å®¹æœªæ˜¾ç¤º]**\n\n")
			}
		}
	}

	// æ·»åŠ æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹éƒ¨åˆ†
	if len(data.Folders) > 0 {
		sb.WriteString("## æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹\n\n")
		for _, folder := range data.Folders {
			sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("### %s\n\n", folder.Name))
			sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("- **è·¯å¾„**: `%s`\n", folder.Path))
			sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("- **æ–‡ä»¶æ•°**: %d\n", len(folder.Files)))
			sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("- **æ–‡ä»¶æ•°**: %d\n\n", len(folder.Files)))

			// æ·»åŠ æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸­çš„æ–‡ä»¶
			if len(folder.Files) > 0 {
				sb.WriteString("#### æ–‡ä»¶åˆ—è¡¨\n\n")
				for _, file := range folder.Files {
					sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("- `%s` (%d å­—èŠ‚)\n", file.Name, file.Size))
				}
				sb.WriteString("\n")
			}
		}
	}

	return sb.String(), nil
}

// FormatFile æ ¼å¼åŒ–å•ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶
func (f *MarkdownFormatter) FormatFile(file types.FileInfo) (string, error) {
	var sb strings.Builder

	sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("- **è·¯å¾„**: `%s`\n", file.Path))

	sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("- **ä¿®æ”¹æ—¶é—´**: %s\n\n", file.ModTime.Format(time.RFC3339)))

	// æ·»åŠ ä»£ç å—ï¼ˆåªé’ˆå¯¹æ–‡æœ¬æ–‡ä»¶ï¼‰
	if !file.IsBinary {

// FormatterFactory æ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢å™¨å·¥å‚
type FormatterFactory struct {
	formatters map[string]Formatter
}

// NewFormatterFactory åˆ›å»ºæ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢å™¨å·¥å‚
func NewFormatterFactory() *FormatterFactory {
	return &FormatterFactory{
		formatters: make(map[string]Formatter),
	}
}

// Register æ³¨å†Œæ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢å™¨
func (ff *FormatterFactory) Register(format string, formatter Formatter) {
	ff.formatters[strings.ToLower(format)] = formatter
}

// Get è·å–æ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢å™¨
func (ff *FormatterFactory) Get(format string) (Formatter, error) {
	formatter, exists := ff.formatters[strings.ToLower(format)]
	if !exists {
		return nil, fmt.Errorf("ä¸æ”¯æŒçš„æ ¼å¼: %s", format)
	}
	return formatter, nil
}

// GetSupportedFormats è·å–æ”¯æŒçš„æ ¼å¼åˆ—è¡¨
func (ff *FormatterFactory) GetSupportedFormats() []string {
	formats := make([]string, 0, len(ff.formatters))
	for format := range ff.formatters {
		formats = append(formats, format)
	}
	return formats
}

// NewFormatter åˆ›å»ºæ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢å™¨
func NewFormatter(format string) (Formatter, error) {
	factory := CreateDefaultFactory(nil)
	return factory.Get(format)
}

// CreateDefaultFactory åˆ›å»ºé»˜è®¤çš„æ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢å™¨å·¥å‚
func CreateDefaultFactory(configs map[string]*types.FormatConfig) *FormatterFactory {
	factory := NewFormatterFactory()

	// æ³¨å†Œæ‰€æœ‰æ”¯æŒçš„æ ¼å¼
	factory.Register(constants.FormatJSON, NewJSONFormatter(configs[constants.FormatJSON]))
	factory.Register(constants.FormatXML, NewXMLFormatter(configs[constants.FormatXML]))
	factory.Register(constants.FormatTOML, NewTOMLFormatter(configs[constants.FormatTOML]))
	factory.Register(constants.FormatMarkdown, NewMarkdownFormatter(configs[constants.FormatMarkdown]))

	return factory
}

// è¾…åŠ©æ–¹æ³•

func escapeTOMLString(s string) string {
	// ç®€å•çš„TOMLå­—ç¬¦ä¸²è½¬ä¹‰
	s = strings.ReplaceAll(s, "\\", "\\\\")
	s = strings.ReplaceAll(s, "\"", "\\\"")
	s = strings.ReplaceAll(s, "\n", "\\n")
	s = strings.ReplaceAll(s, "\r", "\\r")
	s = strings.ReplaceAll(s, "\t", "\\t")
	return s
}

		Size: 1024,
		ModTime: time.Now(),
		Content: "package main\n\nfunc main() {\n\tprintln(\"Hello World\")\n}",

	}

// JSONFormatter æµ‹è¯•
func TestJSONFormatter_Format(t *testing.T) {
	formatter := NewJSONFormatter(nil)
	data := createTestContextData()

	result, err := formatter.Format(data)
	if err != nil {
		t.Fatalf("Format failed: %v", err)
	}

	// éªŒè¯ç»“æœæ˜¯æœ‰æ•ˆçš„JSON
	var parsed map[string]interface{}
	if err := json.Unmarshal([]byte(result), &parsed); err != nil {
		t.Fatalf("Result is not valid JSON: %v", err)
	}

	// éªŒè¯åŸºæœ¬å­—æ®µå­˜åœ¨
	if _, exists := parsed["files"]; !exists {
		t.Error("Missing 'files' field in JSON output")
	}
	if _, exists := parsed["folders"]; !exists {
		t.Error("Missing 'folders' field in JSON output")
	}
}

func TestJSONFormatter_FormatFile(t *testing.T) {
	formatter := NewJSONFormatter(nil)
	file := createTestFileInfo()

	result, err := formatter.FormatFile(file)
	if err != nil {
		t.Fatalf("FormatFile failed: %v", err)
	}

	// éªŒè¯ç»“æœæ˜¯æœ‰æ•ˆçš„JSON
	var parsed types.FileInfo
	if err := json.Unmarshal([]byte(result), &parsed); err != nil {
		t.Fatalf("Result is not valid JSON: %v", err)
	}

	// éªŒè¯å­—æ®µ
	if parsed.Name != file.Name {
		t.Errorf("Expected name %s, got %s", file.Name, parsed.Name)
	}
	if parsed.Size != file.Size {
		t.Errorf("Expected size %d, got %d", file.Size, parsed.Size)
	}
}

func TestFormatterFactory(t *testing.T) {
	factory := NewFormatterFactory()

	// æ³¨å†Œæ ¼å¼
	jsonFormatter := NewJSONFormatter(nil)
	factory.Register("json", jsonFormatter)
	factory.Register("JSON", jsonFormatter) // æµ‹è¯•å¤§å°å†™ä¸æ•æ„Ÿ

	// æµ‹è¯•è·å–æ ¼å¼
	formatter, err := factory.Get("json")
	if err != nil {
		t.Fatalf("Get formatter failed: %v", err)
	}
	if formatter == nil {
		t.Error("Formatter should not be nil")
	}
	if formatter.GetName() != "JSON" {
		t.Errorf("Expected formatter name 'JSON', got '%s'", formatter.GetName())
	}

	// æµ‹è¯•ä¸å­˜åœ¨çš„æ ¼å¼
	_, err = factory.Get("nonexistent")
	if err == nil {
		t.Error("Expected error for nonexistent format")
	}

	// æµ‹è¯•è·å–æ”¯æŒçš„æ ¼å¼
	supportedFormats := factory.GetSupportedFormats()
	if len(supportedFormats) != 1 { // json å’Œ JSON åº”è¯¥è¢«è§†ä¸ºåŒä¸€ä¸ª
		t.Errorf("Expected 1 supported format, got %d", len(supportedFormats))
	}
}

func TestNewFormatter(t *testing.T) {
	// æµ‹è¯•åˆ›å»ºJSONæ ¼å¼
	formatter, err := NewFormatter("json")
	if err != nil {
		t.Fatalf("NewFormatter failed: %v", err)
	}
	if formatter.GetName() != "JSON" {
		t.Errorf("Expected formatter name 'JSON', got '%s'", formatter.GetName())
	}

	// æµ‹è¯•åˆ›å»ºXMLæ ¼å¼
	formatter, err = NewFormatter("xml")
	if err != nil {
		t.Fatalf("NewFormatter failed: %v", err)
	}
	if formatter.GetName() != "XML" {
		t.Errorf("Expected formatter name 'XML', got '%s'", formatter.GetName())
	}

	// æµ‹è¯•åˆ›å»ºTOMLæ ¼å¼
	formatter, err = NewFormatter("toml")
	if err != nil {
		t.Fatalf("NewFormatter failed: %v", err)
	}
	if formatter.GetName() != "TOML" {
		t.Errorf("Expected formatter name 'TOML', got '%s'", formatter.GetName())
	}

	// æµ‹è¯•åˆ›å»ºMarkdownæ ¼å¼
	formatter, err = NewFormatter("markdown")
	if err != nil {
		t.Fatalf("NewFormatter failed: %v", err)
	}
	if formatter.GetName() != "Markdown" {
		t.Errorf("Expected formatter name 'Markdown', got '%s'", formatter.GetName())
	}

	// æµ‹è¯•ä¸å­˜åœ¨çš„æ ¼å¼
	_, err = NewFormatter("nonexistent")
	if err == nil {
		t.Error("Expected error for nonexistent format")
	}
}

}

func TestFormatters_EmptyData(t *testing.T) {
	emptyData := types.ContextData{
		Files: []types.FileInfo{},
		Folders: []types.FolderInfo{},
		FileCount: 0,
		FolderCount: 0,
		TotalSize: 0,
	}

	// æµ‹è¯•JSONFormatter
	jsonFormatter := NewJSONFormatter(nil)
	result, err := jsonFormatter.Format(emptyData)
	if err != nil {
		t.Fatalf("JSON format empty data failed: %v", err)
	}
	if !strings.Contains(result, `"files": null`) && !strings.Contains(result, `"files": []`) {
		t.Error("JSON empty data should contain empty files array")
	}

	// æµ‹è¯•XMLFormatter
	xmlFormatter := NewXMLFormatter(nil)
	result, err = xmlFormatter.Format(emptyData)
	if err != nil {
		t.Fatalf("XML format empty data failed: %v", err)
	}
	if !strings.Contains(result, "<files>") {
		t.Error("XML empty data should contain files element")
	}

	// æµ‹è¯•TOMLFormatter
	tomlFormatter := NewTOMLFormatter(nil)
	result, err = tomlFormatter.Format(emptyData)
	if err != nil {
		t.Fatalf("TOML format empty data failed: %v", err)
	}
	// TOMLç©ºæ•°æ®ä¸åº”è¯¥åŒ…å«æ–‡ä»¶éƒ¨åˆ†
	if strings.Contains(result, "[files]") {
		t.Error("TOML empty data should not contain files section")
	}

	// æµ‹è¯•MarkdownFormatter
	markdownFormatter := NewMarkdownFormatter(nil)
	result, err = markdownFormatter.Format(emptyData)
	if err != nil {
		t.Fatalf("Markdown format empty data failed: %v", err)
	}
	// Markdownç©ºæ•°æ®ä¸åº”è¯¥åŒ…å«æ–‡ä»¶éƒ¨åˆ†
	if strings.Contains(result, "## æ–‡ä»¶") {
		t.Error("Markdown empty data should not contain files section")
	}
}

// æµ‹è¯•FormatterFactoryçš„å¤§å°å†™ä¸æ•æ„Ÿ
func TestFormatterFactory_CaseInsensitive(t *testing.T) {
	factory := CreateDefaultFactory(nil)

	// æµ‹è¯•å„ç§å¤§å°å†™å˜ä½“
	testCases := []string{"json", "JSON", "Json", "jSoN"}
	
	for _, format := range testCases {
		formatter, err := factory.Get(format)
		if err != nil {
			t.Errorf("Get formatter for %s failed: %v", format, err)
		}
		if formatter == nil {
			t.Errorf("Formatter for %s should not be nil", format)
		}
		if formatter.GetName() != "JSON" {
			t.Errorf("Expected formatter name 'JSON' for %s, got '%s'", format, formatter.GetName())
		}
	}
}

func TestEscapeTOMLString(t *testing.T) {
	tests := []struct {
		input string
		expected string
	}{
		{"simple text", "simple text"},
		{"text with \"quotes\"", "text with \\\"quotes\\\""},
		{"text with \\ backslash", "text with \\\\ backslash"},
		{"text with\nnewline", "text with\\nnewline"},
		{"text with\ttab", "text with\\ttab"},
		{"text with\rcarriage return", "text with\\rcarriage return"},
	}

	for _, test := range tests {
		result := escapeTOMLString(test.input)
		if result != test.expected {
			t.Errorf("escapeTOMLString(%q) = %q, expected %q", test.input, result, test.expected)
		}
	}

package selector

import (
	"fmt"
	"os"
	"path/filepath"
	"sort"
	"strconv"
	"strings"
	"time"

	"code-context-generator/pkg/constants"
	"code-context-generator/pkg/types"
)

// Selector é€‰æ‹©å™¨æ¥å£
type Selector interface {
	SelectFiles(rootPath string, options *types.SelectOptions) ([]string, error)
	SelectFolders(rootPath string, options *types.SelectOptions) ([]string, error)
	InteractiveSelect(items []string, prompt string) ([]string, error)
	FilterItems(items []string, filter string) []string
	SortItems(items []string, sortBy string) []string
}

// FileSelector æ–‡ä»¶é€‰æ‹©å™¨å®ç°
type FileSelector struct {
	config *types.Config
}

// NewSelector åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„é€‰æ‹©å™¨
func NewSelector(config *types.Config) Selector {
	return &FileSelector{
		config: config,
	}
}

// SelectFiles é€‰æ‹©æ–‡ä»¶
func (s *FileSelector) SelectFiles(rootPath string, options *types.SelectOptions) ([]string, error) {
	if options == nil {
		options = &types.SelectOptions{
			Recursive: true,
			IncludePatterns: []string{},
			ExcludePatterns: constants.DefaultExcludePatterns,
			MaxDepth: constants.DefaultMaxDepth,
			ShowHidden: constants.DefaultShowHidden,
			SortBy: "name",
		}
	}

	var files []string
	
	// å¦‚æœä¸é€’å½’ï¼Œåªå¤„ç†å½“å‰ç›®å½•
	if !options.Recursive {
		entries, err := os.ReadDir(rootPath)
		if err != nil {
			return nil, fmt.Errorf("è¯»å–ç›®å½•å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
		}
		
		for _, entry := range entries {
			if entry.IsDir() {
				continue
			}
			
			fullPath := filepath.Join(rootPath, entry.Name())
			info, err := entry.Info()
			if err != nil {
				continue
			}
			
			if s.shouldIncludeFile(fullPath, info, options) {
				files = append(files, fullPath)
			}
		}
	} else {
		// é€’å½’éå†
		err := filepath.Walk(rootPath, func(path string, info os.FileInfo, err error) error {
			if err != nil {
				return nil // ç»§ç»­éå†
			}

			// è·³è¿‡æ ¹ç›®å½•
			if path == rootPath {
				return nil
			}

			// è·³è¿‡ç›®å½•
			if info.IsDir() {
				// æ£€æŸ¥æ·±åº¦é™åˆ¶
				relPath, err := filepath.Rel(rootPath, path)
				if err != nil {
					return nil
				}
				
				depth := strings.Count(relPath, string(os.PathSeparator))
				// MaxDepth ä¸º 0 è¡¨ç¤ºæ— é™åˆ¶ï¼ŒMaxDepth ä¸º 1 è¡¨ç¤ºåªå¤„ç†æ ¹ç›®å½•ä¸‹çš„æ–‡ä»¶
				if options.MaxDepth > 0 && depth >= options.MaxDepth {
					return filepath.SkipDir
				}
				return nil
			}

			// æ£€æŸ¥æ–‡ä»¶æ·±åº¦é™åˆ¶
			relPath, err := filepath.Rel(rootPath, path)
			if err != nil {
				return nil
			}
			
			depth := strings.Count(relPath, string(os.PathSeparator))
			// MaxDepth ä¸º 0 è¡¨ç¤ºæ— é™åˆ¶ï¼ŒMaxDepth ä¸º 1 è¡¨ç¤ºåªå¤„ç†æ ¹ç›®å½•ä¸‹çš„æ–‡ä»¶
			if options.MaxDepth > 0 && depth >= options.MaxDepth {
				return nil
			}

			// åº”ç”¨è¿‡æ»¤å™¨
			if s.shouldIncludeFile(path, info, options) {
				files = append(files, path)
			}

			return nil
		})

		if err != nil {
			return nil, fmt.Errorf("éå†æ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
		}
	}

	// æ’åº
	files = s.SortItems(files, options.SortBy)

	return files, nil
}

// SelectFolders é€‰æ‹©æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹
func (s *FileSelector) SelectFolders(rootPath string, options *types.SelectOptions) ([]string, error) {
	if options == nil {
		options = &types.SelectOptions{
			Recursive: true,
			IncludePatterns: []string{},
			ExcludePatterns: []string{},
			MaxDepth: constants.DefaultMaxDepth,
			ShowHidden: constants.DefaultShowHidden,
			SortBy: "name",
		}
	}

	var folders []string
	err := filepath.Walk(rootPath, func(path string, info os.FileInfo, err error) error {
		if err != nil {
			return nil // ç»§ç»­éå†
		}

		// è·³è¿‡æ–‡ä»¶å’Œæ ¹ç›®å½•
		if !info.IsDir() || path == rootPath {
			return nil
		}

		// æ£€æŸ¥æ·±åº¦é™åˆ¶
		relPath, err := filepath.Rel(rootPath, path)
		if err != nil {
			return nil
		}

		depth := strings.Count(relPath, string(os.PathSeparator))
		if depth > options.MaxDepth {
			return filepath.SkipDir
		}

		// åº”ç”¨è¿‡æ»¤å™¨
		if s.shouldIncludeFolder(path, info, options) {
			folders = append(folders, path)
		}

		return nil
	})

	if err != nil {
		return nil, fmt.Errorf("éå†æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}

	// æ’åº
	folders = s.SortItems(folders, options.SortBy)

	return folders, nil
}

// InteractiveSelect äº¤äº’å¼é€‰æ‹©
func (s *FileSelector) InteractiveSelect(items []string, prompt string) ([]string, error) {
	if len(items) == 0 {
		return []string{}, nil
	}

	// è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥é›†æˆTUIé€‰æ‹©å™¨
	// æš‚æ—¶è¿”å›æ‰€æœ‰é¡¹ç›®
	return items, nil
}

// FilterItems è¿‡æ»¤é¡¹ç›®
func (s *FileSelector) FilterItems(items []string, filter string) []string {
	if filter == "" {
		return items
	}

	var filtered []string
	filter = strings.ToLower(filter)

	for _, item := range items {
		if strings.Contains(strings.ToLower(item), filter) {
			filtered = append(filtered, item)
		}
	}

	return filtered
}

// SortItems æ’åºé¡¹ç›®
func (s *FileSelector) SortItems(items []string, sortBy string) []string {
	sorted := make([]string, len(items))
	copy(sorted, items)

	switch sortBy {
	case "name":
		sort.Strings(sorted)
	case "size":
		sort.Slice(sorted, func(i, j int) bool {
			info1, err1 := os.Stat(sorted[i])
			info2, err2 := os.Stat(sorted[j])
			if err1 != nil || err2 != nil {
				return sorted[i] < sorted[j]
			}
			return info1.Size() < info2.Size()
		})
	case "modified":
		sort.Slice(sorted, func(i, j int) bool {
			info1, err1 := os.Stat(sorted[i])
			info2, err2 := os.Stat(sorted[j])
			if err1 != nil || err2 != nil {
				return sorted[i] < sorted[j]
			}
			return info1.ModTime().Before(info2.ModTime())
		})
	default:
		sort.Strings(sorted)
	}

	return sorted
}

// è¾…åŠ©æ–¹æ³•

func (s *FileSelector) shouldIncludeFile(path string, info os.FileInfo, options *types.SelectOptions) bool {
	filename := filepath.Base(path)

	// æ£€æŸ¥éšè—æ–‡ä»¶
	if !options.ShowHidden && strings.HasPrefix(filename, ".") {
		return false
	}

	// æ£€æŸ¥åŒ…å«æ¨¡å¼
	if len(options.IncludePatterns) > 0 {
		included := false
		for _, pattern := range options.IncludePatterns {
			matched, err := filepath.Match(pattern, filename)
			if err == nil && matched {
				included = true
				break
			}
		}
		if !included {
			return false
		}
	}

	// æ£€æŸ¥æ’é™¤æ¨¡å¼
	for _, pattern := range options.ExcludePatterns {
		matched, err := filepath.Match(pattern, filename)
		if err == nil && matched {
			return false
		}
	}

	// æ£€æŸ¥æ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°
	if s.config != nil && s.config.Filters.MaxFileSize != "" {
		// è§£ææ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¸ºå­—èŠ‚æ•°
		maxSize, err := parseFileSize(s.config.Filters.MaxFileSize)
		if err == nil && info.Size() > maxSize {
			return false
		}
	}

	return true
}

func (s *FileSelector) shouldIncludeFolder(path string, _ os.FileInfo, options *types.SelectOptions) bool {
	foldername := filepath.Base(path)

	// æ£€æŸ¥éšè—æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹
	if !options.ShowHidden && strings.HasPrefix(foldername, ".") {
		return false
	}

	// æ£€æŸ¥åŒ…å«æ¨¡å¼
	if len(options.IncludePatterns) > 0 {
		included := false
		for _, pattern := range options.IncludePatterns {
			matched, err := filepath.Match(pattern, foldername)
			if err == nil && matched {
				included = true
				break
			}
		}
		if !included {
			return false
		}
	}

	// æ£€æŸ¥æ’é™¤æ¨¡å¼
	for _, pattern := range options.ExcludePatterns {
		matched, err := filepath.Match(pattern, foldername)
		if err == nil && matched {
			return false
		}
	}

	return true
}

// PatternMatcher æ¨¡å¼åŒ¹é…å™¨
type PatternMatcher struct {
	patterns []string
}

// NewPatternMatcher åˆ›å»ºæ¨¡å¼åŒ¹é…å™¨
func NewPatternMatcher(patterns []string) *PatternMatcher {
	return &PatternMatcher{
		patterns: patterns,
	}
}

// Match æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦åŒ¹é…ä»»ä½•æ¨¡å¼
func (pm *PatternMatcher) Match(path string) bool {
	filename := filepath.Base(path)
	for _, pattern := range pm.patterns {
		matched, err := filepath.Match(pattern, filename)
		if err == nil && matched {
			return true
		}
	}
	return false
}

// MatchAny æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦åŒ¹é…ä»»ä½•æ¨¡å¼ï¼ˆæ”¯æŒé€šé…ç¬¦ï¼‰
func (pm *PatternMatcher) MatchAny(path string) bool {
	filename := filepath.Base(path)
	for _, pattern := range pm.patterns {
		// æ”¯æŒé€šé…ç¬¦åŒ¹é…
		if matched, _ := filepath.Match(pattern, filename); matched {
			return true
		}
		// æ”¯æŒåŒ…å«åŒ¹é…
		if strings.Contains(filename, pattern) {
			return true
		}
	}
	return false
}

// GetFileType è·å–æ–‡ä»¶ç±»å‹
type GetFileType func(path string) string

// DefaultGetFileType é»˜è®¤æ–‡ä»¶ç±»å‹è·å–å‡½æ•°
func DefaultGetFileType(path string) string {
	ext := filepath.Ext(path)
	if ext == "" {
		return "unknown"
	}
	return strings.TrimPrefix(ext, ".")
}

// parseFileSize è§£ææ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¸ºå­—èŠ‚æ•°
func parseFileSize(sizeStr string) (int64, error) {
	sizeStr = strings.TrimSpace(strings.ToUpper(sizeStr))

	// æå–æ•°å­—å’Œå•ä½
	var numStr string
	var unit string

	for i, char := range sizeStr {
		if char >= '0' && char <= '9' || char == '.' {
			numStr += string(char)
		} else {
			unit = sizeStr[i:]
			break
		}
	}

	if numStr == "" {
		return 0, fmt.Errorf("æ— æ•ˆçš„æ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°æ ¼å¼: %s", sizeStr)
	}

	num, err := strconv.ParseFloat(numStr, 64)
	if err != nil {
		return 0, fmt.Errorf("è§£ææ•°å­—å¤±è´¥: %w", err)
	}

	// æ ¹æ®å•ä½è®¡ç®—å­—èŠ‚æ•°
	switch strings.TrimSpace(unit) {
	case "", "B":
		return int64(num), nil
	case "K", "KB":
		return int64(num * 1024), nil
	case "M", "MB":
		return int64(num * 1024 * 1024), nil
	case "G", "GB":
		return int64(num * 1024 * 1024 * 1024), nil
	default:
		return 0, fmt.Errorf("ä¸æ”¯æŒçš„å¤§å°å•ä½: %s", unit)
	}
}

// GetFileIcon è·å–æ–‡ä»¶å›¾æ ‡
type GetFileIcon func(path string) string

// DefaultGetFileIcon é»˜è®¤æ–‡ä»¶å›¾æ ‡è·å–å‡½æ•°
func DefaultGetFileIcon(path string) string {
	ext := filepath.Ext(path)
	switch ext {
	case ".go":
		return "ğŸ¹"
	case ".py":
		return "ğŸ"
	case ".js":
		return "ğŸ“œ"
	case ".ts":
		return "ğŸ“˜"
	case ".json":
		return "ğŸ“‹"
	case ".xml":
		return "ğŸ“„"
	case ".yaml", ".yml":
		return "ğŸ“‹"
	case ".toml":
		return "âš™ï¸"
	case ".md":
		return "ğŸ“"
	case ".txt":
		return "ğŸ“„"
	default:
		return "ğŸ“„"
	}
}

// FileInfo æ–‡ä»¶ä¿¡æ¯ç»“æ„
type FileInfo struct {
	Path string
	Name string
	Size int64
	ModTime time.Time
	IsDir bool
	IsHidden bool
	Icon string
	Type string
}

// GetFileInfo è·å–æ–‡ä»¶ä¿¡æ¯
func GetFileInfo(path string) (*FileInfo, error) {
	info, err := os.Stat(path)
	if err != nil {
		return nil, err
	}

	return &FileInfo{
		Path: path,
		Name: info.Name(),
		Size: info.Size(),
		ModTime: info.ModTime(),
		IsDir: info.IsDir(),
		IsHidden: strings.HasPrefix(info.Name(), "."),
		Icon: DefaultGetFileIcon(path),
		Type: DefaultGetFileType(path),
	}, nil
}

// GetDirectoryContents è·å–ç›®å½•å†…å®¹
func GetDirectoryContents(path string, showHidden bool) ([]FileInfo, error) {
	entries, err := os.ReadDir(path)
	if err != nil {
		return nil, err
	}

	var contents []FileInfo
	for _, entry := range entries {
		fullPath := filepath.Join(path, entry.Name())

		// æ£€æŸ¥éšè—æ–‡ä»¶
		if !showHidden && strings.HasPrefix(entry.Name(), ".") {
			continue
		}

		info, err := GetFileInfo(fullPath)
		if err != nil {
			continue
		}

		contents = append(contents, *info)
	}

	return contents, nil
}

// NewFileSelector åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„æ–‡ä»¶é€‰æ‹©å™¨
func NewFileSelector(config *types.Config) *FileSelector {
	return &FileSelector{
		config: config,
	}
}

// SelectorOptions é€‰æ‹©å™¨é€‰é¡¹
type SelectorOptions struct {
	MaxDepth int
	IncludePatterns []string
	ExcludePatterns []string
	ShowHidden bool
	SortBy string
}

// FileItem æ–‡ä»¶é¡¹
type FileItem struct {
	Path string
	Name string
	Size int64
	ModTime time.Time
	IsDir bool
	IsHidden bool
	Icon string
	Type string
	Selected bool
}
